<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

        <div class="span8">
            <div class="post highlighted">            
                <h1 class="article-title">5 things you need to know about the new Birks</h1>
                
                <div class="subtitle">Revamped student centre emphasizes enhanced, integrated service and online tools</div>
                
                <div class="clearfix"></div>
                <div class="infos">
	                <div class="date">Posted on July 25, 2013</div>
	                <div class="separator">|</div>
	                <div class="author">
	                   <div class="author parbase picker">






	<span>By: Tom Peacock</span>
</div>

	                </div>
	                <div class="source">
	                   <div class="single source">





</div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="rte">
                    <div class="parbase details wysiwyg">



<div class="rte">

</div></div>

                </div>
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase textimage section"><div class="image" id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/news/stories/2013/07/25/5-things-you-need-to-know-about-the-new-birks/jcr:content/parsys/textimage"><img title="Birks centre before the renovations" alt="Birks centre before the renovations" class="cq-dd-image" src="/news/stories/2013/07/25/5-things-you-need-to-know-about-the-new-birks/_jcr_content/parsys/textimage/image.img.jpg/1376329308397.jpg"><br><small>As of August 12, the newly renovated Birks centre will offer an expanded array of services. | Photo by Concordia University</small></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/news/stories/2013/07/25/5-things-you-need-to-know-about-the-new-birks/jcr:content/parsys/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/now/2013/08/Birks-Student-Service-Centre-021.jpg", imageTitle: "Birks\x20centre\x20before\x20the\x20renovations" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "foundation/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="text"><p>The Birks Student Service Centre is set to reopen August 12 at 1 p.m. following extensive renovations â€” and the changes are more than skin-deep.<br>
<br>
The new, improved Birks aims to provide more personalized and streamlined assistance in a comfortable, inviting space.<br>
<br>
<b>1. Itâ€™s a one-stop shop</b><br>
The centreâ€™s staff will offer you an integrated service that includes a review of your file to make sure there are no outstanding issues.<br>
</p>
<p>New touchscreens will further streamline your visit by processing the requests and reducing wait times. The old service counter is gone: the upgraded space will house eight new permanent service desks, as well as four additional desks for peak periods. Upholstered, bench-style seating will replace the plastic seats in the waiting area.<br>
<br>
Staff will also point you in the right direction if you need to visit another department â€” while working hard to minimize the necessity of going elsewhere.<br>
<br>
â€œStudents can feel lost in a university the size of ours,â€? says Brad Tucker, associate vice-president of Student and Enrolment Services. â€œWe hope they find the new service approach useful for navigating the university, and that they understand we are here to help them solve problems: to get what they need when they need it, whenever possible.â€?<br>
<b><br>
2. The service will be speedy&nbsp;</b><br>
The start of each semester is the busiest time for students. To meet increased demand, members of the centreâ€™s Front-line Administrative Services Team (F.A.S.T.) will be on duty for the last week of August and the first two weeks of September.<br>
<br>
At temporary kiosks, theyâ€™ll offer quick processing of requests for simple information, general services including tuition-fee payments, and new student ID cards.<br>
<br>
<b>3. You can pay your tuition online</b><br>
While Birks still accepts tuition fees, you can also pay through your bankâ€™s online bill payment service if you are a client of Royal Bank, Scotiabank, Laurentian Bank or Toronto Dominion (TD) Bank.<br>
<br>
<b>4. Your proof of full-time student status for OPUS is also online</b><br>
In order to obtain a discounted student OPUS transit card from the SociÃ©tÃ© de transport de MontrÃ©al (STM), you need to provide proof of full-time student status.<br>
<br>
Getting this proof used to require a visit to Birks. Now, you can simply log on to the MyConcordia portal and click on â€œAttestation Letters.â€? Eligible students will see an STM-OPUS Card letter; print it out and take it to the STM to get your discounted transit pass.<br>
<b><br>
5. You can find out what you need before you go</b><br>
The renovated centre will offer an expanded array of services, but itâ€™s still a good idea to know what youâ€™re looking for before you show up.<br>
<br>
A full list of services offered by Birks is available on the&nbsp;<a href="/students/birks.html">centreâ€™s web page</a>. Check it out before you visit.<br>
<br>
<b>Related links:</b><br>
â€¢&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="/students/birks.html">Birks Student Services Centre&nbsp;</a><br>
â€¢&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="/campus-life.html">Get to know your Student Services</a></p>
</div><div class="clear"></div></div>


</div>

                <hr>
                <div class="related-links parbase picker">

        </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Frontline administrative service team </H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>Rapid service with the F.A.S.T. team</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The beginning of the semester is always an exciting and busy time for new and returning Concordia students. You may have such questions as: Where can I get information? How do I access the MyConcordia Portal? Where can I obtain my student ID card?</p>
<p>Several services will be offered at various times on weekdays from <b>Monday, January 6, 2014 to Friday, January 31, 2014.</b> We encourage you to take advantage of these services to help you through this busy period.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Our services</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>We want your experience at Concordia to be successful â€“ take advantage of these services and get a strong start to the semester. If you have any questions about our services, please call 514-848-2424 extension 2668. We look forward to seeing you on campus!</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item open">
        <a name="general-service-points"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open General service points">
					
                    General service points
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: block;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Additional Service Assistants at the general service points will be available to:</p>
<ul>
<li>Respond to inquiries about<ul>
<li><a href="/admissions/tuition-fees.html" adhocenable="false">Tuition and fees</a></li>
<li>Account restrictions (registration blocks)</li>
<li>Permanent code surcharges</li>
<li>payment and withdrawal deadlines</li>
<li>late payment and interest fees</li>
<li>payment arrangements</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Accept and <a href="/admissions/tuition-fees/fee-payment-deadlines/methods-of-payment.html" adhocenable="false">process payments</a> made by personal cheque, certified cheque, money order and debit (Interac) card;</li>
<li>Accept and verify <a href="/admissions/tuition-fees/permanent-code.html" adhocenable="false">Permanent Code</a> documents; and remove a Permanent Code surcharge from your student account if the documents are in order;</li>
<li>Accept and verify proof of <a href="/admissions/tuition-fees/quebec-residency.html" adhocenable="false">Quebec Residency Code</a> documents for students who were born in Quebec; and change tuition fee assessment to Quebec Residency rate;</li>
<li>Negotiate payment arrangements for students with an outstanding balance from a previous term in order to remove an accounts restriction.</li>
</ul>
<p><b>Where:</b><br>
<a href="/offices/birks.html" adhocenable="false">Birks Student Service Centre</a>, S-LB-185.</p>
<p><b>When:</b><br>
Services at the general service points will be available from</p>
<ul>
<li><b>January 6 to 10</b><ul>
<li>9:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. Monday - Thursday</li>
<li>9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. Friday</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><b>January 27 to 31</b><ul>
<li>9:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. Monday - Thursday</li>
<li>9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. Friday</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="student-id-card-service-points"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Student I.D. card service points">
					
                    Student I.D. card service points
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Undergraduate and Graduate students will be able to obtain their Concordia student I.D. card* at the student I.D. card service points.</p>
<p><b>Where:<br>
 </b>Student I.D. card service points will be located in the back of the <a href="https://maps.google.com/maps?q=pavillion+jw+mcconnell&amp;hl=en&amp;sll=45.497156,-73.578081&amp;sspn=0.001607,0.004128&amp;hnear=Pavillion+J.W.+McConnell+Bldg,+Montreal,+Quebec+H3G+2V8,+Canada&amp;t=m&amp;z=17&amp;iwloc=A" adhocenable="false" target="_blank">McConnell Building Atrium</a> (near Tim Hortonâ€™s).</p>
<p><b>When:<br>
 </b>The student I.D. card service points will be available weekdays from 9:30 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. from&nbsp;Monday, January 6, 2014 to Friday, January 17, 2014.</p>
<p><b><i>*Please note:</i></b><i> You must bring one piece of photo ID as well as your student ID number. Student cards can only be produced once you have registered for courses (48 hours prior.)</i></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase target section">








<div class="mboxDefault" id="content-concordia-en-students-fast-sidebar-picker">
    
</div>


<script type="text/javascript">
	var mboxId = 'content-concordia-en-students-fast-sidebar-picker';
	var mboxName = 'content-concordia-en-students-fast-sidebar-picker';
	var mboxLocation = '/content/concordia/en/students/fast/jcr:content/sidebar/picker';
	var wcmMode = 'DISABLED';

	if ( typeof mboxDefine == 'function' && wcmMode !== 'ANALYTICS' ) {
		var callParameters = [ mboxId ];
		var callFunction;
		var replaced = false;
	
		
				callFunction = mboxCreate;
		
		
		
		var staticParameters = {};
		
		for ( var key in staticParameters )
			callParameters.push(key  + '=' + staticParameters[key]);
		
		if ( !replaced ) { // do not define the same mbox twice, this leads to additional JS calls
			callFunction.apply(undefined, callParameters);
		}
		
		
		
		if ( callFunction == mboxDefine ) {
		    
		    // if the campaign store is available at this time we are most likely simulating
		    // so trigger an update if the (auto) campaign is selected
            var campaignStore = ClientContext.get("campaign");
            if ( campaignStore && !campaignStore.isCampaignSelected() ) {
                CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.triggerUpdate();
            }
    		
    		// wait for 2 seconds for the T&T answer to come in to prevent page flicker issues
    		// also see the overlay of mbox.protoype.setOffer which completes this
    		setTimeout(function() {
    		    CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.showDefaultMboxContent(mboxId, mboxName);
    		}, 2000);
		}
	}
	
	
		
</script>
</div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

	        <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>McConnell Library Building</H1>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase gallery section">





<div style="clear:both;display:block;">
   
   





<script type="text/javascript" src="/etc/designs/concordia/clientlibs/gallery/slideshow.min.js"></script>

<div class="camera_wrap camera_black_skin" id="camera_wrap_gallery">
    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/lb/lb1.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/lb/lb1.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/lb/lb2.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/lb/lb2.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/lb/lb3.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/lb/lb3.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/lb/lb4.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/lb/lb4.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/lb/lb5.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/lb/lb5.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/lb/lb6.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/lb/lb6.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
</div>

   
</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"></div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt1"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c0 span9"><div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The J. W. McConnell Building opened in 1992 to house the R. Howard Webster Library, teaching and research facilities, the Leonard and Bina Ellen Art Gallery, the de SÃ¨ve Cinema and academic and administrative offices.</p>
<p>Beginning in 2006 and through 2007, some Social Sciences departments left their spaces in this building to move to the Hall Building, and the Departments of English, History and Ã‰tudes franÃ§aises were renovated and consolidated on the sixth and tenth floors. This reorganization allowed the library to expand onto the fifth floor. By 2009-10 the administrative departments had moved into the Guy MÃ©tro Building, and most of the Humanities had been consolidated in the McConnell Building, with the Social Sciences concentrated in the Hall Building.</p>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c1 span3"></div></div><div style="clear:both"></div>

</div>

        </div>
    </div>

</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

    var check = mobilecheck();

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<h1>Student Accounts</h1>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The Student Accounts Department establishes Concordiaâ€™s tuition fees. <a href="/financial-services/faq.html" adhocenable="false">Read the FAQ</a> for more information.</p>
<hr>

<h3>Graduate Fee Billing Structure</h3>
<h5>Master's &amp; PhD programs</h5>
<p><b>effective for the 2010/2 Fall semester</b></p>

</ul>

</ul>

<p><b>effective for the 2010/1 Summer semester</b></p>
<ul>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/financial/docs/2010_2_other.pdf" adhocenable="false">Billing Structure</a></li>
</ul>
<h3>Financial Regulations</h3>

</div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">

</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Financial Services ensures the current and long-term effectiveness of all financial functions of the university including:</p>
<ul>
<li>accounting</li>
<li>asset and debt management</li>
<li>financial statements</li>
<li>operating and research funds management</li>
<li>capital budgeting</li>
<li>balance sheets</li>
<li>university payments</li>
<li>financial information systems.</li>
</ul>
<p>The mandate of Financial Services, which is made up of <a adhocenable="false" href="/financial-services/departments.html"><b>nine administrative units</b></a>, is to provide accurate and timely financial information to the government, granting agencies and the Concordia community.</p>
<p>Our clients are Researchers, Association members, Renovation participants, Faculty &amp; administration, <b><a href="/financial-services/departments/student-accounts.html" adhocenable="false">Students</a></b> and <b><a href="/financial-services/faq.html#external-parties" adhocenable="false">External parties</a></b>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase vignette section">

$=jQuery;
$(function() {
    var check = mobilecheck();
    if (!check) {
        $("#feedback-modal").attr("href", "#modal");
        $('a[rel*=leanModal]').leanModal({top: 200, closeButton: ".modal-close"});
    }
});
</script>
</div>


</footer>
    </div>

</body>
</html>
</IIR>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="purchasing-services"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Purchasing Services">
					
                    Purchasing Services
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_4" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Acquires goods and services for the university community, ensuring they meet the price, quality, availability and performance standards Concordia expects from its suppliers. <a href="/financial-services/departments/purchasing-services.html" adhocenable="false">Read more</a></p>
<p><b>Director, Purchasing Services:</b> Robert Scardera</p>
<ul>
<li>Consult the <a adhocenable="false" href="/financial-services/contact/staff-directory.html#purchasing-services">Staff List</a><br>
</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="restricted-funds"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Restricted Funds">
					
                    Restricted Funds
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_5" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Manages and controls special funds on behalf of external parties, such as government agencies, private industry, donors and internal contributors, and defines the protocols to move those funds to university researchers, financial managers and administrators. <a adhocenable="false" href="/financial-services/departments/restricted-funds.html">Read more</a><br>
</p>
<p><b>Director, Research &amp; Accounting Services</b>: Lyne Bouret<br>
 <b>Project Accountant Manager</b>: Angela Luciano<br>
 <b>Project Accountant Manager</b>: Chao Ling Pan</p>
<p><b><ul>
<li>Consult the <a adhocenable="false" href="/financial-services/contact/staff-directory.html#restricted-funds">Staff List</a><br>
</li>
</ul>
</b></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="student-accounts-cashiers-office"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Student Accounts & University Cashierâ€™s Office">
					
                    Student Accounts & University Cashierâ€™s Office
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_6" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The Student Accounts Office (SAO) manages the billing and collection of tuition and other fees. Working closely with students, the SAO is focused on customer service and accounts receivable. The unit liaises with other departments to ensure that students are well informed on all student account related services.</p>
<p>As the university cashier, the SAO is responsible for managing all petty cash floats and reimbursements as well as the processing of departmental deposits for the university community. In addition, the unit also manages all Moneris merchants from inception to maintenance.</p>
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="/financial-services/departments/student-accounts.html">Read more</a><br>
</p>
<p><b>Manager, Student Accounts</b>: Mary-Ann Jirjis<br>
<b>Supervisor, Student Accounts</b>: Annette Bowen</p>
<ul>
<li>Consult the <a href="/financial-services/contact/staff-directory.html#student-accounts" adhocenable="false">Staff List</a><br>
</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="join-the-conversation section">






            <div class="c-sidebar-social bloc">
                <h2 class="section-header">Join the Conversation</h2>
                <div class=""><ul class="">
                    <li>
                        <a href="http://www.linkedin.com/company/163191" title="Follow Concordia on LinkedIn ">
                           <div class="icon"><span class="sprites-icon-social-5"></span></div>Follow Concordia on LinkedIn 
                        </a>
                    </li>
                    
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
            <hr></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h4>Contact us</h4>
<ul>
<li><b>General inquiries:</b><br>
Laura Cridge<a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:Laura.Cridge@concordia.ca"><br>
 Laura.Cridge@concordia.ca</a><br>
514-848-2424 ext. 4940</li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/financial-services/contact.html"><b>Contact list</b></a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">    
        





<div class="breadcrumb breadcrumbs">



<ul class="c-breadcrumb breadcrumb">

	        <li>
                <a href="/" onclick="CQ_Analytics.record({event:'followBreadcrumb',values: { breadcrumbPath: '/content/concordia/en' },collect: false,options: { obj: this },componentPath: 'concordia/components/breadcrumb'})">
                    Home
                </a>
	        </li>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Forms &amp; guides</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>A complete list of forms is available on the intranet (<a href="http://cspace.concordia.ca/" adhocenable="false" target="_blank">Cspace</a>) for staff and faculty. Please view all Financial Services forms using <a target="_blank" href="http://get.adobe.com/reader/" adhocenable="false">Adobe Reader</a>.</p>
<h3>Information and Guides for Students</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/financial/docs/student-association-signing-authority.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Student Association Signing Authority Form</a></li>
<li><a href="http://studentaccounts.concordia.ca/pdf/cash_chq_deposits.pdf" target="_blank">Miscellaneous Deposit Form</a></li>
</ul>
<h3><a name="university-cashier"></a>University Cashier</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/financial/docs/cash_cheque_instruction.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Cash and/or Cheque Deposits Instructions</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/financial/docs/cash_chq_deposits.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Cash and/or Cheque Deposits Form</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/financial/docs/credit_card_instructions.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Credit &amp; Debit Card Deposits Instructions</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/financial/docs/credit_card_deposits.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Credit &amp; Debit Card Deposits Form</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/financial/docs/PettyCashProcedure.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Petty Cash Reimbursement Procedure</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/services/financial/docs/PettyCashForm.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Petty Cash Float Replenishment &amp; Expense Summary Form</a></li>

</ul>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Patrick Kelley</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase image section"><div id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/about/administration-governance/office-chief-financial-officer/patrick-kelley/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="Patrick_Kelley" alt="Patrick_Kelley" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/about/administration-governance/office-chief-financial-officer/patrick-kelley/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1376325502283.jpg"></div>
    
    
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/about/administration-governance/office-chief-financial-officer/patrick-kelley/jcr:content/content-main/image");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/images/about/Patrick_Kelley.jpg", imageTitle: "Patrick_Kelley" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "foundation/components/image"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Patrick Kelley heads Financial Services, which oversees all aspects of the universityâ€™s financial planning, accounting and operating budgets. Kelleyâ€™s role is to:</p>
<ul>
<li>Set the standards and follow best practices for financial and fiscal record keeping and reporting</li>
<li>Identify the universityâ€™s financial strengths and weaknesses and develop strategies for improvement</li>
<li>Provide analysis, advice and informed insight on all projects, initiatives and proposed undertakings</li>
<li>Develop the Universityâ€™s yearly Operating and Capital Budgets and provide reporting and analysis of all budgetary items</li>
<li>Maintain a sound financial position that minimize risks</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Prior to his appointment in July 2010, Kelley held several senior managerial positions with major Canadian companies. &nbsp;He has also served as Concordiaâ€™s Executive Director, Strategic Plans, Special Advisor to the VP, Services on Information Technology, and has assumed several roles with the John Molson School of Business, where he continues to teach.</p>
<p>Kelley holds a BSc in Mathematics from St. Bonaventure University.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="/about/administration-governance/office-chief-financial-officer.html">Learn more about Financial Services</a> | <a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/concordia/publications-reports/docs/budget-book.pdf">View the budget</a> | <a adhocenable="false" href="/financial-services/statements.html">Review the university's financial statements</a><br>
</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">

jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>FAQ</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Please consult our FAQs for researchers, staff &amp; faculty on the intranet (<a adhocenable="false" href="http://cspace.concordia.ca/" target="_blank">Cspace</a>).<br>
</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h4><a name="students"></a>Students FAQ</h4>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open How to contact Financial Services?">
					
                    How to contact Financial Services?
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">

                    Where can I get information about tuitions and fees?
                </a>
            </h3>

<div class="mboxDefault" id="content-concordia-en-financial-services-faq-content-main-accordion_panel_0-parsys-accordion-wysiwyg">
    
        <div class="default parbase wysiwyg">

<p>Please contact <a adhocenable="false" href="/admissions/tuition-fees.html">Student Accounts</a>.</p>

</div>


<script type="text/javascript">
	var mboxId = 'content-concordia-en-financial-services-faq-content-main-accordion_panel_0-parsys-accordion-wysiwyg';
	var mboxName = 'content-concordia-en-financial-services-faq-content-main-accordion_panel_0-parsys-accordion-wysiwyg';
	var mboxLocation = '/content/concordia/en/financial-services/faq/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/wysiwyg';
	var wcmMode = 'DISABLED';

	if ( typeof mboxDefine == 'function' && wcmMode !== 'ANALYTICS' ) {
		var callParameters = [ mboxId ];
		var callFunction;
		var replaced = false;
	
		
				callFunction = mboxCreate;
		
		
		
		var staticParameters = {};
		
		for ( var key in staticParameters )
			callParameters.push(key  + '=' + staticParameters[key]);
		
		if ( !replaced ) { // do not define the same mbox twice, this leads to additional JS calls
			callFunction.apply(undefined, callParameters);
		}
		
		
		
		if ( callFunction == mboxDefine ) {
		    
		    // if the campaign store is available at this time we are most likely simulating
		    // so trigger an update if the (auto) campaign is selected
            var campaignStore = ClientContext.get("campaign");
            if ( campaignStore && !campaignStore.isCampaignSelected() ) {
                CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.triggerUpdate();
            }
    		
    		// wait for 2 seconds for the T&T answer to come in to prevent page flicker issues
    		// also see the overlay of mbox.protoype.setOffer which completes this
    		setTimeout(function() {
    		    CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.showDefaultMboxContent(mboxId, mboxName);
    		}, 2000);
		}
	}
	
	
		
</script>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Office of the Treasurer</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Mission</h3>
<p>The Office of the Treasurer provides corporate finance oversight and financial management of the Universityâ€™s and its related entitiesâ€™ balance sheets. The Office financially protects and optimizes the Universityâ€™s and its related entitiesâ€™ assets while minimizing all the financial liabilities and funding costs. It is also an integral source of specialized knowledge for corporate decision making.</p>
<h3>Institutional role</h3>
<ul>
<li>To financially protect and optimize the University's and its related entities' assets while minimizing all the financial liabilities and funding costs and optimizing the Universityâ€™s fund balances<br>
<br>
</li>
<li>To be an integral source of specialized knowledge for corporate decision making.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>Organizational and operational structure</h3>
<ul>
<li>&nbsp;<b>University Treasurer</b>: Marc Gauthier<br>
<br>
<ul>
<li>Benefits portfolio (Pension Plan, Supplementary Retirement Plans, Group Insurance Plans, Post Retirement and Employment Benefits and other University's benefits)<br>
<br>
<ul>
<li><b>Administrator, University's Benefits Portfolio</b>: Maryse Picard<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Investment portfolio (Pension Fund, Concordia University Foundation, KWPMP)<br>
<br>
<ul>
<li><b>Senior Investment Advisor, Investment Portfolio</b>: Bogdan Berliba<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Corporate risks portfolio (Enterprise risk management program, Risk financing, preventative and loss control/intervention programs)<br>
<br>
<ul>
<li><b>Corporate Risk Manager, Corporate Risks Portfolio</b>: Jean-Francois Baril<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Capital and Financing portfolio (Institutional Capital and Cash Budgets, financing programs)<br>
<br>
<ul>
<li><b>Director, Capital and Financing Portfolio</b>: Graham Maisonneuve</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Purchasing Services</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Mandate</h3>
<p>The Mission of the Purchasing Services department is to acquire goods and services for the University Community in such a manner as to maximize the value to the University Community in considering price, quality, service availability, and operational performance.</p>
<p>A purchase decision is normally the result of a process which includes identifying a need, the consideration of alternatives and ultimately the selection of the product or service that offers the best value to the community.</p>
<p>Purchasing Services buyers, in addition to the responsibility to make purchases for goods and services on behalf of University faculty members and administrative and support staff, offer assistance at the various stages leading to a decision to purchase. The process of acquiring goods and services is recognized by the University as being fundamental to its efficient operation and often represents significant legal and financial commitments by the University.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Restricted Funds</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Mandate</h3>
<p>The mandate of Restricted Funds is to provide <b>financial management and control</b> on behalf of external stakeholders:</p>
<ul>
<li>Governmental agencies</li>
<li>Private industries and donors</li>
</ul>
<p>as well as an infrastructure to <b>facilitate the management of the funds</b> to our internal stakeholders:<br>
</p>
<ul>
<li>Researchers</li>
<li>Financial managers and administrators</li>
</ul>
<p>Moreover, Restricted Funds is to financially manage the <b>University's restricted funds</b>. These funds encompass the following types of activities:</p>
<ul>
<li>Research funded by internal and/or external sources</li>
<li>Other projects for which spending has been internally/externally restricted</li>
<li>Projects funded by Donations and Endowments</li>
<li>Capital Budgeting</li>
<li>Affiliated Entities (I.e. Foundations)</li>
<li>Agency accounts</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="join-the-conversation section">






            <div class="c-sidebar-social bloc">
                <h2 class="section-header">Join the Conversation</h2>
                <div class=""><ul class="">
                    <li>
                        <a href="http://www.linkedin.com/company/163191" title="Follow Concordia on LinkedIn ">
                           <div class="icon"><span class="sprites-icon-social-5"></span></div>Follow Concordia on LinkedIn 
                        </a>
                    </li>
                    
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

        <div class="span8">
            <div class="post highlighted">            
                <h1 class="article-title">Accounts Payable Holiday Deadlines 2013</h1>
                
                <div class="clearfix"></div>
                <div class="infos">
	                <div class="date">Posted on November 18, 2013</div>
	                <div class="separator">|</div>
	                <div class="author">
	                   <div class="author parbase picker">





</div>

	                </div>
	                <div class="source">
	                   <div class="single source">





<span>Source: <a href="/financial-services.html.html">Financial Services</a></span></div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="rte">
                    <div class="parbase details wysiwyg">



<div class="rte">
<p>Please take note of the following Accounts Payable deadlines for submitting <b>invoices</b>, <b>expense reports</b> and <b>corporate card</b> statements in order to ensure payment / reimbursement prior to the calendar year end.</p>
<p><b>Expense Reports </b>must be received in Accounts Payable by Friday, December 6<sup>th</sup>, 2013 in order for expense(s) to be reimbursed prior to the end of the year.</p>
<p><b>US bank Corporate Card payment Expense Reports</b> must be received in Accounts Payable by Monday, December 9<sup>th</sup>, 2013 in order for payment to be issued to US Bank Visa prior to the end of the year.</p>
<p><b>Invoices and Check Requisitions</b> must be received in Accounts Payable by Friday, December 13<sup>th</sup>, 2013 in order to be included on the final check run which will be on Monday December 16<sup>th</sup>, 2013.</p>
<p><b>Final check run of 2013:</b> Monday December 16<sup>th</sup>, 2013 at 9:00 am.</p>
<p><b>First check run of 2014:</b> Tuesday January 7<sup>th</sup>, 2014 at 9:00 am.</p>
<p>Any documents missing relevant information such as approval signatures, Fund/Account codes, receipts etc.) will <b><u>not</u></b> be considered received until the missing information is provided.</p>
<p>Please feel free to share this information with your colleagues.</p>
<p>Wishing you the Happiest of Holidays!</p>
<p>Thank You</p>
<p>The Accounts Payable Team</p>

</div></div>

                </div>
                <div class="parsys">




</div>

                <hr>
                <div class="related-links parbase picker">






</div>

            </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    <div class="row with_socialbar">

        <div class="share-this">












	<script type="text/javascript">var switchTo5x=true;</script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
        stLight.options({
            publisher: "864f3db6-11cb-4e7b-9c5f-0a8a836ac323",
            onhover: false,

            // disable CopyNShare:
            doNotHash: true,
            doNotCopy: true,
            hashAddressBar: false,
        });
	</script>

        <div class="span8">
            <div class="post highlighted">            
                <h1 class="article-title">Elimination of Banner Web Reports</h1>
                
                <div class="clearfix"></div>
                <div class="infos">
	                <div class="date">Posted on December 10, 2012</div>
	                <div class="separator">|</div>
	                <div class="author">
	                   <div class="author parbase picker">





</div>

	                </div>
	                <div class="source">
	                   <div class="single source">





<span>Source: <a href="/financial-services.html.html">Financial Services</a></span></div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="rte">
                    <div class="parbase details wysiwyg">



<div class="rte">
<p>Please be advised the Banner Web Reports will be decommissioned on December 21, 2012.<br>
<br>
Training guides are now available on the Banner Web Reports homepage.<br>
<br>
The training guides detail how to find and view the financial information in Millennium Finance Reporting.<br>
<br>
Millennium Finance Reporting is a versatile reporting tool and provides additional advantages such as:</p>
<ul>
<li>A custom view to our financial data</li>
<li>Allows end users to drill down to document level for many of the transactions</li>
<li>Downloads to excel for customizing</li>
<li>Allows end users to report on different elements of their data (i.e.: by fund/org/account or, fiscal year)</li>
</ul>
<p>There are also five specialized reports, which replicate these Banner Web Reports:</p>
<ul>
<li>Grant Detail Report</li>
<li>Financial Manager / Primary Investigator Inquiry</li>
<li>Fund / Organization Manager Inquiry</li>
<li>Account Hierarchy</li>
<li>Operating Organization Hierarchy</li>
</ul>
<p>Beginning, January 3, 2013, these specialized reports will be available in the MyConcordia Portal in the Financial Services section, in a new section called Other Reports.<br>
<br>
The training guides will also be available in this section.<br>
<br>
If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact the Financial Services Business Process Office at <a href="mailto:fisadmin@concordia.ca">fisadmin@concordia.ca</a>.</p>

</div></div>

                </div>
                <div class="parsys">




</div>

                <hr>
                <div class="related-links parbase picker">






</div>

            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="c-sidebar span4">
            <div class="parsys story-parsys">


<div class="join-the-conversation section">








</div>


</div>

            <div class="parbase list list-related-stories related-stories">


</div>

            <div class="related-topics">

As a result, as of October 05, 2012, the University is no longer charging the grant levy of 0.05% to salaries paid from research funds.">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

        <div class="span8">
            <div class="post highlighted">            
                <h1 class="article-title">Grant Levy</h1>
                
                <div class="clearfix"></div>
                <div class="infos">
	                <div class="date">Posted on December 7, 2012</div>
	                <div class="separator">|</div>
	                <div class="author">
	                   <div class="author parbase picker">





</div>

	                </div>
	                <div class="source">
	                   <div class="single source">





<span>Source: <a href="/financial-services.html.html">Financial Services</a></span></div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="rte">
                    <div class="parbase details wysiwyg">



<div class="rte">
<p><br>
<b><u>To:</u></b> Concordia University Community<br>
<br>
<b><u>From:</u></b><br>
Dr. Justin Powlowski,<br>
Interim Associate VP, Strategy &amp; Operation, Office of the Vice-President Research &amp; Graduate Studies<br>
<br>
Daniel Therrien,<br>
University Controller, Financial Services</p>
<h3>Internal memorandum<br>
</h3>
<p>As you know, the University has in the past deducted 0.05% from all research salaries paid from research grants to cover the cost of short term disability benefits.<br>
<br>
It has come to our attention that because of the rules governing deductions from grants, the University can no longer continue with this practice. As a result, as of October 05, 2012, the University <u>is no longer charging the grant levy of 0.05%</u> to salaries paid from research funds.<br>
<br>
We continue to have an obligation to provide short term disability benefit (see HR-5 and HR-21), therefore, the cost for this benefit for eligible research employees will be covered by the University.<br>
<br>
For further information please contact Angela Luciano at 4924 or Chao Ling Pan at 5761.</p>

</div></div>

                </div>
                <div class="parsys">




</div>

                <hr>
                <div class="related-links parbase picker">






</div>

</div>

</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

        <div class="span8">
            <div class="post highlighted">            
                <h1 class="article-title">RENA - Registre des Entreprises Non Admissibles aux Contrats Publics</h1>
                
                <div class="clearfix"></div>
                <div class="infos">
	                <div class="date">Posted on July 3, 2012</div>
	                <div class="separator">|</div>
	                <div class="author">
	                   <div class="author parbase picker">





</div>

	                </div>
	                <div class="source">
	                   <div class="single source">





<span>Source: <a href="/financial-services.html.html">Financial Services</a></span></div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="rte">
                    <div class="parbase details wysiwyg">



<div class="rte">
<p>As of June 1, 2012 the Quebec Government has adopted new Legislation pertaining to Public Sector procurement:</p>
<p><b>The University cannot issue a Purchase Order to a vendor who is registered on the Registre des entreprises non admissibles aux contrats publics (RENA). Please follow the link below and read the instructions carefully before proceeding to buy any goods and/or services. This Registre is available on the website of the SecrÃ©tariat du Conseil du trÃ©sor at the following address: <a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="http://www.rena.tresor.gouv.qc.ca">www.rena.tresor.gouv.qc.ca</a></b></p>
<p>The new law applies to all public contracts (including supply contracts, services, construction, P-Card, Corporate card and direct expenses).</p>
<p>The University community must be vigilant in ensuring that vendors with whom it wishes to contract are <b><u>not listed</u></b> on the Registre.</p>
<p>It is the responsibility of each end-user to verify the admissibility of each vendor before initiating any purchase.</p>
<p>Note that should a vendor be added to the Registre during the process of WR to PO, the Buyer will notify the end-user in order to proceed with finding an alternate supplier. As for P-Card purchases, each end-user is responsible for verifying the R.E.N.A website for any offending vendors before initiating a transaction.</p>
<p>Non-compliance to this legislation could result in legal sanctioning.</p>
<p>Purchasing Services remains committed in assisting the University Community with any procurement related compliance matters.</p>
<p>If you have any concerns you may contact Purchasing Services directly at ext: 3650.</p>
<p>Robert Scardera<br>
Director, Purchasing Services<br>
Phone: 514-848-2424 Ext 3655<br>
Fax: 514-848-3660<br>
Email: <a href="mailto:robert.scardera@concordia.ca">robert.scardera@concordia.ca</a></p>

</div></div>

                </div>
                <div class="parsys">




</div>

                <hr>
                <div class="related-links parbase picker">






</div>

            </div>
        </div>

            <div class="parsys story-parsys">

</div>

    <meta http-equiv="keywords" content="QST, Revenu Qu&eacute;bec">
    <meta http-equiv="description" content="The governments of Canada and Qu&eacute;bec have entered into an agreement to better harmonize the Qu&eacute;bec sales tax (QST) system with the goods and services tax (GST) system.

Effective January 1, 2013, the current QST will become the &quot;Amended QST&quot;, to further harmonize certain QST provisions to fall in line with the GST/HST legislation. However, as is implied with the term &quot;Amended&quot;, the QST will still be a separate provincial sales tax (PST) administered by Revenu Qu&eacute;bec.">
    <title>New Amended QST Effective January 1st, 2013</title>

    
    <link rel="shortcut icon" href="/etc/designs/concordia/favicon.ico">

Effective January 1, 2013, the current QST will become the &quot;Amended QST&quot;, to further harmonize certain QST provisions to fall in line with the GST/HST legislation. However, as is implied with the term &quot;Amended&quot;, the QST will still be a separate provincial sales tax (PST) administered by Revenu Qu&eacute;bec." />

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>
