        <div class="span8">
            <div class="post highlighted">            
                <h1 class="article-title">New Amended QST Effective January 1st, 2013</h1>
                
                <div class="subtitle">Application of amended QST on January 1, 2013</div>
                
                <div class="clearfix"></div>
                <div class="infos">
	                <div class="date">Posted on October 25, 2012</div>
	                <div class="separator">|</div>
	                <div class="author">
	                   <div class="author parbase picker">





</div>

	                </div>
	                <div class="source">
	                   <div class="single source">





<span>Source: <a href="/financial-services.html.html">Financial Services</a></span></div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="rte">
                    <div class="parbase details wysiwyg">



<div class="rte">
<p>The governments of Canada and QuÃ©bec have entered into an agreement to better harmonize the QuÃ©bec sales tax (QST) system with the goods and services tax (GST) system.</p>
<p><b>Effective January 1, 2013</b>, the current QST will become the &quot;Amended QST&quot;, to further harmonize certain QST provisions to fall in line with the GST/HST legislation. However, as is implied with the term &quot;Amended&quot;, the QST will still be a separate provincial sales tax (PST) administered by Revenu QuÃ©bec.</p>
<p><b>The first main change is that the QST rate will no longer be levied on a GST-included amount (9.5% stated rate with an effective rate of 9.975%), but the actual stated rate for the Amended QST will become the current effective rate of 9.975%.</b></p>
<p>The second and more significant change is that the Amended QST will mirror the GST/HST legislation with respect to the treatment of financial services and financial institutions. This will result in generally treating the supply of financial services as exempt instead of zero-rated. This change will not affect Concordia University activities.</p>
<p>The transitional rules effectively require the amended QST rate to apply to supplies where the consideration is paid or becomes payable on or after January 1, 2013 - generally where the invoice for the supply is dated on or after that date. The QST will then be calculated on the value of the total or partial consideration established excluding the GST.</p>
<h3>Measure taking effect on April 1, 2013</h3>
<p><b>Effective April 1, 2013</b>, the federal government and its mandatories currently exempt from payment of the QST as well as the QuÃ©bec government and its mandatories currently exempt from payment of the GST/HST and the QST <b>will have to pay these taxes</b> on their acquisitions of taxable properties and services.</p>
<p>Accordingly, as of April 1, 2013, Concordia University <b>will be required to charge QST and GST/HST</b> to all federal and provincial departments and its mandatories on acquisitions of taxable properties and services.</p>
<p>This measure will apply to the GST/HST and to the QST that will become payable by a government entity after March 31, 2013.</p>
<h3>As of January 1, 2013, please find bellow details on how to apply these new rules:</h3>
<h4>FOR ISSUING TAXABLE INVOICES TO EXTERNAL CUSTOMERS:</h4>
<p>The general rules apply where the University issues an invoice for a supply of taxable goods (i.e., tangible and intangible personal property) or a service <b>and the charge</b> will be subject to the <b>QST rate of 9.975% if all or a portion of its consideration becomes due after December 31, 2012</b>, and it is not paid before January 1, 2013. The QST rate will then be <b>showed on the invoice</b> at 9.975 % and calculated on the value of the total or partial consideration established excluding the GST.</p>
<p>If any portion of the consideration for the goods or services becomes due after December 31, 2012, and is not paid before January 1, 2013, QST at a rate of 9.975% will apply to that portion.</p>
<h4>EXAMPLE OF INVOICE</h4>

</div></div>

                </div>
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   smallText table-condensed horizontalLines verticalLines table-striped">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th valign="top" colspan="2" style="text-align: center;">Invoice dated BEFORE January 1, 2013</th>
</tr><tr><td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">Service XYZ</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">$100.00</td>
</tr><tr><td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">GST 5%</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">5.00</td>
</tr><tr><td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">QST <b>9.5</b>%</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">9.98 ((100+5) x 9.5%)</td>
</tr><tr><td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">Total</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">$114.98</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   smallText table-condensed horizontalLines verticalLines table-striped">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th width="500" valign="middle" height="25" colspan="2" style="text-align: center;">Invoice dated AFTER January 1, 2013</th>
</tr><tr><td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">Service XYZ</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">$100.00</td>
</tr><tr><td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">GST 5%</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">5.00</td>
</tr><tr><td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">QST <b>9.975</b>%</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">9.98 (100 x 9.975%)</td>
</tr><tr><td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">Total</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">$114.98</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>(Please note, the University invoices should always show the rate (and/or amount) of GST &amp; QST that is being charged.)</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase box section">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark with-border" style=" color: # !important;   padding: 10px 10px 10px 20px;">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '></h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>Units responsible for cash registers, POS systems, e-commerce solutions, and any other transaction feeds must ensure that their billing systems are updated and can support these new rates prior to January 1st, 2013. The QST rate will no longer be levied on a GST-included amount (9.5% stated rate with an effective rate of 9.975%), but the actual stated rate for the Amended QST will become the current effective rate of 9.975%.</b></p>

</div></div>


</div>



</div>

</div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   smallText table-condensed horizontalLines verticalLines table-striped">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">&nbsp;</th>
<th width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">Nominal Rate</th>
<th width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">Effective Rate</th>
</tr><tr><td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">Prior to January 1, 2011</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">7.5%</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">7.875%</td>
</tr><tr><td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">Effective January 1, 2011</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">8.5%</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">8.925%</td>
</tr><tr><td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">Effective January 1, 2012</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">9.5%</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">9.975%</td>
</tr><tr><td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">Effective January 1, 2013</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">9.975%</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">9.975%</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h4>FOR THE PAYMENT OF INVOICES FROM VENDORS:</h4>
<p>The rules outlined above for the QST rate to be charged when the University invoices our external customers also apply when our vendors invoice us. Thus, when receiving an invoice from a supplier, the basic rule is that if the invoice is dated on or after January 1st, 2013, QST should be charged at 9.975%. The QST will then be calculated on the value of the total or partial consideration established excluding the GST. For more detail , see appendix 1.</p>
<p>If the University transaction relates to a deposit, refund, lease arrangement, membership fee, ticket sale, subscription, progress billings, holdback, etc., please see transitional rules on Appendix 1.</p>
<p>The Banner financial system will be updated by financial Services to reflect these new rates.</p>
<p>Below is a table which shows the calculation of the GST and QST on an expense with a cost of $100:</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   smallText table-condensed horizontalLines verticalLines table-striped">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;" colspan="2">On a $100 expense or sale billed 5% GST and 9.975% QST:</th>
</tr><tr><td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">GST:</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">$100 x 0.0500 = $ 5.00</td>
</tr><tr><td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">QST:</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">($100) x 0.09975 = $9.98</td>
</tr><tr><td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">Expenses excluding taxes:</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">$100.00</td>
</tr><tr><td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">Total paid:</td>
<td width="250" valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">$114.98 ($100.00 + $5.00 + $9.98)</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h4>REBATES</h4>
<p>It is important to note that the QST rebate rates (47%) have not changed. It is only the QST <u>nominal rate</u> that has increased from 9.5% to 9.975% effective January 1, 2013.</p>
<p>Below is a chart showing the calculation of the amount of GST and QST that would be expensed on a $100 purchase after deducting the tax rebates claimed by the University. This example assumes that GST is charged at the rate of 5% and the QST at the <u>nominal rate</u> of 9.975%. The rebates are respectively 67% for GST purposes and 47% for QST purposes.</p>
<p>Thus, the combined tax rate net of rebates paid by the University (for the fund that has no commercial activity) will be 6.94% (GST 1.65% + QST 5.29%).</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   smallText table-condensed horizontalLines verticalLines table-striped">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th valign="middle" style="text-align: center;" colspan="2">Purchase price (1)</th>
<th valign="middle" style="text-align: center;">Taxes rate (2)</th>
<th valign="middle" style="text-align: center;">Taxes paid (3)</th>
<th valign="middle" style="text-align: center;">Rebate rate (4)</th>
<th valign="middle" style="text-align: center;">Rebates claimed (5)</th>
<th valign="middle" style="text-align: center;">Net taxes paid [(3)-(5)] (6)</th>
<th valign="middle" style="text-align: center;">Tax rate net of rebates (7)</th>
</tr><tr><td valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">GST</td>
<td valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">$100.00</td>
<td valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">x 0.0500</td>
<td valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">= $5.00</td>
<td valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">x 67%</td>
<td valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">= $3.35</td>
<td valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">$1.65</td>
<td valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">1.65%</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">QST</td>
<td valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">$100.00</td>
<td valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">x 0.09975</td>
<td valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">= $9.98</td>
<td valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">x 47%</td>
<td valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">= $4.69</td>
<td valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">$5.29</td>
<td valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: center;">5.29%</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="middle" height="25" style="text-align: right;" colspan="8">6.94%</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Please note that if the University fund has taxable external sales the above rates would not apply since the recovery rates would be greater than the 67% and 47% in the example above as some purchases would be eligible for input tax credits and input tax refunds.</p>
<p>Please contact GeneviÃ¨ve Desrosiers (4720) if you require any help in updating your various systems or for any additional questions.</p>
<p><i>Reference Materials</i></p>
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/financial-services/news/2012/10/25/qst-appendix.html">Amended QST- Not true harmonization</a>, Definitive memo (September 2012)</li>
<li><a href="http://www.revenuquebec.ca/en/entreprise/taxes/tvq_tps/modifications-regime-tvq.aspx" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Revenu QuÃ©bec web site</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.finances.gouv.qc.ca/documents/bulletins/en/BULEN_2012-4-a-b.pdf" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">MinistÃ¨re des finances web site</a></li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

                <hr>
                <div class="related-links parbase picker">

            <div class="site site-navigation">








<div id="main-navbar" class="navbar navbar-static">
    <div class="navbar-inner">

        <a class="btn btn-navbar" data-toggle="collapse" data-target=".nav-collapse">
            <span class="icon-bar"></span>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                </a>

<div class="mboxDefault" id="content-concordia-en-financial-services-faq-content-main-accordion_panel_0-parsys-accordion-wysiwyg">

<script type="text/javascript">
	var mboxId = 'content-concordia-en-financial-services-faq-content-main-accordion_panel_0-parsys-accordion-wysiwyg';
	var mboxName = 'content-concordia-en-financial-services-faq-content-main-accordion_panel_0-parsys-accordion-wysiwyg';
	var mboxLocation = '/content/concordia/en/financial-services/faq/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/wysiwyg';
	var wcmMode = 'DISABLED';

	if ( typeof mboxDefine == 'function' && wcmMode !== 'ANALYTICS' ) {
		var callParameters = [ mboxId ];
		var callFunction;
		var replaced = false;
	
		
				callFunction = mboxCreate;
		
		
		
		var staticParameters = {};
		
		for ( var key in staticParameters )
			callParameters.push(key  + '=' + staticParameters[key]);
		
		if ( !replaced ) { // do not define the same mbox twice, this leads to additional JS calls
			callFunction.apply(undefined, callParameters);
		}
		
		
		
		if ( callFunction == mboxDefine ) {
		    
		    // if the campaign store is available at this time we are most likely simulating
		    // so trigger an update if the (auto) campaign is selected
            var campaignStore = ClientContext.get("campaign");
            if ( campaignStore && !campaignStore.isCampaignSelected() ) {
                CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.triggerUpdate();
            }
    		
    		// wait for 2 seconds for the T&T answer to come in to prevent page flicker issues
    		// also see the overlay of mbox.protoype.setOffer which completes this
    		setTimeout(function() {
    		    CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.showDefaultMboxContent(mboxId, mboxName);
    		}, 2000);
		}
	}
	
	
		
</script>
</div>


</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="rte">
<h4>Contact us</h4>

Room Number : H-541</p>
<p><b>Telephone:</b> (514) 848-2424 ext. 4900</p>
<p><b>E-mail:</b> <a href="mailto:studentaccounts@concordia.ca">studentaccounts@concordia.ca</a></p>
<p><b>Staff lis</b><b>t:</b> <a adhocenable="false" href="/financial-services/contact/staff-directory.html#student-accounts">Student Accounts</a></p>
<hr>

<h4>Operating Hours</h4>
<p><b>University Cashier</b><br>
Monday - Friday<br>
10:00 - 4:00</p>
<p><b>Student Accounts</b><br>
Monday - Friday<br>
9:00 - 5:00</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Advising</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="section tabs">










    <script type="text/javascript">
	$ = jQuery;
	$(document).ready(function() {
	    $('#tabs a:first').tab('show');
	    var hash = window.location.hash;
	    if (hash == undefined || hash == ""){
	      var previouslyActive = getCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab");
          if (previouslyActive != undefined) hash = previouslyActive;
	    }
	    hash && $('ul.nav a[href="' + hash + '"]').tab('show');

	    $('.nav-tabs a').click(function (e) {
	        $(this).tab('show');
	        var scrollmem = $('body').scrollTop();
	        window.location.hash = this.hash;
	        $('html,body').scrollTop(scrollmem);
	        setCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab", this.hash, 1);
	    });
	});
        /** COOKIE GETTER AND SETTER FUNCTIONS **/
    function setCookie(c_name,value,exdays){
        var exdate=new Date();
        exdate.setDate(exdate.getDate() + exdays);
        var c_value=escape(value) + ((exdays==null) ? "" : "; expires="+exdate.toUTCString());
        document.cookie=c_name + "=" + c_value;
    }
    function getCookie(c_name){
      var c_value=document.cookie;
      var c_start=c_value.indexOf(" " + c_name + "=");
      if (c_start == -1)	{
        c_start=c_value.indexOf(c_name + "=");
      }
      if (c_start == -1){
        c_value=null;
      } else {
        c_start=c_value.indexOf("=", c_start) + 1;
        var c_end=c_value.indexOf(";", c_start);
        if (c_end == -1){
          c_end=c_value.length;
        }
        c_value=unescape(c_value.substring(c_start,c_end));
      }
      return c_value;
    }
	</script>
	
	<div class="c-tabs">
    
	    <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="tabs">
	        
		          <li><a href="#undergraduate" data-toggle="tab">Undergraduate</a></li>
		        
	        
		          <li><a href="#graduate" data-toggle="tab">Graduate</a></li>
		        
	        
	    </ul>
	    <div class="tab-content">
	        <div class="tab-pane" id="undergraduate">
	           
	           <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-0">

        e.preventDefault();

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Arts &amp; Science advising</h1>

<div class="section tabs">










    <script type="text/javascript">
	$ = jQuery;
	$(document).ready(function() {
	    $('#tabs a:first').tab('show');
	    var hash = window.location.hash;
	    if (hash == undefined || hash == ""){
	      var previouslyActive = getCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab");
          if (previouslyActive != undefined) hash = previouslyActive;
	    }
	    hash && $('ul.nav a[href="' + hash + '"]').tab('show');

	    $('.nav-tabs a').click(function (e) {
	        $(this).tab('show');
	        var scrollmem = $('body').scrollTop();
	        window.location.hash = this.hash;
	        $('html,body').scrollTop(scrollmem);
	        setCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab", this.hash, 1);
	    });
	});
        /** COOKIE GETTER AND SETTER FUNCTIONS **/
    function setCookie(c_name,value,exdays){
        var exdate=new Date();
        exdate.setDate(exdate.getDate() + exdays);
        var c_value=escape(value) + ((exdays==null) ? "" : "; expires="+exdate.toUTCString());
        document.cookie=c_name + "=" + c_value;
    }
    function getCookie(c_name){
      var c_value=document.cookie;
      var c_start=c_value.indexOf(" " + c_name + "=");
      if (c_start == -1)	{
        c_start=c_value.indexOf(c_name + "=");
      }
      if (c_start == -1){
        c_value=null;
      } else {
        c_start=c_value.indexOf("=", c_start) + 1;
        var c_end=c_value.indexOf(";", c_start);
        if (c_end == -1){
          c_end=c_value.length;
        }
        c_value=unescape(c_value.substring(c_start,c_end));
      }
      return c_value;
    }
	</script>
	
	<div class="c-tabs">
    
	    <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="tabs">
	        
		          <li><a href="#undergraduate" data-toggle="tab">Undergraduate</a></li>
		        
	        
	    </ul>
	    <div class="tab-content">
	        <div class="tab-pane" id="undergraduate">
	           
	           <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-0">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header "><br />
Advising for Undergraduate Students 2013-2014</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Contact us</h3>
<ul>
<li><b>Helpline: </b>(514) 848- 2424 ext. 2104</li>
<li><a href="mailto:asreg@alcor.concordia.ca">Email</a></li>
<li><a href="http://artsandscience.concordia.ca/">Website</a></li>
</ul>
<h3>Summer Session</h3>
<p><b>Returning Students â€”</b>&nbsp;Students enrolled in a BEd Specialization in TESL or Certificate in TESL program must meet with their academic adviser in order to register for any TESL course offered in the Summer Session.&nbsp;<b>All other students</b>&nbsp;in the Faculty of Arts &amp; Science&nbsp;<b>do not</b>&nbsp;require academic advising prior to registering for summer courses.</p>
<h3>Fall &amp; Winter Sessions</h3>
<p><b>New Students â€”&nbsp;</b>All newly admitted students, including those students transferring to a new degree program, are required to have academic advising in order to access the Registration System. Advising is mandatory for all programs in the Faculty of Arts and Science. Please consult&nbsp;<b><a href="http://fas.newstudentadvising.concordia.ca/">fas.newstudentadvising.concordia.ca</a></b>&nbsp;in order to select an advising appointment convenient for you.</p>
<p>Students who are unable to schedule an in-person advising appointment are encouraged to contact their department to make alternate arrangements. See contact information below.<br>
<br>
<b>Returning Students â€”&nbsp;</b>Advising is not required for returning students. Should you wish to meet with an advisor, please see the contact information below.</p>
<h3>Department &amp; College telephone numbers</h3>

<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3>General information&nbsp;</h3>
<p><b>Course Prerequisites â€”</b>&nbsp;The registration system will not permit you to register for a course which has a prerequisite if you have not completed that prerequisite. If a course has â€œpermission of the Departmentâ€? as a prerequisite, you must obtain authorization from the appropriate department in order to register for the course.&nbsp;<br>
<br>
<b>Course Entry Restrictions â€”</b>&nbsp;Many courses in the Faculty of Arts &amp; Science are reserved in whole or in part to students enrolled in specific programs and are not available as elective courses. Please refer to&nbsp;<a href="http://registrar.concordia.ca/webguide/reading-course-listings/">How to Read the Course Listings</a>&nbsp;for details concerning the registration restriction symbols.&nbsp;<br>
<br>
<b>Course Overloads â€”</b>&nbsp;Full-time students who wish to take a course overload (i.e. more than 12 credits) in the Summer Session must receive permission from their academic adviser or from Student Academic Services in the Faculty of Arts &amp; Science. The normal Fall/Winter course load for full-time students is 15 credits per term.<br>
<br>
Students are advised that they must have completed at least 24 credits and have a cumulative GPA of 3.00 or above before attempting to undertake a course overload in any session.<br>
<br>
<b>General Education Requirement</b></p>
<p>Newly admitted students to the Faculty of Arts &amp; Science are required to satisfy the General Education requirement. For more information regarding this degree requirement students may contact the academic advisor in their Department, or the academic counsellor in Student Academic Services (extension 2104). Detailed information may also be obtained by consulting&nbsp;<a href="http://registrar.concordia.ca/calendar/31/31.html#31.004">Section 31.004</a>&nbsp;of the Undergraduate Calendar for the year in which you were admitted to a program in Arts and Science.<br>
<br>
<b>Elective Group</b></p>
<p>For more information, telephone (514) 848-2424 ext. 2104 or Check our Web site:<a href="http://artsandscience.concordia.ca/departmentsandcolleges/interdisciplinarystudies/electivegroups/">artsandscience.concordia.ca/departmentsandcolleges/interdisciplinarystudies/electivegroups/</a></p>

</div></div>


</div>

	        </div>
	    </div>
	</div>
	</div>


</div>

            </div>

jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="section tabs">










    <script type="text/javascript">
	$ = jQuery;
	$(document).ready(function() {
	    $('#tabs a:first').tab('show');
	    var hash = window.location.hash;
	    if (hash == undefined || hash == ""){
	      var previouslyActive = getCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab");
          if (previouslyActive != undefined) hash = previouslyActive;
	    }
	    hash && $('ul.nav a[href="' + hash + '"]').tab('show');

	    $('.nav-tabs a').click(function (e) {
	        $(this).tab('show');
	        var scrollmem = $('body').scrollTop();
	        window.location.hash = this.hash;
	        $('html,body').scrollTop(scrollmem);
	        setCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab", this.hash, 1);
	    });
	});
        /** COOKIE GETTER AND SETTER FUNCTIONS **/
    function setCookie(c_name,value,exdays){
        var exdate=new Date();
        exdate.setDate(exdate.getDate() + exdays);
        var c_value=escape(value) + ((exdays==null) ? "" : "; expires="+exdate.toUTCString());
        document.cookie=c_name + "=" + c_value;
    }
    function getCookie(c_name){
      var c_value=document.cookie;
      var c_start=c_value.indexOf(" " + c_name + "=");
      if (c_start == -1)	{
        c_start=c_value.indexOf(c_name + "=");
      }
      if (c_start == -1){
        c_value=null;
      } else {
        c_start=c_value.indexOf("=", c_start) + 1;
        var c_end=c_value.indexOf(";", c_start);
        if (c_end == -1){
          c_end=c_value.length;
        }
        c_value=unescape(c_value.substring(c_start,c_end));
      }
      return c_value;
    }
	</script>
	
	<div class="c-tabs">
    
	    <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="tabs">
	        
		          <li><a href="#undergraduate" data-toggle="tab">Undergraduate</a></li>
		        
	        
	    </ul>
	    <div class="tab-content">
	        <div class="tab-pane" id="undergraduate">
	           
	           <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-0">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Advising for Undergraduate Students 2013-2014</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3><b> </b><br>
Contact us</h3>
<ul>
<li><b>Helpline: </b>(514) 848- 2424 ext. 8712</li>
<li><b>E-mail</b>:&nbsp;<a href="mailto:WebRegHelp@jmsb.concordia.ca" adhocenable="false">WebRegHelp@jmsb.concordia.ca</a></li>
<li><b>Website:&nbsp;<a href="http://johnmolson.concordia.ca/en/undergrad" adhocenable="false"></a><a href="http://johnmolson.concordia.ca/en/undergrad">johnmolson.concordia.ca/en/undergrad</a></b><br>
</li>
</ul>
<p>In order to successfully register via the web, you need to follow certain steps that may vary depending on the category of student you are, as indicated below.</p>
<h3>New Students</h3>
<p>All new business students are required to&nbsp;<b>view 5 short advising videos</b>&nbsp;as stipulated in their Offer of Admission before they will be able to register into courses. To access the New Student Advising Videos on the JMSB website, <a adhocenable="false" href="http://johnmolson.concordia.ca/en/undergrad/bachelor-degrees/advising-a-registration">please visit the JMSB advising site</a>. Make sure that you view all 5 short videos and follow all of the directions given.</p>
<p><b>Note:&nbsp;</b>The information provided in these videos is subject to change without notice. It is your responsibility to be aware of the Academic Rules and Regulations provided in the Undergraduate Calendar for your year of entry in the program.</p>
<p>Once you have viewed the online advising videos, you must&nbsp;<b>fill out the online Permission to Register Form</b>&nbsp;that can be accessed on the same website as the videos. If you still have questions or want to hear more about the JMSB we invite you to book an appointment by calling 514-848-2424 ext. 8712. Kindly note that you may not be able to register for courses before a specific start date (please refer to information on&nbsp;<a href="http://registrar.concordia.ca/webguide/#step4">Registration Start Dates</a>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<a href="http://registrar.concordia.ca/webguide/#step5">Registration System Availability</a>).<br>
<br>
<b>International out-of town students</b>&nbsp;who have questions after viewing all 5 of the advising videos may send us an e-mail at:&nbsp;<a href="mailto:intlcomm@jmsb.concordia.ca">intlcomm@jmsb.concordia.ca</a>.</p>
<p><b>Certificate in Accountancy Students:&nbsp;</b>Students admitted to the Certificate in Accountancy will not find specific information pertaining to course registration in the videos. However, you are still required to watch the videos and to fill out the Permission to Register Form. Should you require additional information please read the Messages section in your Offer of Admission for information on booking an academic advising appointment.</p>
<p><b>Certificate in Business Studies:</b>&nbsp;Students admitted to the Certificate in Business Studies will not find specific information pertaining to course registration for their program in the videos. It is important for you to watch the videos and print the degree worksheet for information on courses that you are required to complete.&nbsp;<br>
<br>
<b>Co-op students:</b>&nbsp;After viewing the 5 advising videos and submitting the online Permission to Register Form, students who have been admitted to the JMSB Co-op program must contact Mr. Tony Petrozza, the Administrative Assistant for the Co-op programs, in order to create their work-study schedule. They may do so in person by visiting MB 4-353; by phone: (514) 848-2424 ext. 4117; or by email:&nbsp;<a href="mailto:coopfca@jmsb.concordia.ca">coopfca@jmsb.concordia.ca</a>&nbsp;if they have not already received a schedule shortly after their interview.<br>
<br>
<b>The Co-op Academic Directors can be reached as follows:</b></p>
<ul>
<li><b>Accountancy:<br>
 </b>Tara Ramsaran, MB 14-127;<br>
(514) 848-2424 ext. 2756;<br>
<a href="mailto:tramsaran@jmsb.concordia.ca">tramsaran@jmsb.concordia.ca</a><br>
&nbsp;</li>
<li><b>Business Technology Management:<br>
 </b>Raul Valverde, MB 11-311;<br>
(514) 848-2424 ext. 2968;<br>
<a href="mailto:rvalverde@jmsb.concordia.ca">rvalverde@jmsb.concordia.ca</a><br>
&nbsp;</li>
<li><b>Finance:</b><br>
Jay Mannadiar, MB 11-303;<br>
(514) 848-2424 ext. 2919;<br>
<a href="mailto:jmannadiar@jmsb.concordia.ca">jmannadiar@jmsb.concordia.ca</a><br>
&nbsp;</li>
<li><b>Human Resource Management:</b><br>
Barbara Shapiro, MB 4-355;<br>
(514) 848-2424 ext. 2780;<br>
<a href="mailto:bshapiro@jmsb.concordia.ca">bshapiro@jmsb.concordia.ca</a><b><br>
 &nbsp;</b></li>
<li><b>Marketing:<br>
 </b>Harold Simpkins, MB 13-239;<br>
(514) 848-2424 ext. 2955;<br>
<a href="mailto:hsimpkins@jmsb.concordia.ca">hsimpkins@jmsb.concordia.ca</a><b><br>
 &nbsp;</b></li>
<li><b>Supply Chain Operations Management:</b><br>
Raul Valverde, MB 11-311;<br>
(514) 848-2424 ext. 2968;<br>
<a href="mailto:rvalverde@jmsb.concordia.ca">rvalverde@jmsb.concordia.ca</a><b><br>
 &nbsp;</b></li>
<li><b>International Business<br>
 </b>Arvind K.Jain, MB 12-301;<br>
(514) 848-2424 ext 2939<br>
<a href="mailto:arvjain@jmsb.concordia.ca">arvjain@jmsb.concordia.ca</a></li>
</ul>
<h3>Returning Students</h3>
<p><b></b>It is the responsibility of all JMSB students to register for courses as early as possible and to report any problems to the Undergraduate Student Affairs Office as soon as they occur. Helpline: (514) 848-2424 ext. 8712 or e-mail:<a href="mailto:WebRegHelp@jmsb.concordia.ca">WebRegHelp@jmsb.concordia.ca</a></p>
<p>Students are urged to&nbsp;<b>register for both Fall and Winter courses</b>&nbsp;according to the registration start dates indicated in the&nbsp;<a href="http://registrar.concordia.ca/webguide/#chart">Chart of Registration Start Dates</a>&nbsp;for Fall 2013 and Winter 2014. Start dates are also provided to students through the&nbsp;<a href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/">MyConcordia</a>&nbsp;Portal.</p>
<p>Failure to register for both Fall and Winter terms as early as possible may result in an unfavourable schedule or in extreme cases the unavailability of required courses. No special arrangements will be made if you delay your registration.</p>
<p><b>Degree worksheets</b>&nbsp;for all undergraduate programs offered by the JMSB are available on the JMSB website. Degree worksheets allow students to track their progress in their program and facilitate course selection for future registration. Please visit&nbsp;<a href="http://johnmolson.concordia.ca/en/undergrad/bachelor-degrees/program-overview/course-registration/984-forms-and-worksheets">johnmolson.concordia.ca/en/undergrad/bachelor-degrees/program-overview/course-registration/984-forms-and-worksheets</a>&nbsp;to print a copy of your degree worksheet. You will not be able to proceed with your registration if you attempt to bypass any of the following academic regulations:</p>
<ul>
<li>register for courses prior to your registration start date;</li>
<li>register for a course before completing the listed prerequisites;</li>
<li>register for a course concurrently with the listed prerequisites;</li>
<li>register for more than your allowed course load;</li>
<li>register for a course that is restricted to specific Majors.</li>
</ul>
<p><b>Registration for Summer Courses</b></p>
<p>Due to limited course selection in the Summer terms, students may not be able to register for a full course load. Hence, you are strongly encouraged to register as early as possible. Please see the&nbsp;<a href="http://registrar.concordia.ca/webguide/#chart">Chart of Registration Start Dates</a>for Summer 2013.</p>
<h3>Non-business students</h3>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px;">Students not enrolled in a program offered by the JMSB may register for a maximum of 6 business credits per term for an overall total of 30 business credits.</span></p>
<p><b>NOTE: The 30 credits include failed courses.</b><b>&nbsp;</b>Priority for registration is given to current JMSB students over non-business students. As such, space may not be available for all non-business students wanting to register in specific business courses.&nbsp;</p>
<h3>Visiting Students</h3>
<p>All Visiting students who wish to register for courses offered by the JMSB can do so by accessing the Web Registration System. If required, proof of completion of prerequisite courses must be presented to the Undergraduate Student Affairs Office, in MB 4.201, for assessment prior to registration. Please allow sufficient time for the processing of this assessment.&nbsp;<b>Please note that visiting students will only be able to register for courses based on availability at the time of registration.</b><br>
<br>
Students who follow the appropriate instructions should be able to register with relative ease. Those who need further clarification or assistance are invited to contact our office:&nbsp;<br>
<br>
SGW Campus, MB 4.201, (514) 848-2424 ext. 2721; FAX: (514) 848-2822;<br>
E-mail:&nbsp;<a href="mailto:study@jmsb.concordia.ca">study@jmsb.concordia.ca</a><br>
<br>
<b>Student Request Forms</b></p>
<p>Students who wish to submit a Student Request Form can access the form at the Schoolâ€™s web site (<a href="http://johnmolson.concordia.ca/en/undergrad/bachelor-degrees/program-overview/course-registration/984-forms-and-worksheets">johnmolson.concordia.ca/en/undergrad/bachelor-degrees/program-overview/course-registration/984-forms-and-worksheets</a>) or visit our office at MB 4.201.<br>
<br>
<b>Potential Graduates for Spring and Fall Convocations</b></p>
<p>Please note that it is the responsibility of all potential graduating students to submit an application for graduation by the appropriate deadline:</p>
<ul>
<li>January 15th 2013 for Spring graduation</li>
<li>July 15th 2013 for Fall graduation.</li>
</ul>
<p>The application for graduation form is available on the&nbsp;<a href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/">MyConcordia Portal</a>.</p>
<p><a href="http://registrar.concordia.ca/webguide/">Back to Registration Guide</a></p>

</div></div>

    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Engineering &amp; Computer Science Advising</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="section tabs">










    <script type="text/javascript">
	$ = jQuery;
	$(document).ready(function() {
	    $('#tabs a:first').tab('show');
	    var hash = window.location.hash;
	    if (hash == undefined || hash == ""){
	      var previouslyActive = getCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab");
          if (previouslyActive != undefined) hash = previouslyActive;
	    }
	    hash && $('ul.nav a[href="' + hash + '"]').tab('show');

	    $('.nav-tabs a').click(function (e) {
	        $(this).tab('show');
	        var scrollmem = $('body').scrollTop();
	        window.location.hash = this.hash;
	        $('html,body').scrollTop(scrollmem);
	        setCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab", this.hash, 1);
	    });
	});
        /** COOKIE GETTER AND SETTER FUNCTIONS **/
    function setCookie(c_name,value,exdays){
        var exdate=new Date();
        exdate.setDate(exdate.getDate() + exdays);
        var c_value=escape(value) + ((exdays==null) ? "" : "; expires="+exdate.toUTCString());
        document.cookie=c_name + "=" + c_value;
    }
    function getCookie(c_name){
      var c_value=document.cookie;
      var c_start=c_value.indexOf(" " + c_name + "=");
      if (c_start == -1)	{
        c_start=c_value.indexOf(c_name + "=");
      }
      if (c_start == -1){
        c_value=null;
      } else {
        c_start=c_value.indexOf("=", c_start) + 1;
        var c_end=c_value.indexOf(";", c_start);
        if (c_end == -1){
          c_end=c_value.length;
        }
        c_value=unescape(c_value.substring(c_start,c_end));
      }
      return c_value;
    }
	</script>
	
	<div class="c-tabs">
    
	    <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="tabs">
	        
		          <li><a href="#undergraduate" data-toggle="tab">Undergraduate</a></li>
		        
	        
	    </ul>
	    <div class="tab-content">
	        <div class="tab-pane" id="undergraduate">
	           
	           <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-0">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Advising for Undergraduate Students 2013-2014</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3><b><br>
 </b>Contact us</h3>
<ul>
<li><b style="font-size: 12px;">Helpline: (514) 848-2424 ext. 3055</b></li>
<li><b>Web site:&nbsp;<a href="http://encs.concordia.ca/">encs.concordia.ca</a></b></li>
</ul>
<h3>Potential Graduates For Spring or Fall Convocation</h3>
<p>All potential graduating students in the Faculty (40 or less credits left to complete their program) must request a curriculum evaluation from April to July if they require this information for Fall/Winter registration.<br>
<br>
Last minute curriculum assessments cannot be performed by Student Academic Services during peak registration periods. For details and a checklist for potential graduates please see:&nbsp;<a href="http://encs.concordia.ca/administration-and-governance/administrative-units/student-academic-services/">Student Academic Services Office</a></p>
<h3>Current Students</h3>
<p>All current students must <b>register for fall and winter courses before August </b>and to report any problems to student academic services.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Failure to register for both terms prior to August may result in an<b> unfavorable schedule </b>or in extreme cases the<b> unavailability of required courses.</b></p>
<p>Please read the following guidelines for assistance with registration:</p>
<ol>
<li>All readmitted students are required to attend a readmission workshop prior to being allowed to register.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
<li>All students should be following the appropriate course sequence for their program. Sequences are located at the&nbsp;<a href="http://encs.concordia.ca/administration-and-governance/administrative-units/student-academic-services/">Student Academic Services Office</a>&nbsp;website. If your sequence is not available or you encounter any problems regarding the selection of courses because you are off-sequence, please contact Student Academic Services for further assistance.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
<li>Please note that your sequences were designed to ensure that you can graduate within the regular program length. Failure to follow the recommended sequence may result in time conflicts in later sessions and may delay your graduation.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
<li>Please note that all requests for transfer credits or exemptions must be submitted to Student Academic Services at least 1 month prior to the start of a term. Requests should NOT be submitted directly to a department.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
<li>Students in a Bachelor of Computer Science program who have been admitted or readmitted prior to the 2009-2010 academic year, should follow the academic calendar for the year to which they have been admitted /readmitted.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
<li>Students in a Bachelor of Computer Science program who have been admitted or readmitted after the 2009-2010 academic year, should refer to section 71.20.6 of the Undergraduate Student Calendar located at:<a href="http://registrar.concordia.ca/calendar/pdf/sec71.pdf">registrar.concordia.ca/calendar/pdf/sec71.pdf</a>&nbsp;in order to find the list of General Electives for Engineering and Computer Science.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
<li>Students in the faculty may not take COMP 201, DESC 200, FINA 200, FINA 210, INTE 290 and MATH 200, 208 or 209, for credit.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
<li>Students are urged to register according to the registration start dates. No special arrangements will be made if you delay registration.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
<li>Alternate week Laboratory schedule:<br>
<b>Fall Term:</b>&nbsp;Labs are scheduled to commence September 9th for week (1) labs and September 16th for week (2) labs.<br>
<b>Winter Term:</b>&nbsp;Labs are scheduled to commence January 6th for week (1) labs and January 13th for week (2) labs.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
<li>All students must have completed all â€œ200â€? level courses required for their program before they can register for any â€œ400â€? level course.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
<li>All 200-level courses within the program which are prerequisites for other courses must be completed with a C- or higher. A 200-level course in which a student has obtained a D+ or lower must be repeated before attempting a course for which it is a prerequisite.</li>
</ol>
<h3>Students in Co-operative Programs</h3>
<p>Co-op students will be given priority for registration. If you are currently a Co-op student you may register on the first day of registration for each of the Summer and Fall/Winter terms.&nbsp;<b>It is your responsibility to register during this time period to ensure that you are given priority.</b></p>
<h3>Newly Admitted Students â€” September and January Admissions</h3>
<p>As a newly admitted student in ENCS, you are highly encouraged to attend one of the orientation sessions that are organized by the Faculty. However, you do not require advising in order to register. Once you have been accepted, you can register immediately on the Portal. All details are enclosed with your acceptance package. To confirm your participation in one of the orientation sessions , please contact&nbsp;<a href="http://encs.concordia.ca/administration-and-governance/administrative-units/student-academic-services/">Student Academic Services Office</a>&nbsp;at (514) 848-2424 ext. 3055.<br>
<br>
New Students to the Faculty of Engineering and Computer Science, including students who have recently been granted a degree transfer, should:</p>
<ol>
<li>Read the information provided in your acceptance package from the Office of the Registrar, including the information provided to you by the Faculty.<br>
</li>
<li>Please make sure you read the Advising Guide for new students available in early April, prior to registering. Should you experience any problems, please contact the&nbsp;<a href="http://encs.concordia.ca/administration-and-governance/administrative-units/student-academic-services/">Student Academic Services Office</a>.<br>
</li>
<li>Contact Student Academic Services at 514-848-2424 ext. 3055 to confirm participation in one of the orientation sessions offered.<br>
</li>
<li>Students must register for both the Fall, and Winter terms. Failure to do so may result in an inappropriate schedule or inability to take required courses according to your sequence.<br>
</li>
<li>International Students and students from out-of-province should refer to the information enclosed in their acceptance package.<br>
<br>
<i>Should you experience any problems, please contact:</i><br>
Sonia McCalla, (514) 848-2424 ext. 3055, (<a href="mailto:sonia.mccalla@concordia.ca">sonia.mccalla@concordia.ca</a>) or Salvatore Colavita, (514) 848-2424 ext. 3254 (<a href="mailto:salvatore.colavita@concordia.ca">salvatore.colavita@concordia.ca</a>) for further assistance with registration.&nbsp;</li>
</ol>
<p><b>Independent Students</b><br>
Independent Students who wish to take courses in the Faculty will need to have the required prerequisite completed prior to taking the course.</p>
<p><b>Visiting Students</b><br>
Visiting Students must be in good standing at their home institution and currently registered in an Engineering or Computer Science program. Students on probation (failed or conditional standing) at their home institution will not be considered as visiting or independent students.</p>
<p>Requests from Visiting Students to take courses in the Faculty of Engineering and Computer Science will be reviewed on a case-by-case basis. Priority for all courses will be to students currently enrolled in the Faculty of Engineering and Computer Science at Concordia University.</p>
<p>Individuals mandated to take courses by a professional organization, such as the&nbsp;<i>Ordre des ingÃ©nieurs du QuÃ©bec</i>&nbsp;or the Ordre des architects, must submit a letter to Student Academic Services, from the organization indicating the courses that are recommended.</p>
<p>For further information on visiting students (including from professional organizations), please consult the&nbsp;<a href="http://encs.concordia.ca/administration-and-governance/administrative-units/student-academic-services/">Student Academic Services Office</a>&nbsp;at 514-848-2424 Ext 3055.</p>
<p><b>Summer Registration</b></p>
<p><b>You are permitted to register for a maximum of 12 credits, with no more than 6 credits in each summer term, with the exception of the following:</b></p>
<ol>
<li>Co-op students following the sequence recommended by their Department<br>
</li>
<li>Students entering the Faculty in the proceeding January session who are required to take a full-time summer course load.<br>
</li>
<li>Potential graduates who require a course to remain in sequence.</li>
</ol>
<p>The 12 credit rule also applies to out-of-Faculty courses.</p>
<p>Students wishing to take a course overload who do not meet Item 1 or 2 must submit a written student request form to the Student Academic Services Office to be permitted to take more credits. Approval of course overloads during the summer is based on a GPA of 3.00 or higher, and proximity to graduation.</p>
<p><b>Web Sites</b><br>
To obtain further information about the Faculty or your program, please visit the&nbsp;<b>Faculty Web Site</b>&nbsp;at:<b><a href="http://www.encs.concordia.ca/">encs.concordia.ca</a>&nbsp;</b>or your departmental sites as follows:</p>
<ul>
<li>Building, Civil &amp; Environmental Engineering:&nbsp;<a href="http://www.bcee.concordia.ca/">www.bcee.concordia.ca</a></li>
<li>Electrical &amp; Computer Engineering:&nbsp;<a href="http://www.ece.concordia.ca/">www.ece.concordia.ca</a></li>
<li>Mechanical &amp; Industrial Engineering:&nbsp;<a href="http://www.me.concordia.ca/">www.me.concordia.ca</a></li>
<li>Computer Science &amp; Software Engineering:&nbsp;<a href="http://www.cse.concordia.ca/">www.cse.concordia.ca<br>
 &nbsp;</a></li>
</ul>
<p><a href="http://registrar.concordia.ca/webguide/">Back to Registration Guide</a></p>

</div></div>


</div>

	        </div>
	    </div>
	</div>
	</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Fine Arts advising</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="section tabs">










    <script type="text/javascript">
	$ = jQuery;
	$(document).ready(function() {
	    $('#tabs a:first').tab('show');
	    var hash = window.location.hash;
	    if (hash == undefined || hash == ""){
	      var previouslyActive = getCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab");
          if (previouslyActive != undefined) hash = previouslyActive;
	    }
	    hash && $('ul.nav a[href="' + hash + '"]').tab('show');

	    $('.nav-tabs a').click(function (e) {
	        $(this).tab('show');
	        var scrollmem = $('body').scrollTop();
	        window.location.hash = this.hash;
	        $('html,body').scrollTop(scrollmem);
	        setCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab", this.hash, 1);
	    });
	});
        /** COOKIE GETTER AND SETTER FUNCTIONS **/
    function setCookie(c_name,value,exdays){
        var exdate=new Date();
        exdate.setDate(exdate.getDate() + exdays);
        var c_value=escape(value) + ((exdays==null) ? "" : "; expires="+exdate.toUTCString());
        document.cookie=c_name + "=" + c_value;
    }
    function getCookie(c_name){
      var c_value=document.cookie;
      var c_start=c_value.indexOf(" " + c_name + "=");
      if (c_start == -1)	{
        c_start=c_value.indexOf(c_name + "=");
      }
      if (c_start == -1){
        c_value=null;
      } else {
        c_start=c_value.indexOf("=", c_start) + 1;
        var c_end=c_value.indexOf(";", c_start);
        if (c_end == -1){
          c_end=c_value.length;
        }
        c_value=unescape(c_value.substring(c_start,c_end));
      }
      return c_value;
    }
	</script>
	
	<div class="c-tabs">
    
	    <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="tabs">
	        
		          <li><a href="#undergraduate" data-toggle="tab">Undergraduate</a></li>
		        
	        
	    </ul>
	    <div class="tab-content">
	        <div class="tab-pane" id="undergraduate">
	           
	           <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-0">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header "> Advising for Undergraduate Students 2013-2014</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><span style="font-size: 12px;">The requirements for advising prior to registration in the Faculty of Fine Arts vary according to your program of study. Some programs do not require advising in order to register, while others do. Advising is NOT required prior to registering for summer courses. Please read the following information carefully and, if necessary, contact your department to arrange for an advising appointment. Please note that advising during the months of July and August is limited.</span></p>
<p><br>
You can download a copy of the appropriate Program Guide for your degree at the following Web Site:&nbsp;<b><a href="http://finearts.concordia.ca/studyinginfinearts/currentstudents/programguides/">finearts.concordia.ca/studyinginfinearts/currentstudents/programguides/</a></b><br>
<br>
You can also obtain a Program Guide from your Department or the&nbsp;<a href="http://registrar.concordia.ca/webguide/finearts-advising/#OSA">Office of Student Affairs</a>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   horizontalLines verticalLines">
    <table border="1" width="620" bordercolor="#000000" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="10" bordercolorlight="#C0C0C0" bordercolordark="#C0C0C0">

<p>During this session, students will learn about the different Studio Arts areas, about their specific program requirements, meet with teachers, and be able to visit the Fibres, Intermedia/Cyberarts, Photography, ARTX, Print Media, Ceramics, Painting, Drawing and Sculpture facilities.</p>

<p>Students who would like to meet with an adviser may contact the School at (514) 848-2424 ext. 4335 or 4666 for more information.<br>
<br>
<b>RETURNING</b> Film Production students are <b>NOT REQUIRED</b> to meet with an adviser prior to registration. Students will receive information in class regarding the procedures to be followed for entry into Film Production courses. Students should register as soon as possible for film production courses for which they have the prerequisites, as class sizes are restricted and places will be given on a first-come, first-serve basis. Academic advising sessions will be scheduled in the summer. Students who want advising should contact the School at 514-848-2424, ext. 4335 or 4666, in May, for details.<br>
<br>
It is recommended that students in the Major in Film Production take no more than twelve credits of ancillary courses in Film Production, and that students in the Specialization in Film Production take no more than twenty-seven credits of ancillary courses in Film Production (See Undergraduate Calendar), during the course of their degree programs. The School of Cinema reserves the right to deregister students from courses in excess of that limit.</p>

<div class="concordia-table   horizontalLines verticalLines">

<td valign="top" bgcolor="#D7E3F2" width="390"><b> Advising Instructions</b></td>
</tr><tr valign="TOP"><td valign="top" colspan="2" bgcolor="#EFEFEF"><b> Department of Contemporary Dance</b></td>
</tr><tr valign="TOP"><td valign="top" width="38%">Contemporary Dance<br>
Major</td>
<td valign="top" width="390"><b> NEW AND RETURNING STUDENTS:<br>
 </b>Advising is <b>REQUIRED</b> prior to registration. Students should make an appointment with the academic advisor, Professor Silvy Panet-Raymond at <a href="mailto:silvy.panet-raymond@concordia.ca">silvy.panet-raymond@concordia.ca</a>.</td>
</tr><tr valign="TOP"><td valign="top" colspan="2" bgcolor="#EFEFEF"><b> Department of Music</b></td>
</tr><tr valign="TOP"><td valign="top" width="38%">Electroacoustic Studies<br>
Major/Minor<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>Music<br>

<br>
Music Performance Studies<br>
Specialization<br>
<br>
Music Theory/Composition<br>
Specialization<br>
<br>
Music<br>
Minor</p>
</td>
<td valign="top" width="390"><b>NEW AND RETURNING STUDENTS IN THE<br>
 MAJOR IN ELECTROACOUSTIC STUDIES:</b><br>
Advising is <b>REQUIRED</b> for new students prior to registration and must be obtained as quickly as possible by contacting Professor Kevin Austin at <a href="mailto:kevin.austin@concordia.ca">kevin.austin@concordia.ca</a> or <span style="font-size: 10.0pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: Arial,sans-serif;">Professor Mark Corwin at <a href="mailto:mark.corwin@concordia.ca">mark.corwin@concordia.ca</a></span>. Students should prepare for their advising by consulting this web site where a list of recommended first-year courses can be found: <a target="_blank" href="http://finearts.concordia.ca/advising">finearts.concordia.ca/advising</a><p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><b>NEW STUDENTS IN THE MAJOR IN MUSIC:</b><br>
Advising is REQUIRED prior to registration. Students must make an advising appointment as soon as possible with Professor Rosemary Mountain at <a href="mailto:rosemary.mountain@concordia.ca">rosemary.mountain@concordia.ca</a> or Professor Christine Beckett at <a href="mailto:christine.beckett@concordia.ca">christine.beckett@concordia.ca</a>. Students intending to transfer to the Specialization in Jazz Studies should contact Professor Charles Ellison at <a href="mailto:charles.elliso@concordia.ca">charles.elliso@concordia.ca</a>. Students should prepare for their advising by consulting this web site where a list of recommended first-year courses can be found: <a target="_blank" href="http://finearts.concordia.ca/advising">finearts.concordia.ca/advising</a></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><b>RETURNING STUDENTS IN ALL MUSIC PROGRAMS:</b><br>
Advising is <b>NOT REQUIRED</b> prior to registration. However, students are strongly urged to consult with an advisor, once they have registered, to confirm their course selections and may do so by e-mailing the contacts listed above, or <a href="mailto:music@concordia.ca">music@concordia.ca</a>, or by calling the Department at 514-848-2424, ext.4559. Students are urged to begin registering for their courses as soon as possible. Please consult the program guide for a list of the courses required in your program at <a target="_blank" href="http://finearts.concordia.ca/studyinginfinearts/currentstudents/programguides/">finearts.concordia.ca/studyinginfinearts/currentstudents/programguides/</a>.</p>
</td>
</tr><tr valign="TOP"><td valign="top" colspan="2" bgcolor="#EFEFEF"><b> Department of Theatre</b></td>
</tr><tr valign="TOP"><td valign="top" width="38%">Theatre<br>
Major/Minor<br>

Playwriting<br>
Major<br>

Theatre Performance<br>
Specialization<br>

Theatre and Development<br>

Design for the Theatre<br>
Specialization</td>
<td valign="top" width="390"><b> NEW STUDENTS:<br>
 </b>Advising is <b>NOT REQUIRED </b>prior to registration. Please consult this web site for a list of recommended first-year courses for your specific program: <a target="_blank" href="http://finearts.concordia.ca/advising">finearts.concordia.ca/advising</a><p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>Students who would like to contact an academic advisor should visit <a target="_blank" href="http://theatre.concordia.ca/current-students/student-resources/">theatre.concordia.ca/current-students/student-resources/</a> for contact information. They may email the Department at <a href="mailto:theatre@alcor.concordia.ca">theatre@alcor.concordia.ca</a> or call (514) 848-2424, ext. 4555.<br>
<br>
<br>
<b>RETURNING STUDENTS:<br>
 </b>Advising is <b>NOT REQUIRED </b>prior to registration. Students are urged to begin registering for their courses as soon as possible. Please consult the program guide for a list of the courses required in your program at <a target="_blank" href="http://finearts.concordia.ca/studyinginfinearts/currentstudents/programguides/">finearts.concordia.ca/studyinginfinearts/currentstudents/programguides/</a>.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>Students who would like to contact an academic advisor should visit <a target="_blank" href="http://theatre.concordia.ca/current-students/student-resources/">theatre.concordia.ca/current-students/student-resources/</a> for contact information. They may e-mail the Department at <a href="mailto:theatre@alcor.concordia.ca">theatre@alcor.concordia.ca</a> or call (514) 848-2424, ext. 4555. All students are strongly encouraged the program area meetings scheduled in the fall and winter semesters before registration.</p>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3><b>Visiting Students</b></h3>
<p>All Visiting students who wish to register for courses offered by the Faculty of Fine Arts can do so by accessing the Web Registration System. In many cases, however, courses in Fine Arts are reserved for students enrolled in the specific programs requiring these courses. If the registration system requires that you obtain permission before registering for a specific course, please contact the department offering this course.</p>
<p><b>Please note that visiting students will only be able to register for courses based on availability at the time of registration. Access to studio courses is very limited and may not be possible.</b></p>
<p>Students who follow the appropriate instructions should be able to register with relative ease. Those who need further clarification or assistance are invited to contact the Office of Student Affairs.</p>
<h3><b><a name="OSA"></a>Office of Student Affairs</b></h3>
<p>The Office of Student Affairs is located in Room EV 2.705 of the Engineering, Computer Science and Visual Arts Integrated Complex (1515 St. Catherine West), and is open Monday to Thursday, from 9:00 to 17:00, and on Friday from 9:00 to 16:30.<b><br>
<br>
<b>Fine Arts Registration Helpline:</b>&nbsp;</b>(514) 848-2424 ext. 4612 or 4613<b><br>
<br>
<b>Office of Student Affairs:</b>&nbsp;</b>(514) 848-2424 ext. 4612 or 4613<b><br>
<br>
<b>E-mail:</b>&nbsp;</b><a href="mailto:osa@concordia.ca">osa@concordia.ca</a><b><br>
<br>
<b>Faculty Web Site:</b>&nbsp;</b><a href="http://finearts.concordia.ca/">finearts.concordia.ca</a></p>
<p><a href="http://registrar.concordia.ca/webguide/">Back to Registration Guide</a></p>

</div></div>

        var $this = $(this);

        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>
