            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Reading course listings</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>How to read course listings</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Here is an example of a course listing.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section"><div id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/registration/reading-course-listings/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="legend" alt="legend" class="cq-dd-image" src="/students/registration/reading-course-listings/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1384900900794.jpg"></div>
    
    
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/registration/reading-course-listings/jcr:content/content-main/image");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/images/registration/legend.jpg", imageTitle: "legend" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "foundation/components/image"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Key: a course listing explained</h3>
<table width="100%" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="8">
<tbody><tr><td width="100%"><table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="8">
<tbody><tr><td valign="top"><b>1</b></td>
<td valign="top"><p><b>Registration restrictions:</b>&nbsp;Certain courses have limited or no entry to students whose programs do not require the course. The level of restriction is indicated by the symbols described below.&nbsp;</p>
<p><b><i>&quot;Open&quot; spaces are subject to you meeting the required prerequisites, provided there is space available.<br>
</i></b></p>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="2">
<tbody><tr><td valign="top" width="20">&nbsp;</td>
<td valign="top"><img src="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/images/registration/whitedot.jpg" alt="White Dot" height="14" width="15"></td>
<td valign="top">All spaces open for all students.<br>
<br>
</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top" width="20">&nbsp;</td>
<td valign="top"><img src="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/images/registration/halfdot.jpg" alt="Half Dot" height="14" width="15"></td>
<td valign="top">i) Most spaces reserved for students whose programs require the course, or for students in the Faculty offering the course;<br>
<br>
ii) Remainder of spaces open to other students.<br>
<br>
</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top" width="20">&nbsp;</td>
<td valign="top"><img src="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/images/registration/blackdot.jpg" alt="Black Dot" height="14" width="15"></td>
<td valign="top">All spaces reserved for students in the Faculty offering the course, or whose programs require the course.<br>
<br>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="8">
<tbody><tr><td valign="top"><b>2</b></td>
<td valign="top"><b>Course name</b></td>
</tr></tbody></table>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="8">
<tbody><tr><td valign="top"><b>3</b></td>
<td valign="top"><b>Course number</b></td>
</tr></tbody></table>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="8">
<tbody><tr><td valign="top"><b>4</b></td>
<td valign="top"><b>Course title</b></td>
</tr></tbody></table>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="8">
<tbody><tr><td valign="top"><b>5</b></td>
<td valign="top"><b>Credit value of course</b></td>
</tr></tbody></table>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="8">
<tbody><tr><td valign="top"><b>6</b></td>
<td valign="top"><b>Prerequisite:&nbsp;</b>course or courses that must be completed or a condition that must be met before registration will be permitted.</td>
</tr></tbody></table>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="8">
<tbody><tr><td valign="top"><b>7</b></td>
<td valign="top"><b>Session:</b>&nbsp;/1 (Summer), /2 (Fall), /3 (Fall/Winter), /4 (Winter) â€” please see<b>&nbsp;<a href="/students/registration/term-dates-deadlines.html" adhocenable="false">Term Dates and Deadlines</a></b>&nbsp;for start and finish dates of courses.</td>
</tr></tbody></table>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="8">
<tbody><tr><td valign="top"><b>8</b></td>
<td valign="top"><b>Term Dates â€” summer only:</b>&nbsp;due to the variety of terms in the Summer Session, they are listed in the main body of the schedule as well as in<b>&nbsp;<a href="/students/registration/term-dates-deadlines.html" adhocenable="false">Term Dates and Deadlines</a></b>.<br>
<br>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="8">
<tbody><tr><td valign="top"><b>9</b></td>
<td valign="top"><b>Lectures, Labs, Tutorials, etc.:</b>&nbsp;Many courses have two or three section types: a primary section, normally a lecture; an associated section, such as a laboratory, tutorial, seminar, etc.<br>
<br>
The letter or number that follows the words Lec or Lab designates the campus on which the course is given. LOY Campus sections are designated with a number, e.g. 01, 02, 51, 52 while SGW Campus sections are shown with a letter, e.g. A, B, X, AA, ZZ.</td>
</tr></tbody></table>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="8">
<tbody><tr><td valign="top"><b>10</b></td>
<td valign="top"><b>Days:</b>&nbsp;The days on which a course is offered are indicated as follows:<br>
<br>
M------ Monday<br>
-T----- Tuesday<br>
--W---- Wednesday<br>
---J--- Thursday<br>
----F-- Friday<br>
-----S- Saturday<br>
------D Sunday<br>
<br>
A combination (e.g. M-W---) means that attendance is required&nbsp;<u>twice</u>&nbsp;each week on the days indicated.<br>
<br>
<b>Courses Given Alternative Weeks:</b>&nbsp;Some course sections may appear with the number (1) or (2) noted after the day. For example, M----- (1) or ---J-- (2) means that attendance is required on Monday of the&nbsp;<b>first</b>&nbsp;week of classes and every alternate Monday thereafter; or starting Thursday of the&nbsp;<b>second</b>&nbsp;week of classes and every alternate Thursday thereafter.</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top"><b>11</b></td>
<td valign="top"><b>Time at which the class meets.</b></td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top"><b>12</b></td>
<td valign="top"><b>Classroom â€” summer only:</b>&nbsp;The Summer portion of this Schedule indicates the room where the class will be held.<br>
<br>
<b>Campus designation â€” fall/winter only:&nbsp;</b>The Fall/Winter portion of this Schedule lists only the campus on which the section will be held.</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top"><b>13</b></td>
<td valign="top"><b>Note:</b>&nbsp;Special information about the course.</td>
</tr></tbody></table>
<p><table width="50%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="6">
</table>
<i>Please consult your Faculty concerning new course additions and cancellations.</i></p>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase box section">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark " style=" color: # !important;   ">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '></h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='' href='/students/registration.html'>Course registration</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/registration/advising.html'>Advising</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/registration/advising/artsandscience-advising.html'>Arts & Science advising</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/registration/advising/johnmolson-advising.html'>JMSB advising</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/registration/advising/finearts-advising.html'>Fine Arts advising</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/registration/advising/encs-advising.html'>ENCS advising</a></li></ul></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/students/registration/reading-course-listings.html'>Reading course listings</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/registration/course-withdrawals.html'>Course withdrawals</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/registration/term-dates-deadlines.html'>Term dates & deadlines</a></li></ul></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="parbase textimage">



<div class="image " id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/records/jcr:content/sidebar/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="related-office-63x50" alt="related-office-63x50" class="cq-dd-image" src="/students/records/_jcr_content/sidebar/textimage/image.img.png/1383929140531.png"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/records/jcr:content/sidebar/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/common/icons/63x50/related-office-63x50.png", imageTitle: "related\x2Doffice\x2D63x50" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><h3>Connect with us</h3>
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="/offices/registrar.html">Office of the Registrar</a></p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>
</div>
</div>


</div>



</div>

</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<section id="content-main">

    <div class="container">
    
        <div class="row with_socialbar">

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Course withdrawals</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Students who wish to withdraw from a course or courses must do so online at&nbsp;<a href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/">MyConcordia.ca</a>. When you log on to MyConcordia, find the&nbsp;MyConcordia Menu and choose Registration.</p>
<p>When you drop courses online, must make sure you confirm the transaction and/or verify their registration record to ensure that the course was properly dropped.</p>
<h3>Course withdrawal</h3>
<p>There are two different types of course withdrawal:</p>
<ol>
<li><b>DNE</b>&nbsp;(<i>Did Not Enter</i>)<br>
The DNE withdrawal has no academic or financial impact on the student and does not appear on the studentâ€™s academic record.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
<li><b>DISC</b>&nbsp;(<i>Discontinued</i>)<br>
The course as well as a DISC withdrawal notation remains on a student's academic record but does not affect the student's GPA. However, the student is financially responsible for the payment of all tuition and other fees pertaining to the course.</li>
</ol>
<p>These course withdrawal deadline dates can be found at&nbsp;<a href="/students/registration/term-dates-deadlines.html" adhocenable="false">Term Dates and Deadlines</a>.</p>
<p>See more information on&nbsp;<a href="/admissions/tuition-fees/how-fees-are-billed/undergraduate/refunds.html" adhocenable="false">undergraduate tuition refunds</a>.</p>
<hr>

<h3>Withdrawal from the university</h3>
<p>Students who wish to withdraw from the University completely must:</p>
<ol>
<li>Withdraw from their courses by the appropriate deadline&nbsp;<b>ONLINE</b>&nbsp;at&nbsp;<a href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/">MyConcordia.ca</a></li>
</ol>
<p><b>AND</b></p>
<ol start="2">
<li>After dropping the courses online, notify the Office of the Registrar in writing, by:<br>
&nbsp;<ul>
<li><b>registered letter</b> addressed to:<br>
<br>
Office of the Registrar<br>
Enrolment Services<br>
Room S-LB 700<br>
1455 De Maisonneuve Blvd. W.<br>
Montreal, Quebec, Canada<br>
H3G 1M8<br>
<br>
</li>
</ul>
<b>OR<br>
 &nbsp;</b><ul>
<li><b>send a letter by fax</b> to 514-848-2621.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<table border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="8" width="100%">
<tbody><tr><td valign="top">Students should be sure to&nbsp;<b>legibly print their full name</b>&nbsp;and include their Concordia&nbsp;<b>student ID number</b>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<b>signature</b>.</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase box section">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark " style=" color: # !important;   ">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '></h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='' href='/students/registration.html'>Course registration</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/registration/advising.html'>Advising</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/registration/advising/artsandscience-advising.html'>Arts & Science advising</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/registration/advising/johnmolson-advising.html'>JMSB advising</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/registration/advising/finearts-advising.html'>Fine Arts advising</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/registration/advising/encs-advising.html'>ENCS advising</a></li></ul></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/registration/reading-course-listings.html'>Reading course listings</a></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/students/registration/course-withdrawals.html'>Course withdrawals</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/registration/term-dates-deadlines.html'>Term dates & deadlines</a></li></ul></li></ul>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<td valign="top"><b>Cours magistral, laboratoire, tutorat, etc&nbsp;:</b>&nbsp;De nombreux cours comportent deux ou trois sortes de groupes horaires : un groupe horaire principal, qui est normalement un cours magistral, et un groupe horaire associÃ©, comme un laboratoire, un tutorat ou un sÃ©minaire, etc.<p>La lettre ou le chiffre qui suit la mention Â« Lec Â» ou Â« Lab Â» dÃ©signe le campus oÃ¹ a lieu le cours. Les groupes horaires du campus LOY sont dÃ©signÃ©s par un chiffre, par exemple 01, 02, 51, 52 tandis que ceux du campus SGW sont indiquÃ©s par une lettre : A, B, X, AA, ZZ.<br>
</p>
</td>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="8">
<tbody><tr><td valign="top"><b>10</b></td>
<td valign="top"><b>Jour :</b>&nbsp;Les jours oÃ¹ un cours a lieu sont indiquÃ©s comme suit&nbsp;:<br>
<br>
M------ Lundi<br>
-T----- Mardi<br>
--W---- Mercredi<br>
---J--- Jeudi<br>
----F-- Vendredi<br>
-----S- Samedi<br>
------D Dimanche<br>
<br>
Une combinaison (comme M-W---) signifie que le cours a lieu deux fois par semaine aux jours indiquÃ©s.<br>
<b><br>
 </b><b>Cours donnÃ©s toutes les deux semaines&nbsp;:</b>&nbsp;Certains groupes horaires sont suivis du chiffre (1) ou (2) aprÃ¨s le jour. Par exemple, M----- (1) ou ---J-- (2) signifie que le cours a lieu le lundi de la premiÃ¨re semaine de classe puis tous les lundis en quinze&nbsp;; ou qu'il commence le jeudi de la deuxiÃ¨me semaine de classe puis tous les jeudis en quinze.</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top"><b>11</b></td>

</td>

jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});

	       </div>
	    </div>
	</div>
    <div class="parbase kampyle">

$=jQuery;
$(function() {
    var check = mobilecheck();
    if (!check) {
        $("#feedback-modal").attr("href", "#modal");
        $('a[rel*=leanModal]').leanModal({top: 200, closeButton: ".modal-close"});
    }
});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                        <span class="sprites-icon-social-5" displayText="LinkedIn" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/iits/services/internet-phones.img.png/1376573238310.png'>LinkedIn</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
            </ul>   
        </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">
            jQuery(function() {  
                $ = jQuery;
                socialbar.init();
                jQuery(window).scroll(function(){
                    socialbar.scroll();
                });
    
            });
        </script></div>


            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Internet &amp; phones</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Here's how to connect to the Concordia network, either on-campus or remotely, with or without wires:</p>

</div></div>
<div class="link-list section">





    <div class="c-bloc-links class="">

        <ul class="">
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/services/internet-phones/wireless-network.html"  >Wireless network (Wi-Fi)</a></li>
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam.html"  >Eduroam network (for guests)</a></li>
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/services/internet-phones/vpn.html"  >Virtual Private Network (VPN) (Off-campus)</a></li>
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/services/internet-phones/telephone-services.html"  >Telephone Services</a></li></ul> 
</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">




</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Cheap eats</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>For students on a tight budget, there are still plenty of meal options available on both campuses. Check out our handy list below.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">On campus</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a href="http://services.csu.qc.ca/index.php?module=pagesetter&amp;func=viewpub&amp;tid=3&amp;pid=276">Loyola Luncheon</a><b>&nbsp;</b>is a free, healthy&nbsp;<b>vegetarian lunch</b> at the Hive (Student Centre, SC-115)</p>
<ul>
<li>Monday to Friday at 12:30 p.m.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<p>The&nbsp;<a adhocenable="false" href="http://www.dineoncampus.ca/concordia/?cmd=Menus" target="_blank">Zest cafeteria</a>, located on the 7th floor of the Hall building, appeals to those who have voracious appetites with meals ranging from hot entrees, pasta, stir-fry, grilled item, salad bar and soups.</p>
<ul>
<li>Open Monday to Friday from 11:30 a.m. to 2:30 p.m. and at 4:40 p.m. to 7:30 p.m.</li>
<li>Open week-ends with same hours, except brunch starts at 11:00 a.m.&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<p>The <a adhocenable="false" href="http://www.dineoncampus.ca/concordia/?cmd=Menus" target="_blank">Buzz Bistro</a>,&nbsp;located in the SP building on the Loyola Campus, is a full service cafeteria with short order favorites, salads, sandwiches, hot entrees and stir fries. Campus Centre operates an â€œall you can eat buffetâ€? for lunch and dinner and provides â€œÃ  la carteâ€? service during the day. <br>
</p>
<ul>
<li>Open Monday to Friday from 11:30 a.m. to 2:30 p.m. and at 4:30 p.m. to 7:00 p.m.</li>
<li>Open Saturday and Sunday for Brunch from 10:00 a.m. to 2:30 p.m. and for dinner from 4:30 to 7 p.m.<br>
</li>
</ul>
<p><a href="http://peoplespotato.blogspot.com/">The People's Potato</a><b>,</b> also located on the 7th floor of the Hall building, is a <b>vegan soup kitchen by donation&nbsp;</b></p>
<ul>
<li>Monday to Friday from 12:30 p.m. to 2 p.m. during term times<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<p><a href="http://www.lefrigovert.com/">Le Frigo Vert</a><b>,&nbsp;a non-profit, organic food cooperative </b>run by Concordia Student Associations,<b>&nbsp;</b>offers some of the lowest prices for organic produce and health food</p>
<ul>
<li>Open Monday to Friday from 10 a.m. to 7 p.m.</li>
<li>Concordia students are automatically co-op members. Non-members pay 20 percent more on everything in the store.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="http://chaplaincy.concordia.ca/service/">Mother Hubbard's Cupboard</a> is a weekly <b>vegan supper</b> offered by the Multi-faith Chaplaincy, located at 2090 Mackay St.&nbsp;A $2 donation is requested.&nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li>Every Thursday from 5 p.m. to 7 p.m.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Around Concordia</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li><b>Al-Taib</b>&nbsp;Serves pizza slices, salads and hot Lebanese meals. It's ideal for Concordia students looking for a quick, cheap hunger fix on 2125 Guy St.</li>
<li><b>Basha</b>&nbsp;A Montreal mecca for shawarma, falafel and shish taouk. The best is their flagship location across from the CinÃ©ma Banque Scotia, 930 Ste-Catherine W., 514-866-4272</li>
<li><b>Boustan</b>&nbsp;Delicious falafel two steps from Concordia. 2020A Crescent St., 514-843-3576</li>
<li><b>Burritoville&nbsp;</b>There is now a Bishop street location of this NDG institution that is steps from Concordia. It offers vegan-friendly, organic, Tex-Mex food for reasonable prices, and even a live show sometimes. 2055 Bishop St., 514-286-2776</li>
<li><b>Casse-Croute du Coin</b>&nbsp;Affectionately known as Moeâ€™s, this spot on de Maisonneuve Blvd. behind the old Forum is a staple for students looking to get their grease quota between classes or post-party. All day breakfast and the usual fare, open until the wee hours. Not listed, but donâ€™t fear, it ainâ€™t going anywhere.</li>
<li><b>Soup and Noodles</b>&nbsp;A favourite spot for Chinese comestibles, so expect a small horde eager to enjoy the generous portions, low prices and excellent service even during peak feeding hours. 1871 Ste. Catherine St. W., 514-933-0531</li>
<li><b>Restaurant Cuisine Bangkok</b>&nbsp;A family-run joint with excellent Thai food and incredibly low prices. Convenient for Concordia students. Itâ€™s in the Faubourg food court on 1616 Ste. Catherine St. W., 514-935-2178</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase picker section">






<div class="c-bloc-relatedlinks bloc">
            <h2 class="section-header">Related Links</h2>
		    <ul>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Guide to First Year</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Please note that this publication is for undergraduate students who received an Offer of Admission. Graduate Students, please refer to the <a href="/academics/graduate/handbooks.html" adhocenable="false">Graduate Students Handbook</a>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>Welcome to Concordia</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image right" id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/new/first-year-guide/jcr:content/content-main/textimage" style="width:220px;"><a href="/content/dam/concordia/docs/GuideFirstYear.pdf"><img title="gtfy" alt="gtfy" class="cq-dd-image" src="/students/new/first-year-guide/_jcr_content/content-main/textimage/image.img.jpg/1375891375140.jpg"></a><small>Download the full PDF guide</small></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/new/first-year-guide/jcr:content/content-main/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/content/dam/concordia/docs/GuideFirstYear.pdf", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/academics/gtfy.jpg", imageTitle: "gtfy" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><p>Congratulations and welcome to the next chapter in your life as a university student! You are about to embark on an exciting journey and we are thrilled that you are considering Concordia. Our university offers a full and lasting educational experience, unique to each and every student. You are encouraged to forge your own path through our numerous programs and extracurricular opportunities in order to enhance your education and achieve your life goals.</p>
<p>This Guide to First Year will help you navigate through the next steps to becoming a Concordia student, right from the moment you receive your Offer of Admission. Use the handy checklist to simplify all the important tasks to take care of before beginning your classes. Please take your time and read this Guide thoroughly to get prepared and start your time at Concordia on the right track!</p>
<p>Once again, congratulations and we look forward to seeing you on campus!</p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">After you receive your offer of admission</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Follow these 8 simple steps to becoming a Concordia student:</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">

                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation_0">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">    
        





<div class="breadcrumb breadcrumbs">

                    Home
                </a>

                    Students
                </a>

                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Orientation</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase image section"><div id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/orientation/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="role-based-prospective-students" alt="role-based-prospective-students" class="cq-dd-image" src="/students/orientation/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1375808797198.jpg"></div>
    
    
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/orientation/jcr:content/content-main/image");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/images/homepage/role-based-prospective-students.jpg", imageTitle: "role\x2Dbased\x2Dprospective\x2Dstudents" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "foundation/components/image"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h2>Start first-year on the right foot</h2>
<p>Arriving at Concordia for the first time? Welcome! Our orientation programs will get you acquainted with the Concordia community and help you thrive as a student.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Take a look at what's on offer and attend the orientations that suit you best:</p>
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="#academic">Academic/classroom skills</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="#university-services">University services</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="#students-with-disabilities">Orientation for students with disabilities</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="#international-students">International student orientation</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="#graduate-students">Graduate student orientation</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h4><a name="academic"></a>Academic orientation</h4>
<p>Academic orientation programs will improve your&nbsp;<b>study habits</b>&nbsp;during your first year as an undergraduate student.&nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="http://cdev.concordia.ca/workshops-and-events/orientations/start-right/">Start Right Program</a>.&nbsp;Get tips and strategies to meet the challenges of university-level work.</li>
<li><a href="http://cdev.concordia.ca/workshops-and-events/orientations/student-success-checkup/">Student Success Check-Up</a>. Receive a one-on-one&nbsp;consultation with an educational counsellor.&nbsp;</li>
<li>Be sure to check your&nbsp;<a href="/academics/units.html">own program or department</a>&nbsp;to see if they have specific orientations.&nbsp;<br>
</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h4><img src="http://cms-prod-auth1.concordia.ca:4502/libs/cq/ui/resources/0.gif"><a name="university-services"></a>University orientation&nbsp;</h4>
<p>Two main orientation programs<b>&nbsp;</b>will&nbsp;introduce you to Concordia services to support a successful student life on and off campus:&nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="http://cdev.concordia.ca/workshops-and-events/orientations/discover-concordia/">Discover Concordia orientation sessions</a>.&nbsp;Meet student leaders, senior administrators and current students who will&nbsp;<b>give you the inside track&nbsp;</b>on the many resources available to you<br>
&nbsp;</li>
<li><a href="http://cdev.concordia.ca/workshops-and-events/orientations/mentor-tour-n-talk/">Mentor connection tour n' talk</a>.&nbsp;Let upper-year students share knowledge and experience on a one-hour&nbsp;<b>campus tour</b><br>
<br>
</li>
<li>While you're at it, talk with the&nbsp;<a href="#">Front-Line Administrative Service (FAST)</a>&nbsp;team. They'll help you quickly&nbsp;<b>navigate fees, forms, deadlines</b>&nbsp;and other administrative procedures. You'll find them parked in front of the Birks Student Service Centre in the J.W. McConnell Building.&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h4><a name="students-with-disabilities"></a>Orientation for students with disabilities</h4>
<ul>
<li><a href="http://supportservices.concordia.ca/disabilities/">Access Centre for Students with Disabilities orientations</a>.&nbsp;These are tailored to help you succeed!<br>
</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h4><a name="international-students"></a>International student orientation</h4>
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="#">International Students Office information sessions</a>. Get oriented if you're new to campus and to Canada.<br>
</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h4><a name="graduate-students"></a>Graduate student orientation</h4>
<p>Concordia offers orientation sessions designed specifically for graduate students (M.A., Ph.D., Graduate Certificate and Graduate Diploma programs) including those studying full-time, part-time, or as independent graduate student.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="http://cdev.concordia.ca/workshops-and-events/orientations/graduate-students-orientation/">Graduate students orientation</a>.&nbsp;Network with faculty and fellow graduate students, and get introduced to relevant campus resources.</li>
<li><a href="http://cdev.concordia.ca/workshops-and-events/workshops/graduate-experience/">Graduate experience seminars</a>.&nbsp;Pick up useful professional development strategies and tactics at topical seminars &nbsp;</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase target section">








<div class="mboxDefault" id="content-concordia-en-students-orientation-sidebar-picker">
    
</div>


<script type="text/javascript">
	var mboxId = 'content-concordia-en-students-orientation-sidebar-picker';
	var mboxName = 'content-concordia-en-students-orientation-sidebar-picker';
	var mboxLocation = '/content/concordia/en/students/orientation/jcr:content/sidebar/picker';
	var wcmMode = 'DISABLED';

	if ( typeof mboxDefine == 'function' && wcmMode !== 'ANALYTICS' ) {
		var callParameters = [ mboxId ];
		var callFunction;
		var replaced = false;
	
		
				callFunction = mboxCreate;
		
		
		
		var staticParameters = {};
		
		for ( var key in staticParameters )
			callParameters.push(key  + '=' + staticParameters[key]);
		
		if ( !replaced ) { // do not define the same mbox twice, this leads to additional JS calls
			callFunction.apply(undefined, callParameters);
		}
		
		
		
		if ( callFunction == mboxDefine ) {
		    
		    // if the campaign store is available at this time we are most likely simulating
		    // so trigger an update if the (auto) campaign is selected
            var campaignStore = ClientContext.get("campaign");
            if ( campaignStore && !campaignStore.isCampaignSelected() ) {
                CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.triggerUpdate();
            }
    		
    		// wait for 2 seconds for the T&T answer to come in to prevent page flicker issues
    		// also see the overlay of mbox.protoype.setOffer which completes this
    		setTimeout(function() {
    		    CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.showDefaultMboxContent(mboxId, mboxName);
    		}, 2000);
		}
	}
	
	
		
</script>
</div>

jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Eduroam</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Concordia University is a member of <a href="http://www.eduroam.org/">eduroam </a>(<b>edu</b>cation <b>roam</b>ing), a service that allows member institutions from the <img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/eduroam.png" style="float: right;">international research and academic community to securely access wireless services at other participating institutions using their â€œhomeâ€? credentials.</p>
<p>Concordia University students, faculty and staff can use their Netname and Netname Passwords at universities such as McGill, UniversitÃ© de Montreal, and University of Toronto to log on to the wireless service. A complete list of participating institutions is available at <a href="http://www.eduroam.org/">eduroam.org</a>.</p>
<p>Similarly, students, faculty and staff visiting from other member institutions will be able to use Concordiaâ€™s wireless service using the credentials issued by their institution.</p>
<p>The setup requirements to access a particular institutionâ€™s eduroam service vary. Concordia University members need to consult the set-up instructions published at the institution they are visiting. Visitors to Concordia need to follow these <a href="/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam.html#setup" adhocenable="false">setup instructions.</a></p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Concordia University students">
					
                    Concordia University students
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><p>Concordia end-users can access eduroam at any participating member sites (including most satellite campuses that provide wireless access) in the following areas (consult <a href="http://www.eduroam.org"><b>eduroam.org</b></a><b> </b>for a complete list):</p>
<ul>
<li>Canada</li>
<li>Europe</li>
<li>Australia</li>
<li>Asia Pacific</li>
</ul>
<p>Students, faculty and staff should test their credentials before visiting another institution. Please follow the instructions below to configure your device to perform this test.</p>
<p><i><b>Important:</b> When compared to the university's production wireless service, the eduroam service is designed for relatively light usage. When performing your test, set the <b>eduroam</b> SSID to connect ahead of the <b>ConcordiaUniversity</b> SSID. After testing is complete, the <b>ConcordiaUniversity</b> SSID should be set to connect before the <b>eduroam</b> SSID.</i></p>
<p>When testing the Concordia Eduroam, Concordia students, faculty and staff will need to connect using <b>yournetname@concordia.ca </b></p>
</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Visitors to Concordia University">
					
                    Visitors to Concordia University
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>Visit <a href="http://www.eduroam.org">eduroam.org</a> to find out whether or not your institution is a member of the eduroam collaborative network. The eduroam service is accessible anywhere that wireless service is available at Concordia. This service is available 24x7, except during scheduled and unscheduled maintenance.</p>
<p>When connecting to the Concordia Eduroam network, you must log in with the following username:</p>
<p><b>yournetname@youruniversity.ca</b></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="setup"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Setup instructions for eduroam users visiting Concordia">
					
                    Setup instructions for eduroam users visiting Concordia
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li><a href="/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows7.html" adhocenable="false">Windows 7</a></li>
<li><a href="/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows-vista.html" adhocenable="false">Windows Vista</a></li>
<li><a href="/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows-xp.html" adhocenable="false">Windows XP</a></li>
<li><a href="/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/mac-osx.html" adhocenable="false">Mac OSX</a></li>
<li><a href="/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/apple.html" adhocenable="false">iPhone, iPad &amp; iPod Touch</a></li>
</ul>
<p>The following information is provided in order to help those who have devices for which there are no specific setup instructions.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   horizontalLines verticalLines table-striped">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><td>SSID:</td>
<td>eduroam</td>
</tr><tr><td>Authentication:</td>
<td>WPA2 or WPA (WPA2 is preferred)</td>
</tr><tr><td>Encryption:</td>
<td>AES or TKIP<br>
AES is preferred with WPA2 Authentication<br>
TKIP is preferred with WPA Authentication</td>
</tr><tr><td>802.1x/EAP Type:</td>
<td>Same as your institute (Example: PEAP)</td>
</tr><tr><td>Authentication Method:</td>
<td>Same as your institute (Example: MS-CHAP V2)</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Note: Not all participating Eduroam institutions are using PEAP with MS-CHAP V2 authentication. Please confirm the 802.1x/EAP Type and Authentication Method with your institutions IT support.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="box_0 parbase box">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark " style=" color: # !important;   ">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '></h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Networking services</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="link-list section">





    <div class="c-bloc-links class="">

        <ul class="">
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam.html"  >Eduroam</a></li>
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/services/internet-phones/vpn.html"  >Virtual Private Network (VPN) Service</a></li>
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/services/internet-phones/wireless-network.html"  >Wireless Network</a></li></ul> 
</div></div>


</div>



</div>

</div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>

                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/iits/about-iits/departments.html">Departments</a>
				            </li>
                    </ul> 
	            </li>
        </ul>
	</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Concordia Virtual Private Network (VPN)</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Concordia University's Virtual Private Network (VPN) service allows off-site Concordia University students access to services restricted to computers registered with Concordia IP addresses such as:</p>
<ul>
<li>Library databases</li>
<li>Exchange/IMAP/POP access to Concordia University Microsoft Exchange Server</li>
<li>Special access to systems for computer system administrators</li>
</ul>
<p>For example, if you want to access any of the above services from home and you have a subscription to an ISP such as Bell Sympatico or Videotron then you will need to use the Concordia University VPN service.</p>
<p>The Concordia University VPN service is solely for academic or work related use. While using the VPN service, your computer becomes part of the university network and is subject to Concordia University's <a href="http://web2.concordia.ca/Legal_Counsel/policies/english/VRS/VRS-30.html">Policy on Computing Facilities</a>. It is important to note that file-sharing and peer-to-peer applications, such as Kazaa, Gnutella, and BitTorrent are forbidden on the Concordia network. Use of these types of programs may result in immediate suspension of your VPN account. Please ensure that these applications are not running prior to connecting to the Concordia VPN service.</p>
<p><b>Note:</b> During an active VPN session, <i>all</i> of your internet traffic is routed through Concordia University's network. This will result in lower response times when accessing non-Concordia internet resources. Some internet resources will not be available at all because they are blocked at Concordia University's gateway. <b>Please disconnect your VPN session if you are not using Concordia University services.</b></p>
<p>What you need in order to use the Concordia University VPN service:&nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li>An active <a href="/content/concordia/en/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/#netname" adhocenable="false">NetName</a> account.</li>
<li>Cisco VPN Client software installed and configured on your computer.</li>
</ul>
<h3>VPN Software Client Downloads and Configuration</h3>
<p>Click on the link which corresponds to your operating system to download and configure the installation software.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/docs/IITS/VPN/VPN_AnyConnect_Windows_v2.pdf" adhocenable="false">Windows</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/docs/IITS/VPN/VPN_AnyConnect_MAC_v2.pdf" adhocenable="false">Mac OS X</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/docs/IITS/VPN/VPN_AnyConnect_Linux_v2.pdf" adhocenable="false">Linux</a></li>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/docs/IITS/VPN/AnyConnectFAQ_v2.pdf" adhocenable="false">Cisco â€˜AnyConnectâ€™ FAQ</a></li>
</ul>
<h3>Support</h3>
<p>Please do not hesitate to contact the IITS Service Desk at 514-848-2424 ext. 7613 or by email at&nbsp;<a href="mailto:help@concordia.ca">help@concordia.ca</a></p>
<p>The Service Desk will require the following information:</p>
<ul>
<li>Netname</li>
<li>Description of the error. (If possible, include a screenshot.)</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="box_0 parbase box">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark " style=" color: # !important;   ">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '></h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="title section">

</div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="page-header parbase section"> 






<div class="c-intro row">
    <h1 class="span8 section-header">New students</h1>

    
    <div class="span8">
        <p>Congratulations and <b>welcome to Concordia!</b> Starting your new life as a university student is an exciting time and we want to make your transition as smooth and as fun as possible.</p>

    </div>
	<div class="span4">
                        <a class="btn btn-block btn-large bg-light-grey" href="http://cdev.concordia.ca/our-services/services-for-new-students/first-year-survival-guides/">
                    
                    First Year Survival Guides
                    </a>
                        <a class="btn btn-block btn-large bg-light-grey" href="/students/new/orientation-frosh.html">
                    
                    Frosh events
                    </a></div>
</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">First year?  Start here.</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt2"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt2-c0 span3 paddingRight rightSeparator "><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ol>
<li>Read the&nbsp;<a href="/students/new/first-year-guide.html">Guide to First Year</a></li>
<li>Join our&nbsp;<a adhocenable="false" href="http://www.facebook.com/YourConcordia2013.2014" target="_blank">Facebook group</a>&nbsp;for&nbsp;new students</li>
<li>Check out the links below to start your Concordia life off the right foot<p>&nbsp;</p>
</li>
</ol>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt2-c1 span9"><div class="parbase image section"><div id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/new/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="frosh" alt="frosh" class="cq-dd-image" src="/students/new/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1375562106857.jpg"></div>
    
    
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/new/jcr:content/content-main/image");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/images/students/frosh.jpg", imageTitle: "frosh" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "foundation/components/image"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>Frosh</h2>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/new/orientation-frosh/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="tastesofConcordia" alt="tastesofConcordia" class="cq-dd-image" src="/students/new/orientation-frosh/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1375095648842.jpg"></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h4>Frosh events</h4>
<p>Each of the four faculties holds their own Frosh events at the start of the Fall term. <i>Frosh</i>, a word typically used for a freshly admitted first-year student, is also used to describe a series of activities. At Concordia, Frosh is a great way to meet other students and make friends before getting into the swing of the school year. Some of the events may have small signup fees, which are always affordable for the student on a budget.</p>
<h3>Frosh for all students</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="http://csu.qc.ca/" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Concordia Student Union (CSU) events for ALL undergraduate students<br>
 <br>
</a></li>
</ul>
<h3>Frosh by faculty</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="http://www.asfa.ca/" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Arts &amp; Science Federation of Student Associations (ASFA)</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.casajmsb.ca/" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">CASA-JMSB (Commerce &amp; Administration Students' Association)</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ecaconcordia.ca/" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Engineering &amp; Computer Science Association (ECA)</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="http://www.fasaconcordia.com/" target="_blank">Fine Arts Student Alliance (FASA)</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/new/first-year-guide.html'>Guide to First Year</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/new/first-year-guide/1-portal.html'>1. </div>

jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<section id="content-main">

    <div class="container">
    
        <div class="row with_socialbar">

            <div class="share-this">












	<script type="text/javascript">var switchTo5x=true;</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">

            publisher: "864f3db6-11cb-4e7b-9c5f-0a8a836ac323",

        <div class="c-socialbar-cta">
            <ul>
                <li>
                    <a href="javascript:window.print();" title="Print">
                        <span class="sprites-icon-print-fushia">Print</span>

                </li>
            </ul>

                <li>

            jQuery(function() {  
                $ = jQuery;
                socialbar.init();
                jQuery(window).scroll(function(){
                    socialbar.scroll();
                });
    
            });
        </script></div>


            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Eduroam Wireless Configuration for Windows 7</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h2>Requirements</h2>
<ul>
<li>Fully updated operating system.</li>
<li>Make certain your wireless card is enabled and that the antenna isn't turned off if it's built in. Consult the hardware documentation if need be.</li>
<li>You need to be logged into Windows using an account with Administrative privileges.</li>
<li>You may need to clear your computer's cache.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 1">
					
                    Step 1
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li>Go to <b>Start</b> &gt; <b>Control Panel</b> &gt; <b>View Network Status and Tasks</b>. If you are using the classic Control Panel view, click on <b>Network and Sharing Center</b>.</li>
<li>Click <b>Manage wireless networks</b> (at the left hand side of the window).</li>
<li>Click <b>Add</b>.</li>
<li>Click <b>Manually connect to a wireless network</b>.</li>
<li>Click <b>Manually create a network profile</b> to continue.</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows7/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel/parsys-accordion/image"><img title="eduroam-win7-step1" alt="eduroam-win7-step1" class="cq-dd-image" src="/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows7/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel/parsys-accordion/image.img.jpg/1380567273082.jpg"></div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 2">
					
                    Step 2
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li>On the <b>Manually connect to a wireless network</b> page, enter the following:</li>
<li>Network Name:<b> eduroam</b></li>
<li>Select Security type<b> WPA2-Enterprise</b> with <b>Encryption type AES</b>, or select Security type<b> WPA</b> with Encryption type <b>TKIP</b>.</li>
<li>Check option: <b>Start this connection automatically </b></li>
<li>Check option: <b>Connect even if the network is not broadcasting</b>.</li>
<li>Click <b>Next</b>.</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows7/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image"><img title="eduroam-win7-step2" alt="eduroam-win7-step2" class="cq-dd-image" src="/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows7/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image.img.jpg/1380567306000.jpg"></div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 3">
					
                    Step 3
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li>Click <b>Change connection settings</b>.</li>
<li>Click the <b>Security</b> tab.</li>
<li>Select <b>Security type WPA2-Enterprise</b> with <b>Encryption type AES</b>, or select Security type<b> WPA</b> with Encryption type<b> TKIP</b>.</li>
<li>Select <b>Microsoft: Protected EAP (PEAP)</b> as the network authentication method.</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows7/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_1/parsys-accordion/image"><img title="eduroam-win7-step3" alt="eduroam-win7-step3" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows7/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_1/parsys-accordion/image.img.gif/1380567336250.gif"></div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 4">
					
                    Step 4
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_2" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Click <b>Settings</b>.</li>
<li>Uncheck <b>Validate server certificate</b> box.</li>
<li>Choose <b>Secured password (EAP-MSCHAP v2</b> as <b>Select Authentication Method</b>.</li>
<li>Check <b>Enable Fast Reconnect</b> box and uncheck the other boxes:</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows7/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_2/parsys-accordion/image"><img title="eduroam-win7-step4" alt="eduroam-win7-step4" class="cq-dd-image" src="/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows7/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_2/parsys-accordion/image.img.jpg/1380567363490.jpg"></div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 5">
					
                    Step 5
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_3" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Click <b>Configure</b>.</li>
<li>Uncheck <b>Automatically use my Windows logon name and password (and domain if any)</b> box.</li>
<li>Click <b>OK</b> until you close all the configuration dialog windows.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows7/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_3/parsys-accordion/image"><img title="eduroam-win7-step5" alt="eduroam-win7-step5" class="cq-dd-image" src="/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows7/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_3/parsys-accordion/image.img.jpg/1380567411478.jpg"></div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 6">
					
                    Step 6
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_4" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Wait until you see the message below. <b>Click</b> <b>on it</b>:</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows7/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_4/parsys-accordion/image"><img title="eduroam-win7-step6" alt="eduroam-win7-step6" class="cq-dd-image" src="/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows7/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_4/parsys-accordion/image.img.png/1380567463149.png"></div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 7">
					
                    Step 7
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_5" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>In the Network Authentication window, enter your username as Netname@concordia.ca and your MyConcordia portal password.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows7/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_5/parsys-accordion/image"><img title="eduroam-win7-step7" alt="eduroam-win7-step7" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows7/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_5/parsys-accordion/image.img.gif/1380567494398.gif"></div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 8">
					
                    Step 8
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_6" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Click on the wireless icon in your tray (at the bottom right) of your desktop, and you should see the following, confirming that you are connected.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows7/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_6/parsys-accordion/image"><img title="eduroam-win7-step8" alt="eduroam-win7-step8" class="cq-dd-image" src="/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows7/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_6/parsys-accordion/image.img.jpg/1380567563526.jpg"></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>Note:</b> Concordia users should always keep the network profile â€œConcordiaUniversityâ€? as the first priority profile because the eduroam network has limitations for some internal services.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>To change the profile priority:</p>
<ul>
<li>Go to <b>Start</b> &gt; <b>Control</b><b>Panel</b> &gt; <b>Open</b> <b>Network</b> <b>and</b> <b>Sharing</b> <b>Center.</b></li>
<li>Click <b>Manage wireless networks</b> (on the left-hand side of the window).</li>
<li>Select the profile â€œ<b>ConcordiaUniversity</b>â€?, and click the button â€œMove upâ€? to the first profile location (as shown below):</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows7/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_6/parsys-accordion/image_0"><img title="eduroam-win7-step8a" alt="eduroam-win7-step8a" class="cq-dd-image" src="/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows7/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_6/parsys-accordion/image_0.img.jpg/1380567572137.jpg"></div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Networking services</h3>
<ul>
<li>Eduroam</li>
<li>High Speed Networking</li>
<li>Virtual Private Network (VPN) Service</li>
<li>Wireless Network</li>
<li>IP address setup</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>
