<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>MyConcordia Portal</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="portalheader" alt="portalheader" class="cq-dd-image" src="/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1375093606614.jpg"></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>MyConcordia portal is a secure, self-serviced, central web point that provides content and services to its users based on their relationship with the university.</p>
<p><b>Students</b> can access their personalized class schedule, course registration, online fee payment, exam schedule, student record, book list, and more.</p>
<p><i>Note: Undergraduate students can also log into the <a href="/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/mobile.html" adhocenable="false">MyConcordia mobile web registration page</a> to access their class schedule, grades, and web registration.</i></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="netname"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open How to activate your MyConcordia portal netname">
					
                    How to activate your MyConcordia portal netname
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Visit: <a href="http://myconcordia.ca">myconcordia.ca</a></li>
<li>Click the 'activate' link above the &quot;Netname&quot; field at the top</li>
<li>Select your account type (student)</li>
<li>Fill out the required information to complete the activation process</li>
</ul>
<ul>
<li><b>Students: </b>Your netname will have an underscore in it.</li>
</ul>
<p>After filling out the required information, visit <a href="http://myconcordia.ca">myconcordia.ca</a> to log in with your new netname and password. Your password is case sensitive and must be typed exactly as displayed.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="reset"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open How to reset your MyConcordia portal password">
					
                    How to reset your MyConcordia portal password
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Visit: <a href="http://myconcordia.ca">myconcordia.ca</a></li>
<li>Click the 'forgot' link above the &quot;Password&quot; field at the top</li>
<li>Select your account type (student)</li>
<li>Fill out the required information. An email will be sent to the email address listed in your student account. Click on the URL provided in the email to create a new MyConcordia password.</li>
</ul>
<p>After filling out the required information, visit <a href="http://myconcordia.ca">myconcordia.ca</a> to log in with your new netname and password. Your password is case sensitive and must be typed exactly as displayed.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Common MyConcordia activation problems">
					
                    Common MyConcordia activation problems
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h5>You do not know your ID number</h5>
<ul>
<li>Visit the IITS Service Desk in person (<a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/sgw-campus.html">H925</a> or <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/loyola-campus.html">CC207</a>) for support. Out-of-town students must contact the Office of the Registrar at 514-848-2424 ext. 2668.</li>
</ul>
<h5>The system is not accepting your personal information (ex. ID, date of birth, postal code)</h5>
<ul>
<li>Please verify your personal student information with the Office of the Registrar at 514-848-2424 ext. 2668</li>
</ul>
<h5>You do not have access to the email address that the system is emailing the reset procedure to (students)</h5>
<ul>
<li>Contact the IITS Service Desk in person (H925 or CC207) for support.</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">FAQ</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Netnames and passwords">
					
                    Netnames and passwords
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_2" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>How do I create my netname and password for MyConcordia?</b><br>
For instructions on activating your netname and password please see <a href="/content/concordia/en/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/#netname" adhocenable="false">How to activate your MyConcordia portal netname</a>.</p>
<p><b>I don't know my student ID number. How can I obtain it?</b><br>
Your student ID can be found on your ID card, your admissions e-mail, as well as on any official documents you may have received from Concordia. It is required to activate your MyConcordia portal. If you have lost/forgotten your student ID number you will need to visit the Birks Student Service Centre in LB 185 (1440 de Maisonneuve blvd.) with photo ID. IITS is unable to give out personal student information via phone or e-mail.</p>
<p><b>Why is the MyConcordia portal not accepting my personal information?</b><br>
If you are trying to activate your netname, or reset your password, and the system is not accepting your information, you will have to verify your personal student information with the Office of the Registrar by calling 514-848-2424 ext. 2668.</p>
<p><b>How do I reset the password for my portal?</b><br>
See <a href="/content/concordia/en/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/#reset" adhocenable="false">How to reset your MyConcordia portal password</a></p>
<p><b>How can I change my netname?</b><br>
Unfortunately, netnames cannot be changed. They are automatically computer generated upon acceptance to Concordia.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open MyConcordia features">
					
                    MyConcordia features
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_3" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image right" id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_3/parsys-accordion/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="faq4" alt="faq4" class="cq-dd-image" src="/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_3/parsys-accordion/textimage/image.img.jpg/1375093604103.jpg"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_3/parsys-accordion/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/faq4.jpg", imageTitle: "faq4" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><p><b>How do I start registering for courses?</b><br>
After receiving academic advising from your department, you may start registering for courses by selecting the Registration option in your MyConcordia portal.</p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>Why canâ€™t I drop a course?</b><br>
You should be able to add or drop courses until the date posted on the <a href="http://registrar.concordia.ca/calendar/">academic calendar</a>.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><b>Why canâ€™t I view â€˜My Class Scheduleâ€™?</b></p>
<p>To consult your class schedule, simply click on My Class Schedule to view another menu:<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/faq2.jpg" style="float: right;"></p>
<p><img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/faq1.jpg" style="float: left;"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>How can I access my course websites?</b><br>
Class websites are available via Moodle, as of the first day of classes.</p>
<p><b>Why haven't my grades been posted yet?</b><br>
Although your professor may have stated that he/she submitted your grade, the process is quite lengthy as each grade must be approved by the department chair. Please contact your department directly to verify why your grades have not been posted.</p>
<p><b>How can I change my e-mail address in the MyConcordia portal?</b><br>
To ensure you receive important information from Concordia, please enter your e-mail address in your MyConcordia portal. Correspondence from Professors (and Moodle), Administrators and other Concordia departments will be sent to this e-mail address.</p>
<ul>
<li><b>Students:</b> Your e-mail address should be set in the Academic &gt; Change My E-Mail Address section of the portal.</li>
<li><b>Employees:</b> Your e-mail address should be set in the Employee Self Service &gt; MyHR Profile section of the portal.<ul>
<li>The full path is: Employee Self Service &gt; MyHR Profile &gt; my empath &gt; personal &gt; contacts &gt; phone and email.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p><b>What is a Permanent Code, and how do I obtain one?</b><br>
The purpose of the permanent code is to individually identify students in the Quebec education system. It is a 12 character significant code that consists of the first 3 letters of the family name, the first letter of the given name, the date of birth (day, month [the female gender is identified by adding 50], year) and 2 validation numbers as determined by the ministÃ¨re de lâ€™Ã‰ducation, du Loisir et du Sport. The number 62 is added to the day of birth of all students born after 1999. Students who do not provide a valid permanent code or acceptable documents to create one by the deadline date will be billed a permanent code surcharge. For additional Permanent Code questions, please write to: <a href="mailto:codeperm@alcor.concordia.ca">codeperm@alcor.concordia.ca</a></p>
<p><b>What is the Quebec Residency form for?</b><br>
For information and forms related to Quebec Ministry of Education Requirements (Quebec Provincial Residency). If you have additional questions regarding Quebec Provincial Residency please write to&nbsp;<a href="mailto:quebec.residency@concordia.ca">quebec.residency@concordia.ca</a>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image right" id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_3/parsys-accordion/textimage_0" style="width:auto;"><img title="faq3" alt="faq3" class="cq-dd-image" src="/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_3/parsys-accordion/textimage_0/image.img.jpg/1375093604009.jpg"></div>

        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><p><b>How do I access the application centre in the MyConcordia portal?</b><br>
Once logged into your MyConcordia portal, select Application Center from the left menu.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open MyConcordia Errors">
					
                    MyConcordia Errors
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_4" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><p><b>My name is spelled incorrectly in MyConcordia. <br>
How can I change it?</b><br>
To correct your personal information please contact the Office of the Registrar at 514-848-2424 ext. 2668.</p>
<p><b>I'm getting a weird error in the portal, what do I do?</b><br>
If you experience an unknown error in the portal, please copy and paste the full error into the following webform.</p>
<p><b>I'm not able to access the portal through my browser. What browsers are compatible?</b><br>
View a list of compatible browsers.</p>
</p>

</div></div>

<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Troubleshooting - Login Problems</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open 'Your User ID and/or Password are invalid.'">
					
                    'Your User ID and/or Password are invalid.'
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_5" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you receive an error that your netname or password is invalid, please note the following:</p>
<ul>
<li>Your netname should be entered in lower-case. If you are a student, it will include an underscore (_).</li>
<li>MyConcordia Portal passwords are <b>case sensitive</b>. There is a difference between uppercase characters and lowercase characters.</li>
</ul>
<p>If you continue to experience difficulties, please reset your credentials. To do so:</p>
<ul>
<li>Visit <a href="http://myconcordia.ca">myconcordia.ca</a></li>
<li>Next to Password click on <a href="https://fcms.concordia.ca/netname/net01.asp">(forgot?)</a></li>
<li>You will be asked to enter information so we may verify your identity.</li>
<li>The following page will ask you to answer a secret question* for further verification and to receive a new password.</li>
<li>Once completed, you may access the portal page once more and log in with your new username and password.</li>
</ul>
<p>* If you are unable to answer your secret question you will have to come in person to an IITS Service Desk (<a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/sgw-campus.html">H925</a> or <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/loyola-campus.html">CC206</a>). IITS is unable to reset passwords via e-mail or phone.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Problems caused by web-browsers">
					
                    Problems caused by web-browsers
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_6" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><p>Note: You must be using a supported browser to access the MyConcordia portal.</p>
<p>If you are experiencing difficulty logging in to the portal, your internet browser may be the problem. Internet browsers often save information (such as passwords and copies of previously visited web pages) in order to load pages more quickly. Please try clearing your browser's cache and cookies and then try logging into MyConcordia once more. If you are unfamiliar with this procedure, see our web browser information page for instructions.</p>
</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Support">
					
                    Support
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_7" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3>Students</h3>
<ul>
<li>FAQs</li>
<li><b>Webform:</b> Submit a support request via webform</li>
<li><b>Phone:</b> 514-848-2424 ext. 7613</li>
<li><b>E-mail:</b> <a href="mailto:help@concordia.ca">help@concordia.ca</a></li>
</ul>
<p><b>Note:</b> IITS is unable to provide assistance for non-technical registration issues (ex. pre-requisites, advising requirements, full courses, etc.) These issues are handled by the Office of the Registrar: 514-848-2424 ext. 2668</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Eduroam Wireless Configuration for Windows XP</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h2>Requirements</h2>
<ul>
<li>Microsoft Windows users will need to download the latest Service Pack and updates for their operating system. To do so simply click <a href="http://update.microsoft.com/microsoftupdate/v6/default.aspx?ln=en-us">here</a> and select 'Express Updates'.</li>
<li>Make certain your wireless card is enabled, and that the antenna isn't turned off if it's built in. Consult the hardware documentation if need be.</li>
<li>You need to be logged into Windows using an account with Administrative privileges.</li>
<li>You may need to clear your computer's cache.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 1">
					
                    Step 1
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><ul>
<li>Go to Start &gt; <b>Control</b> <b>Panel</b> &gt; <b>Network</b> <b>and</b> <b>Internet</b> <b>Connection</b> &gt; <b>Network</b> <b>connections</b>.</li>
<li>Right click <b>Wireless</b> <b>Network</b> <b>Connection</b>.</li>
<li>Click <b>Properties</b>.</li>
</ul>
</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 2">
					
                    Step 2
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><ul>
<li>Select the Wireless <b>Networks</b> tab.</li>
<li>Click <b>Add</b>â€¦</li>
</ul>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/step2.png"></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 3">
					
                    Step 3
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><ul>
<li>Use these settings in the Wireless network properties window:</li>
<li>Network name (SSID): <b>eduroam</b></li>
<li>Network Authentication: <b>WPA2 or WPA</b></li>
<li>Data encryption: <b>AES or TKIP</b></li>
</ul>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/properties.png"></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 4">
					
                    Step 4
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_2" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><ul>
<li>Click the Authentication tab.</li>
<li>Select <b>Protected</b> <b>EAP (PEAP)</b> in the <b>EAP type list</b>.</li>
<li>Uncheck all boxes.</li>
<li>Click <b>Properties</b></li>
</ul>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/properties-2.png"></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 5">
					
                    Step 5
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_3" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><ul>
<li>Uncheck the Validate <b>server</b> <b>certificate</b> box.</li>
<li>Choose <b>Secured</b> <b>password</b> <b>(EAP-MSCHAP v2) </b>as <b>Select</b> <b>Authentication</b> <b>Method</b>.</li>
<li>Check the <b>Enable</b> <b>Fast</b> <b>Reconnect</b> box. Uncheck other boxes:</li>
</ul>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/step5.png"></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 6">
					
                    Step 6
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_4" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><ul>
<li>Click <b>Configure</b> and uncheck the <b>Automatically use my Windows logon name and password (and domain if any)</b> box.</li>
<li>Click <b>OK</b> to close the <b>EAP MSCHAPv2 Properties</b>.</li>
</ul>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/step6.png"></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 7">
					
                    Step 7
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_5" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><ul>
<li>Click <b>OK</b> until all the windows are closed.</li>
<li>Click the pop-up box when it appears in the right-bottom window.</li>
</ul>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/connected.png"></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 8">
					
                    Step 8
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_6" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><ul>
<li>In the <b>Enter Credentials</b> window, enter the User name as <b>Netname@concordia.ca</b> and enter your MyConcordia portal password. Leave the <b>Logon</b> <b>domain</b> field blank.</li>
</ul>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/netname-at-concordia.png"></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 8">
					
                    Step 8
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_7" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><ul>
<li>You will see the following message:</li>
</ul>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/connected1.png"><p><b>Note:</b> Concordia users should always keep the network profile â€œConcordiaUniversityâ€? as the first priority profile because the eduroam network has limitations for some internal services.</p>
<p>To change the profile priority:</p>
<ul>
<li>Go to <b>Start &gt; Control Panel &gt; Network and Internet Connection&gt;Network connections</b>.</li>
<li>Right click <b>â€œWireless Network Connectionâ€?.</b></li>
<li>Select â€œ<b>Properties</b>â€?.</li>
<li>Choose the <b>Wireless Networks</b> tab.</li>
<li>Select the <b>eduroam profile</b>, followed by <b>Move down.</b></li>
</ul>
</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Networking services</h3>
<ul>
<li>Eduroam</li>
<li>High Speed Networking</li>
<li>Virtual Private Network (VPN) Service</li>
<li>Wireless Network</li>
<li>IP address setup</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Eduroam Wireless Configuration for Windows Vista</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h2>Requirements</h2>
<ul>
<li>Microsoft Windows users will need to download the latest Service Pack and updates for their operating system. To do so simply click <a href="http://www.update.microsoft.com/windowsupdate/v6/thanks.aspx?ln=en&amp;&amp;thankspage=5">here</a> and select <b>'Express Updates'</b>.</li>
<li>Make certain your wireless card is enabled and that the antenna isn't turned off if it's built in. Consult the hardware documentation if need be.</li>
<li>You need to be logged into Windows using an account with Administrative privileges.</li>
<li>You may need to clear your computer's cache.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 1">
					
                    Step 1
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Go to <b>Start</b> &gt; <b>Control</b> <b>Panel</b> &gt; <b>Open</b> <b>Network</b> <b>and</b> <b>Sharing</b> <b>Center</b> (if you donâ€™t see it, go to the top right hand corner of the window and change the View by setting to Large icons or Small icons).</li>
<li>Click the <b>Wireless Network Connection</b> icon.</li>
<li>Click <b>Connect to</b> in the menu above the icon.</li>
<li>Click <b>Manually connect to a wireless network</b> and then select Next.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows-vista/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel/parsys-accordion/image"><img title="eduroam-winvista-step1" alt="eduroam-winvista-step1" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows-vista/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel/parsys-accordion/image.img.gif/1380567778944.gif"></div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 2">
					
                    Step 2
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Enter the following on the Manually connect to a wireless network page:</li>
<li>Network Name: <b>eduroam</b></li>
<li>Select Security type <b>WPA2-Enterprise </b>with Encryption type<b> AES</b>, or select Security type<b> WPA</b> with Encryption type<b> TKIP</b>.</li>
<li>Check option: <b>Start this connection automatically</b></li>
<li>Check option: <b>Connect even if the network is not broadcasting</b>.</li>
<li>Click <b>Next</b>.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows-vista/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image"><img title="eduroam-winvista-step2" alt="eduroam-winvista-step2" class="cq-dd-image" src="/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows-vista/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_0/parsys-accordion/image.img.jpg/1380567758351.jpg"></div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 3">
					
                    Step 3
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><ul>
<li>Click Change connection settings and click the <b>Security</b> tab.</li>
<li>Select Security type<b> WPA2-Enterprise</b> with Encryption type<b> AES</b>, or select Security type<b> WPA</b> with Encryption type<b> TKIP</b>.</li>
<li>Select <b>Microsoft:</b> <b>Protected EAP (PEAP)</b> as the <b>network authentication</b> <b>method</b>.</li>
<li>Remove checkmark from <b>Cache user information for subsequent connections to the network.</b></li>
</ul>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/step3.png"></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 4">
					
                    Step 4
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_2" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><ul>
<li>Click <b>Settings</b>.</li>
<li>Uncheck <b>Validate server certificate</b> box.</li>
<li>Choose <b>Secured password (EAP-MSCHAP v2)</b> as <b>Select Authentication Method.</b></li>
<li>Check <b>Enable Fast Reconnect</b> box and uncheck other boxes.</li>
</ul>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/step4.png"></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 5">
					
                    Step 5
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_3" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Click <b>Configure</b>.</li>
<li>Uncheck <b>Automatically use my Windows logon name and password (and domain if any)</b> box.</li>
<li>Click <b>OK</b> until you close all the configuration dialog windows.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows-vista/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_3/parsys-accordion/image"><img title="eduroam-winvista-step5" alt="eduroam-winvista-step5" class="cq-dd-image" src="/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows-vista/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_3/parsys-accordion/image.img.png/1380567842565.png"></div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 6">
					
                    Step 6
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_4" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><ul>
<li>Wait until you see the message below. <b>Click</b> on it.</li>
</ul>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/step6-1.png"></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 7">
					
                    Step 7
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_5" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><ul>
<li>In the <b>Enter Credentials</b> window, enter your Netname and Password.</li>
<li>Leave the <b>Logon</b> <b>domain</b> blank.</li>
</ul>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/step7.gif"></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 8">
					
                    Step 8
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_6" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>You will see the following message:</li>
</ul>
<p><img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/connected1.png"></p>
<p><b>Note:</b>Concordia users should always keep the network profile â€œConcordiaUniversityâ€? as the first priority profile because the eduroam network has limitations for some internal services.</p>
<p>To change the profile priority:</p>
<ul>
<li>Go to <b>Start</b> &gt; <b>Control</b> <b>Panel</b> &gt; <b>Open</b> <b>Network</b> <b>and</b> <b>Sharing</b> <b>Center.</b></li>
<li>Click <b>Manage wireless networks</b> (on the left-hand side of the window).</li>
<li>Select the profile â€œ<b>ConcordiaUniversity</b>â€?, and click the button â€œMove upâ€? to the first profile location (as shown below):</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows-vista/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_6/parsys-accordion/image"><img title="eduroam-winvista-step8" alt="eduroam-winvista-step8" class="cq-dd-image" src="/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/windows-vista/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_6/parsys-accordion/image.img.jpg/1380567887137.jpg"></div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>

                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Networking services</h3>
<ul>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                </li>

                    <a href="#" title="Twitter" class="st_twitter_custom">
                    	<span class="sprites-icon-social-2" displayText="Twitter" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/mac-osx.img.png/1376574284420.png'>Twitter</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="#" title="LinkedIn" class="st_linkedin_custom">
                        <span class="sprites-icon-social-5" displayText="LinkedIn" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/iits/services/internet-phones/eduroam/mac-osx.img.png/1376574284420.png'>LinkedIn</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
            </ul>   
        </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">
            jQuery(function() {  
                $ = jQuery;
                socialbar.init();
                jQuery(window).scroll(function(){
                    socialbar.scroll();
                });
    
            });
        </script></div>


            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Eduroam Wireless Configuration for Mac OS X (10.6)</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h2>Mac OS 10.6 Snow Leopard</h2>
<p>This document describes the procedure used for connecting systems using Appleâ€™s Os X Snow Leopard (10.6) to the Concordia University Wireless network using the PEAP and WPA2 protocols. The instructions here may not work on earlier versions of OS X (i.e., 10.4, 10.5) and may vary depending on your configuration. For further information on OS X wireless support, please visit the Apple website.</p>
<p><b>Note:</b> If this is your first time connecting, you may be prompted to accept a certificate. This process should occur when you first log onto the network, but may happen earlier. The steps for certificate acceptance are found at the end of this document.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 1: Creating a profile">
					
                    Step 1: Creating a profile
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><p><b>Once this step is completed, you will have a valid network settings profile for the Concordia Wireless network.</b> While there are other methods to connect to the network, weâ€™d suggest you create a User Profile with the settings below stored in it. This will allow you to automatically connect to the network wherever it is available. If you have already done this, skip to step 2. <b>Step 1 should not be repeated</b>, since it may create conflicts within the profile system.</p>
<ul>
<li>To connect to the Concordia University Wireless network using OS X, open the <b>System</b> <b>Preferences</b> panel. This can usually be found through <b>Finder</b> in the <b>Applications</b> section.</li>
<li>Under <b>System</b> <b>Preferences</b>, go to the <b>Network</b> menu. This menu may display a number of options, depending on your configuration.</li>
</ul>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/osxstep1.jpg"><p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>Please Select <b>AirPort</b></p>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/osxstep1a.jpg"><p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><i>Note: It is not necessary to change the AirPort setting until you are ready to log on (the status may be set to On or Off).</i></p>
<ul>
<li>In the <b>AirPort</b> menu, select <b>Advanced</b>.</li>
<li>A configuration panel should appear.</li>
<li>Select the <b>802.1x</b> tab.</li>
</ul>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/osxstep1b.png"><p>&nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li>Please verify that another user profile for Concordia Universityâ€™s Wireless network isnâ€™t already present. If it is, your laptop has already been configured with the eduroam profile, and you can therefore log in right away.</li>
<li><b>If you already have a profile and the settings are correct, do not create a new one.</b></li>
</ul>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/osxstep1c.png"><p>&nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li>In the space under the <b>User</b> <b>Profiles</b> menu, select the [+] button, then select <b>Add</b> <b>User</b> <b>Profile</b>.</li>
</ul>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/osxstep1d.png"><ul>
<li>Fill in the name of the profile with something appropriate for the network; <b>eduroam</b> is suggested.</li>
<li>Press the [<b>Enter</b>] key when you are finished.</li>
<li>In the User Name and Password fields type in your <b>Netname@concordia.ca</b> and your MyConcordia portal password.</li>
<li>In the Authentication area, ensure that <b>PEAP</b> is checked.</li>
<li>Next to <b>Wireless Network</b>, select <b>eduroam</b>.</li>
<li>Next to <b>Security Type</b>, ensure that <b>WPA2 Enterprise</b> is selected.</li>
<li>Click <b>â€œOKâ€?</b> and you will be brought back to the main Network window.</li>
</ul>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/osxstep1e.png"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 2: Connecting to the wireless network">
					
                    Step 2: Connecting to the wireless network
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><ul>
<li>In the <b>Network</b> <b>Name</b> pulldown menu, select <b>eduroam</b><b> </b>as your wireless network. Once you have done this, you will be presented with a log-in screen.</li>
<li>If there is an available 802.1x pulldown menu, select the profile that you created in Step 1.</li>
<li>Depending on your settings, you may need to enter your User Name (Netname@Concordia.ca) and Password to continue.</li>
</ul>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/osxstep2a.png"><p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>If this is not your first time connecting to the network and the settings have already been stored, your log-in screen may appear different.</p>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/osxstep2b.png"><p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>If this is your first time connecting, you will be prompted to accept a certificate from<b> Cumulus.Concordia.Ca.</b> (see below)</p>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/osxstep2c.png"><p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>Accepting the certificate requires a local administrator password. Usually, this is the username and password for the machine you are using.</p>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/osxstep2d.jpg"><p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>Once you are connected, the <b>Network</b> windowâ€™s login screen should show your IP address and the message:â€œ<b>Authenticated via PEAP (MSCHAPv2)</b> followed by the amount of time you have been on the wireless network this session.</p>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/osxstep2e.png"><p>At this point, you should be able to access the network. To test this, open up your favourite browser (Safari, Firefox, or something similar) and point it to your favourite website (we suggest www.concordia.ca).</p>
</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Note: Profile priority">
					
                    Note: Profile priority
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_6" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><p>Concordia users should always keep the network profile â€œConcordiaUniversityâ€? as the first priority profile because the eduroam network has limitations for some internal services.</p>
<p><b>To change the profile priority:</b></p>
<ul>
<li>Go to the <b>AirPort</b> menu, and click <b>Advanced</b>. &nbsp;</li>
<li>Select the <b>802.1x</b> tab.</li>
<li>Drag â€œConcordiaUniversityâ€? profile to the first profile location (as shown below):</li>
</ul>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/osxstep3.jpg"></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Networking services</h3>
<ul>
<li>Eduroam</li>
<li>High Speed Networking</li>
<li>Virtual Private Network (VPN) Service</li>
<li>Wireless Network</li>
<li>IP address setup</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<header class="header ">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Eduroam Wireless Configuration for the iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Configuration">
					
                    Configuration
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>Note:</b>The protocol used to secure the eduroam wireless network is not supported on pre-IOS 4 versions of the iPhone Operating System (OS). Updating your iPhone OS to the latest version is encouraged. For further information, please visit the Apple website.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 1">
					
                    Step 1
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><p>To connect to the Concordia University wireless network on your iPhone, open the <b>Settings</b> application from your home screen.</p>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/apple1.gif"></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Step 2">
					
                    Step 2
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><p>Open the <b>Wi-Fi</b> menu and make sure that Wi-Fi is turned on. Select the <b>eduroam</b> network.</p>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/apple2.png"></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">

            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><p>Enter the Username as â€œ<b>Netname@concordia.caâ€?</b> and enter your portal Password.</p>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/apple3.png"></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>

    </div>

<div class="rte">
<p><p>Click <b>Accept.</b> You will be brought back to the <b>Wi-Fi Networks</b> screen.</p>
<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/apple5.png"><p>The <b>ConcordiaUniversity</b> network should now have a check next to it. In order to verify your connectivity, hit the home button, launch Safari or another web browser of your choice, and open a web page (<i>i.e.,</i> <a href="http://www.concordia.ca/">concordia.ca</a>).</p>
</p>

</div></div>


</div>

$=jQuery;
$(function() {
    var check = mobilecheck();
    if (!check) {
        $("#feedback-modal").attr("href", "#modal");
        $('a[rel*=leanModal]').leanModal({top: 200, closeButton: ".modal-close"});
    }
});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                    Home
                </a>
	        </li>

    <div class="container">
    
        <div class="row with_socialbar">

            <div class="share-this">












	<script type="text/javascript">var switchTo5x=true;</script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
        stLight.options({
            publisher: "864f3db6-11cb-4e7b-9c5f-0a8a836ac323",
            onhover: false,

            // disable CopyNShare:
            doNotHash: true,
            doNotCopy: true,
            hashAddressBar: false,
        });
	</script>

<li>For Ph.D. Programs [<a href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/sgs/docs/handbooks/standardshandbookphd.pdf" adhocenable="false">pdf</a>]</li>

                    <a href="/students/financial-support.html" role="button" class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="">Financial matters</a>

	</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>Quick tips for new and returning students</h2>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/new/quick-tips/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="quicktips" alt="quicktips" class="cq-dd-image" src="/students/new/quick-tips/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1375888621981.jpg"></div>
</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Looking to get your Student Identification card?</li>
<li>Wondering about wireless access and obtaining your class books?</li>
<li>Be sure to read through these helpful tips and information for new students!</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3><br>
Getting From One Campus to the Other</h3>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">Travelling between our two campuses is fast and easy with the free Concordia shuttle bus. The shuttle bus takes students directly from one campus to the other in approximately 20 minutes. Consult the shuttle bus schedule page for regularly updated bus times and information. Click here to view the campus maps online.</p>
<h3>Birks Student Service Centre</h3>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">The <a href="/students/birks.html" adhocenable="false">Birks Student Services Centre</a> is located in room <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/buildings/lb.html">LB-185</a>&nbsp;of the J. W. McConnell Building. At Birks, you can obtain official documents for a variety of academic purposes. They offer a number of services, including tuition and fee payments, issuing of Concordia Student ID cards, official transcript requests, Quebec Provincial Residency and Permanent Code information, as well as the processing of paperwork for exam deferrals, degree transfers, re-admission, late completions, re-evaluations and appeals.</p>
<h3>F.A.S.T. Services</h3>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">To help you move quickly through your student services needs during the first few weeks of the term you can also visit the Front-line Administrative Services Team (F.A.S.T.) set up within Birks, as well as in the atrium of the LB building. At the F.A.S.T. kiosks you are able to create your student ID card, obtain general student account information, as well as receive assistance accessing the wireless network on your laptop or mobile device. Visit F.A.S.T. for more information.</p>
<h3>Concordia Student ID card</h3>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">Your Concordia student ID card is your school identification. You will need an ID card to borrow materials from the libraries, to take the shuttle bus from one campus to the other, and to prove your identity at final exams. Obtain your Concordia student ID card at the&nbsp;<a href="/students/birks.html">Birks Student Services Centre</a>&nbsp;or from a F.A.S.T. kiosk in the atrium of the LB building.</p>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">In order to have an ID card made, you will need to bring:</p>
<ol style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">
<li>A piece of photo identification (such as a provincial driverâ€™s license or passport)<b> </b></li>
<li>Your Offer of Admission or a class schedule</li>
</ol>
<h3 style="margin-top: 25px;">Student Bus Pass</h3>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;"><i>How to get your OPUS card:</i><br>
The SociÃ©tÃ© de transport de MontrÃ©al (STM) offers a reduced-fare monthly bus/metro pass. Here is how to get your OPUS card:</p>
<ol style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">
<li>Visit the <a href="http://myconcordia.ca/">MyConcordia portal</a></li>
<li>Click on â€œ<b>Attestation Letters</b>â€? in the left-hand menu.</li>
<li>Print the letter and bring it to an OPUS on-campus Photo ID session (scheduled at Concordia for Sept. 30 and Oct. 1) or to the&nbsp;<a href="http://www.stm.info/info/centresac.htm#StudioPhoto">STM photo studio at Berri-UQÃ€M mÃ©tro station</a>.<br>
You will need proof of age and $14 in cash to cover the cost of the card.</li>
</ol>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">For more information on where to have your OPUS card made or to verify on-campus Photo ID session dates, as well as fees and travel fare details, please consult the <a href="http://www.stm.info/en/info/fares/opus-cards-and-other-fare-media/registered-photo-id-opus-card" adhocenable="false">STM website</a>.</p>
<h3>Agenda</h3>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">Every year the Concordia Student Union (CSU) provides students with a free agenda. You can pick yours up from the CSU office on the seventh floor of the Hall building (H-711) during the first few weeks of classes. For a complete list of all the important term dates to enter in your agenda, see <a href="/events/academic-dates.html" adhocenable="false">Academic Calendar Dates</a>.</p>
<h3>Wireless Access</h3>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">You can access wireless internet from your laptop or mobile device around both campuses; simply log onto the Concordia University network using your Concordia Netname and password. If you need assistance logging onto the network, contact the staff at <a href="http://iits.concordia.ca/">Instructional and Information Technology Services (IITS)</a><b></b></p>
<h3>Required Booklist</h3>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">Near the beginning of the semester your professors will start to make the lists of required textbooks available online. You can find out what books you will need two ways; by accessing the Booklist on the MyConcordia Portal (under the â€œAcademicâ€? tab) or by going to the <a href="http://web2.concordia.ca/Bookstore/textbooks.booklist.shtml">Concordia University Bookstores website</a> and simply keying in your student ID number.</p>
<h3>Concordia University Bookstores</h3>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">Concordia has two bookstores, one on each campus. The SGW bookstore is located on the main floor of the J.W. McConnell (LB) building, and the Loyola bookstore is located in the Communication Studies and Journalism (CJ) building. Along with your textbooks and coursepacks, the bookstores carry binders, notebooks, pens and pencils, so there is no need to run across town to get the basics. As a proud new Concordian, you can also grab some Concordia gear: t-shirts, sweatshirts, hoodies and bobbleheads â€“ just to name a few.</p>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">Visit the bookstore <a href="http://web2.concordia.ca/Bookstore/">website</a> for more information.</p>
<h3>Course Reserves</h3>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">The <a href="http://library.concordia.ca/">Concordia University Libraries</a> keep course materials on reserve so that students can access textbooks, class notes and multimedia resources throughout the term. Course reserves have shorter loan times, but can be a great alternative to investing in some materials.</p>
<h3>Concordia Computer Store</h3>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">Students can purchase a wide array of hardware and software at our two Computer Store locations. If youâ€™re looking for a new computer, portable media player or printer, the Computer Store is sure to have something for you. The Computer Storeâ€™s trained technicians are available to assist you with all your high-tech questions. For locations, store hours and more information on products and services visit the <a href="http://ccs.concordia.ca">Computer Store website</a>.</p>
<h3>Engineering and Computer Science Calculators</h3>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">For those of you studying in the Faculty of Engineering and Computer Science, you must have one of the department-specified calculator models to be used during the exam period.</p>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">The approved models are the Sharp EL-531 W and the Casio FX-300MS. Any calculator other than these models will not be accepted. In order to prove that your calculator is an officially accepted model you will need to receive an approval sticker from the ENCS department (EV 2.189).</p>
<h3>Class Location</h3>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">The MyConcordia portal has your class schedule and locations. Log onto MyConcordia portal to select â€œAcademicâ€? and then â€œMy Class Schedule.â€? You can also find out at the Information Desk in the Hall Building lobby, or by phoning 514-848-2424 ext. 8767.</p>
<h3>Obtaining a Locker</h3>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">Students can sign up for lockers as of the first day of classes. Please log onto the MyConcordia portal, then select &quot;Other services&quot; then &quot;Get a Locker&quot;.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">

jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

<div id="modal">
    <div class="modal-header">
        <h3>Feedback forms</h3>
        <a class="modal-close" href="#"></a>
    </div>
    <div class="modal-body">
        <p>Thanks for your time. Please select your area of feedback.</p>
        <ul>
            <li><a href="/web/feedback-forms/feedback-bad-link.html">I want to report a bad link</a></li>
            <li><a href="/web/feedback-forms/feedback-cant-find.html">I can't find something on the website</a></li>
            <li><a href="/web/feedback-forms/feedback-tell-us.html">I'd like to share my impressions of the site</a></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
$=jQuery;
$(function() {
    var check = mobilecheck();
    if (!check) {
        $("#feedback-modal").attr("href", "#modal");
        $('a[rel*=leanModal]').leanModal({top: 200, closeButton: ".modal-close"});
    }
});
</script>
</div>


</footer>
    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>1. Go to the MyConcordia Portal</h2>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Your Concordia Connection Starts Now!</p>
<p>The MyConcordia Portal is your entry point to all online student administrative services. You can access the Portal by visiting <a href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/">myconcordia.ca</a>, or via the links found on the Concordia website. If this is your first time accessing the Portal simply click on â€œActivateâ€? next to the â€œNetnameâ€? field for step-by-step instructions. If you need assistance accessing the Portal, call the Helpline at 514-848-2424, ext. 7613 or send an email to <a href="mailto:portal@concordia.ca">portal@concordia.ca</a>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h4>Key Features of the Portal &nbsp;</h4>
<h5>Academic:</h5>
<p>This tab allows you to access information regarding your class schedule, exam schedule, booklist, grades, and unofficial student record.</p>
<h5>Financial:</h5>
<p>Here you will find your account balance, financial aid and award information, online banking options, and your tuition tax receipt.</p>
<h5>Registration:</h5>
<p>Explore this tab for all information related to class registration including registration dates and links to the Undergraduate Calendar and the Undergraduate Class Schedule.</p>
<h5>New Contact Information</h5>
<p>Let Us Know How We Can Reach You. Keep your address, email, and phone number current on your Portal, so we can keep you in the loop about your Concordia experience, and advise you of important notifications like emergency alerts. After you log in to your <a href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/">MyConcordia Portal</a>, check out â€œChange my address informationâ€? under the â€œAcademicâ€? tab. You can update as many times as you need to throughout the year.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h4>Facebook: Your Concordia: 2013 - 2014</h4>
<p>Join the <a href="http://www.facebook.com/YourConcordia20132014">Your Concordia: 2013-2014 page</a> and connect with other newly admitted Concordia students. Concordia employees, alumni, and even current students are online regularly to answer any questions that might come up.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation_0">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='' href='/students/new/first-year-guide.html'>Guide to First Year</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/students/new/first-year-guide/1-portal.html'>1. MyConcordia Portal</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/new/first-year-guide/2-offer-of-admission.html'>2. Offer of Admission</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/new/first-year-guide/3-transcripts.html'>3. Plan your finances</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/new/first-year-guide/5-courses.html'>5. </div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation_0.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

<div class="parbase picker section">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                <a href="/students/new/first-year-guide.html" onclick="CQ_Analytics.record({event:'followBreadcrumb',values: { breadcrumbPath: '/content/concordia/en/students/new/first-year-guide' },collect: false,options: { obj: this },componentPath: 'concordia/components/breadcrumb'})">
                    Guide to First Year
                </a>
	        </li>

                    2. Offer of Admission
                </a>
