<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Jobs on campus</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Looking for a job on campus? Many areas of the university need students throughout the year on a full- and part-time basis. It's a great, flexible way to gain valuable work experience and complement your studies.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Here are some tips to land a campus job:</p>
<h3>1. Check out the Work-Study Program</h3>
<ul>
<li>The&nbsp;Financial Aid &amp; Awards Office&nbsp;offers a work-study program, available to full-time students only. <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/financial-support/work-study.html">See if you're eligible and apply here</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>2. Reach out to alumni</h3>
<ul>
<li>Alumni Advancement and Alumni Relations needs help from current students throughout the year for fundraising campaigns and events. To work at the&nbsp;<b>Annual Giving Call Centre</b>, apply between August 5 and 22. Send your CV and cover letter by email to <a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:call.centre.alumni@concordia.ca">call.centre.alumni@concordia.ca</a>. To work at&nbsp;Alumni events, you can apply throghout the year by sending your CV and cover letter by email to <a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:events@concordia.ca">events@concordia.ca</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>3. Join the athletics team</h3>
<ul>
<li>Athletics &amp; Recreation hires referees, timekeepers, ticket sellers, parking attendants and more.</li>
<li>Fill out an application form during the summer. Send your CV to <a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:ljacinto@alcor.concordia.ca">ljacinto@alcor.concordia.ca<br>
&nbsp;</a></li>
</ul>
<h3>4. Help out at Campus Stores</h3>
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="http://retail.concordia.ca">Campus Retail Stores</a> hires students during rush periods on a casual part-time basis at both the Sir George Williams Bookstore and Loyola Bookstore. <a adhocenable="false" href="http://retail.concordia.ca/contact/jobs.html">Learn more here</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>5. Join the Computer Store</h3>
<ul>
<li>Part-time positions are occasionally available. Inquire to&nbsp;<a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:stevenz@alcor.concordia.ca">stevenz@alcor.concordia.ca<br>
&nbsp;</a></li>
</ul>
<h3>6. Check out the Concordia Student Union (CSU)</h3>
<ul>
<li>The CSU offers a range of jobs from administrative to research positions. <a adhocenable="false" href="http://www.csu.qc.ca/index.php?module=pagesetter&amp;tid=4">Find current openings</a>.&nbsp;</li>
<li>They also administer&nbsp;<a adhocenable="false" href="http://hojo.csu.qc.ca/">HoJo, a housing and job bank</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>7. Solve tech problems at IITS</h3>
<ul>
<li>Working at Instructional and Information Technology Services (IITS) gives you real-world work experience on a variety of IT projects.</li>
<li>Casual positions (non-contract), if available, are posted on <a adhocenable="false" href="http://hojo.csu.qc.ca/">HoJo</a> or <a adhocenable="false" href="http://cdev.concordia.ca/our-services/job-search-and-resume/">CAPS</a>.</li>
<li>Full-time positions (permanent), if available, are posted on the Human Resources website.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>8. Invigilate an exam</h3>
<ul>
<li>The Exams office offers invigilation positions to graduate students, or other interested parties <b>who are not current undergraduate students</b>.</li>
<li>Bring or mail your CV to the <a adhocenable="false" href="/offices/5748475904021/location.html">Office of the Registrar, LB-720</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>9. Greet newcomers at the Welcome Centre</h3>
<ul>
<li>Show Concordia in its best light: become a Campus Tour Guide! Positions are posted on <a adhocenable="false" href="http://hojo.csu.qc.ca/">HoJo</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>10. Apply to a company on-campus</h3>
<ul>
<li>Chartwells, you'll find general help, including evenings and weekends.</li>
<li><b>Fax your CV</b> to 514-848-3644</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase target section">








<div class="mboxDefault" id="content-concordia-en-students-financial-support-jobs-on-campus-sidebar-picker">
    
</div>


<script type="text/javascript">
	var mboxId = 'content-concordia-en-students-financial-support-jobs-on-campus-sidebar-picker';
	var mboxName = 'content-concordia-en-students-financial-support-jobs-on-campus-sidebar-picker';
	var mboxLocation = '/content/concordia/en/students/financial-support/jobs-on-campus/jcr:content/sidebar/picker';
	var wcmMode = 'DISABLED';

	if ( typeof mboxDefine == 'function' && wcmMode !== 'ANALYTICS' ) {
		var callParameters = [ mboxId ];
		var callFunction;
		var replaced = false;
	
		
				callFunction = mboxCreate;
		
		
		
		var staticParameters = {};
		
		for ( var key in staticParameters )
			callParameters.push(key  + '=' + staticParameters[key]);
		
		if ( !replaced ) { // do not define the same mbox twice, this leads to additional JS calls
			callFunction.apply(undefined, callParameters);
		}
		
		
		
		if ( callFunction == mboxDefine ) {
		    
		    // if the campaign store is available at this time we are most likely simulating
		    // so trigger an update if the (auto) campaign is selected
            var campaignStore = ClientContext.get("campaign");
            if ( campaignStore && !campaignStore.isCampaignSelected() ) {
                CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.triggerUpdate();
            }
    		
    		// wait for 2 seconds for the T&T answer to come in to prevent page flicker issues
    		// also see the overlay of mbox.protoype.setOffer which completes this
    		setTimeout(function() {
    		    CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.showDefaultMboxContent(mboxId, mboxName);
    		}, 2000);
		}
	}
	
	
		
</script>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Telephone User Guides </H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>On this page, you will find information on:</p>
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="#TelManuals">Telephone Manuals and Reference Materials</a><br>
</p>
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="#DialCalls">Dialing calls</a></p>
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="#LongDist">Long Distance Access</a><br>
</p>

<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3><a name="M5000"></a>M5000 series</h3>
<p>Please contact the <a href="mailto:help@concordia.ca" adhocenable="false">IITS Service Desk</a> for information on the M5000 series telephone sets</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b><a name="DialCalls"></a>Dialing Calls</b></p>
<p>The class of service on the telephone determines the access to local, toll-free, and long distance calling and, 411 directory assistance and the outside operator.&nbsp; To inquire about the features on your telephone,&nbsp; please contact the IITS Service Desk by calling 7613 or sending an email to <a href="mailto:help@concordia.ca">help@concordia.ca</a></p>
<p><b>*Note</b>: There is a charge for all directory assistance calls except for internal, toll-free and TTY/Teletypewriter calls</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   horizontalLines verticalLines table-hover">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><td width="291" valign="top"><p><b>SECURITY</b><br>
<b>EMERGENCY</b></p>
<p><b>Access Montreal</b></p>
<p><b>Info SantÃ©<br>
 </b>Internal Calls IP to IP or IP to Centrex<br>
Centrex to IP<br>
Local call in area code 514<br>
Local call to area code 450<br>
Direct dial call North America<br>
Direct dial call International<br>
</p>
<p>Operator-assisted call North America</p>
<p>Operator-assisted call overseas</p>
</td>
<td width="322" valign="top"><p>3717<br>

</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b><a name="LongDist"></a>Long Distance Access</b></p>
<p>The Class of Service on your telephone determines your ability to dial long distance calls. The classes of service are:</p>
<p>1. Internal calls only</p>
<p>2. Local, toll-free and internal calls</p>
<p>3. Long distance access with authorization code, local, toll-free and internal calls</p>
<p>4. Long distance access, no access to the Bell Canada operator or 411, local, toll-free and internal calls</p>
<p>5. Long distance access, plus access to the Bell Canada operator and 411*, local, toll-free and internal calls</p>
<p>If you currently do not have long distance capabilities on your telephone and required this feature, or if you wish to make a change to your class of service, speak to your department's <a href="/iits/services/internet-phones/telephone-services/help.html" adhocenable="false">Telephone Coordinator</a></p>
<p>*<b>NOTE</b>: Long distance, 411 and Operator-assisted calls are charged to the department where phone is located.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Unity Voicemail</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you do not have voice mail and would like this service, please contact your department's <a adhocenable="false" href="/iits/services/internet-phones/telephone-services/help/contact-list.html">Telephone Coordinator</a>.&nbsp; Once we receive and process the request, instructions on how to set-up your voicemail will be sent to you by email.</p>
<p>On this page you will find information for:<br>
</p>
<p><a href="#Setting up voicemail" adhocenable="false">Setting up voicemail</a></p>
<p><a href="#Accessing voicemail" adhocenable="false">Accessing voicemail</a></p>
<p><a href="#Greetings" adhocenable="false">Greetings</a></p>
<p><a href="#Managing your mailbox" adhocenable="false">Managing your mailbox</a></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><b><a name="Setting up voicemail"></a>Setting up voicemail</b></p>
<p>If you experience any problems while setting up your voice mailbox, please contact the IITS Service Desk at extension 7613 or send an email to <a href="mailto:help@concordia.ca">help@concordia.ca</a></p>
<p><b>PIN (Voice-mail Password) Guidelines</b></p>
<p>Your PIN protects the privacy of your messages and secures your account against unauthorized access. You can change your PIN at any time. Use the following guidelines when changing your PIN:</p>
<ul>
<li>the PIN must be 8-digits</li>
<li>the new PIN cannot be the same as the previous PIN</li>
<li>the digits cannot be the same or repeated (i.e. 99999999 or 99991111)</li>
<li>the digits cannot be consecutive (i.e. 12345678 or 87654321)</li>
<li>the PIN cannot be the same as your extension, nor can it spell your name</li>
</ul>
<p>The PIN will expire after 180 days and you will be asked to enter a new PIN.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><b><a name="Accessing voicemail"></a>Accessing voicemail</b></p>
<p>The Unity Connection voice-mail system allows subscribers of the voice-mail service several ways to access voice-mail messages. They can be accessed from:</p>
<ul>
<li>your phone at the university</li>
<li>another phone within the university</li>
<li>an outside line</li>
<li>your email Inbox - IMAP</li>
<li>your Blackberry or iPhone</li>
<li>via the web - PCA inbox</li>
</ul>
<p>From your telephone:</p>
<ul>
<li>Press the message key or dial 4220</li>
<li>Enter your PIN (voice-mail password) followed by #</li>
</ul>
<p>From another phone in Concordia</p>
<ul>
<li>Dial 4220</li>
<li>Press *</li>
<li>Enter your ID (extension) followed by #</li>
<li>Enter your PIN (voice-mail password) followed by #</li>
</ul>
<p>From outside the university</p>
<ul>
<li>Dial 514-848-4220</li>
<li>Press *</li>
<li>Enter your ID (extension) followed by #</li>
<li>Enter your PIN (voice-mail password) followed by #</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><b><a name="Greetings"></a>Greetings</b><br>
</p>
<p>You have the option to record up to five different greetings for your mailbox.&nbsp; &nbsp;You can enable or disable the greetings as you need them through the Set-up options menu.&nbsp; For more information, please see the <a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/concordia/docs/IITS/Phones/Voice-mail_UserGuide_8.0.pdf">Voicemail User Guide</a>.</p>
<p><b>STANDARD GREETINGS</b></p>
<p>A Standard Greeting is the message a caller hears when you are in the office but unavailable to take a call or when no other Greetings have been recorded.</p>
<p><b>Standard Greeting with &quot;urgent only&quot; exit to someone else</b></p>
<p>Allows callers requiring immediate assistance to reach an alternate contact by dialing &quot;0&quot;.</p>
<p><b>Note</b>: The 0 option is custom programming. If you require this feature, please contact the IITS Help Line at extension 7613 or send an email to <a href="mailto:help@concordia.ca">help@concordia.ca</a>.</p>
<p><b>Standard Greeting with â€œurgent only&quot; exit to alternate phone (cell phone or pager)</b></p>
<p>Allows callers requiring immediate assistance to reach you on an alternate phone number (cell phone or pager) by dialling &quot;5&quot;.</p>
<p><b>Note</b>: The press 5 option is custom programming.&nbsp; If you require this feature, please contact the IITS Help Line at extension 7613 or send an email to <a href="mailto:help@concordia.ca">help@concordia.ca</a>.</p>
<p><b>BUSY GREETINGS</b></p>
<p>If a Busy Greeting is recorded, it will play to callers when you are on another line.&nbsp; If the Busy Greeting is not recorded, the Standard Greeting will play.</p>
<p><b>ALTERNATE GREETINGS</b></p>
<p>Alternate Greetings should be recorded when you are out of the office or on vacation. This greeting blocks all other greetings when it is enable.&nbsp; Upon your return, disable your Alternate Greeting and all other recorded greetings will be reactivated.</p>
<p><b>CLOSED GREETING</b></p>
<p>You have the option to record a Closed greeting that will play during your non-working Hours.&nbsp; <b>Note:</b> The activation of a personal schedule for your mailbox is custom programming. If you require this feature, please contact the IITS Help Line at extension 7613 or send an email to <a href="mailto:help@concordia.ca">help@concordia.ca</a>.</p>
<p><b>INTERNAL GREETING</b></p>
<p>An Internal Greeting will play to internal callers only, if recorded.&nbsp; Outside callers will hear your Standard Greeting.&nbsp; You may want to use Internal Greetings when you need to give specific information to callers within Concordia that is not relevant to outside callers.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><b><a name="Managing your mailbox"></a>Managing your mailbox</b></p>
<p>In Unity, mailbox capacity is determined by storage space (measured in megabytes), and not by a specific number of voicemails.&nbsp;&nbsp; When subscribers are close to their storage limit, Unity will issue a warning that the mailbox is almost full.&nbsp; Once the storage limit is met, subscribers will not be able to receive or send messages</p>
<p><b>Tips for Managing Your Mailbox</b></p>
<p>1. Deleted messages remain on the system for two days after you delete them, which allows you to retrieve messages deleted in error. If you receive a warning that your mailbox is full, try deleting your deleted messages.</p>
<p>2. By default, Unity does not automatically delete messages once they have reached a certain age. Periodically review saved messages and delete those no longer required.</p>
<p>3. You may receive messages that have been forwarded many times over, which increases the message size. As a result, your mailbox can exceed its limit.</p>
<p>Please consult the <a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/concordia/docs/IITS/Phones/Voice-mail_UserGuide_8.0.pdf">Unity Voice Mail System</a> map for instructions on</p>
<p>- Deleting Saved Messages<br>
- Deleting Deleted Messages</p>
<p><b>Cisco PCA Web Inbox</b></p>
<p>You can have visual access to your mailbox by visiting <a href="https://unity.concordia.ca/ciscopca">https://unity.concordia.ca/ciscopca</a></p>
<p>1. Login with your netname and MyConcordia portal password</p>
<p>2. Select &quot;Web Inbox&quot;</p>
<p>3. You will see your voicemails stored in an inbox, the way you would view your emails. You can also easily purge your deleted voicemails by accessing the &quot;deleted&quot; folder.<br>
</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">

                    <a href="/students/financial-support.html" role="button" class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="">Financial matters</a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/students/financial-support/costs-budgeting-redirect.html">Costs &amp; budgeting</a>
				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/students/financial-support/government-loans.html">Government student aid</a>
				            </li>

				            </li>

				            </li>

					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/students/financial-support/graduate-funding.html">Graduate awards</a>
				            </li>
                    </ul> 
	            </li>

            	
            	<li class="dropdown ">
					
						<a href="/students/campus-services.html" role="button">Campus services</a>
	            </li>

            	
            	<li class="dropdown ">
					
						<a href="/students/beyond-the-classroom.html" role="button">Beyond the classroom</a>
	            </li>
        </ul>
	</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Need Help?</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>REQUESTS FOR SERVICES</b></p>
<p>To order services such as phone, fax and data connections, voice mail and more, please contact your department's Telephone Coordinator.&nbsp; To find out who the Telephone Coordinator is for your department, click on <b>contact lists</b> below.</p>
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="/iits/services/internet-phones/telephone-services/help/contact-list.html" target="_blank">CONTACT LISTS</a></p>
<p>If there is no Telephone Coordinator listed for your department, please email the <a href="mailto:help@concordia.ca" adhocenable="false">IITS Service Desk.</a></p>
<p><br>
<b>REQUESTS FOR REPAIRS</b></p>
<p>To request a repair for an existing service, please contact the IITS Service Desk by calling extension 7613 or by sending an <a href="mailto:help@concordia.ca">email</a>.</p>
<p>In order to process your repair request quickly, please provide the following information:</p>
<ul>
<li>Your name</li>
<li>Phone number</li>
<li>Email Address</li>
<li>Office Hours</li>
<li>Alternate contact person's name and phone number</li>
<li>Brief description of the problem</li>
</ul>
<p>In most cases, the repair will be completed within 24 hours.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="parbase box box_5">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark " style=" color: # !important;   ">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '></h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="title section">

		(function() {
			var ga = document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript'; ga.async = true;
			ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
			var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);
		})();
		
    </script>
    
</head>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Career services</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase target section">








<div class="mboxDefault" id="content-concordia-en-students-career-services-content-main-wysiwyg">
    
        <div class="default parbase wysiwyg">



<div class="rte">
<p>At Concordia,&nbsp;we help you prepare for the job market. You can meet with career professionals to <a adhocenable="false" href="http://cdev.concordia.ca/our-services/job-search-and-resume/">improve your resumÃ© and prepare for job interviews</a>, or connect with employers through job postings and on-campus recruiting fairs. You can even&nbsp;research potential employers, browse our extensive collection of career resources, or look up current <a adhocenable="false" href="http://cdev.concordia.ca/our-services/resources-and-drop-in-centres/career-resource-centre/">labour-market conditions</a>.</p>
<h3>Career, placement &amp; resource services</h3>
<p>These services are available to <b>all</b> Concordia students.&nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="http://caps.concordia.ca">Job search &amp; resumÃ© help</a>&nbsp;</li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="http://cdev.concordia.ca/our-services/resources-and-drop-in-centres/career-resource-centre/">Career counselling, workplace research &amp; career resources</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="http://cdev.concordia.ca/our-services/resources-and-drop-in-centres/student-success-resource-centre/">Student success resource centre</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="http://cdev.concordia.ca/our-services/counselling/career-planning-and-counselling/">Career planning and counselling<br>
&nbsp;</a></li>
</ul>
<h3>JMSB Career Management Services (CMS)</h3>
<p>Intended for current or recent graduates of the <b>John Molson School of Business</b>.&nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="http://johnmolson.concordia.ca/en/career-services/students">Job postings, CV database, networking, workshops &amp; more</a></li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>

    
</div>


<script type="text/javascript">
	var mboxId = 'content-concordia-en-students-career-services-content-main-wysiwyg';
	var mboxName = 'content-concordia-en-students-career-services-content-main-wysiwyg';
	var mboxLocation = '/content/concordia/en/students/career-services/jcr:content/content-main/wysiwyg';
	var wcmMode = 'DISABLED';

	if ( typeof mboxDefine == 'function' && wcmMode !== 'ANALYTICS' ) {
		var callParameters = [ mboxId ];
		var callFunction;
		var replaced = false;
	
		
				callFunction = mboxCreate;
		
		
		
		var staticParameters = {};
		
		for ( var key in staticParameters )
			callParameters.push(key  + '=' + staticParameters[key]);
		
		if ( !replaced ) { // do not define the same mbox twice, this leads to additional JS calls
			callFunction.apply(undefined, callParameters);
		}
		
		
		
		if ( callFunction == mboxDefine ) {
		    
		    // if the campaign store is available at this time we are most likely simulating
		    // so trigger an update if the (auto) campaign is selected
            var campaignStore = ClientContext.get("campaign");
            if ( campaignStore && !campaignStore.isCampaignSelected() ) {
                CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.triggerUpdate();
            }
    		
    		// wait for 2 seconds for the T&T answer to come in to prevent page flicker issues
    		// also see the overlay of mbox.protoype.setOffer which completes this
    		setTimeout(function() {
    		    CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.showDefaultMboxContent(mboxId, mboxName);
    		}, 2000);
		}
	}
	
	
		
</script>
</div>

<div class="rte">
<h3>Skills development &amp; more</h3>
<p>Maximize your workplace skills, learn French and more thanks to several Concordia resources:</p>
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="http://graduatestudies.concordia.ca/gradproskills/">GradProSkills</a> offers&nbsp;development workshops, on-line resources and responsive learning options designed to enrich the graduate experience and transition into a future career.</li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/students/oui-can-help.html">Oui Can Help!</a> is a special bursary program to help you learn French for the QuÃ©bec workplace</li>
</ul>

</div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Mentorship &amp; networking</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Concordia offers several mentorship and&nbsp;networking&nbsp;opportunities to help students facilitate their transitions to their chosen careers.</p>
<h2>Mentoring</h2>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Concordia Mentor Program">
					
                    Concordia Mentor Program
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Students interact with Concordia alumni who are already established in the workforce. All mentors, who hail from as far away Hong Kong, London and Dubai, volunteer to provide guidance and dispense advice to students â€“ especially those who are about to graduate â€“ who have decided on a career stream.</p>
<ul>
<li><b>One-on-one mentoring<br>
</b>Students are paired with an alumni mentor for short- (to seek advice) or long-term mentoring (one year or more). Mentors can share information about their own experiences, a specific occupation, and field of employment or industry, or offer tips on how to enter the job market and connections in the working world.<br>
<br>
</li>
<li><b>How to become a mentee<br>
</b><a href="/alumni-friends/programs/mentor.html">Register on the Advancement and Alumni Relations mentoring page</a>,&nbsp;which provides access to an online database that contains a list of potential mentor profiles. You can also attend workshops to gain more information about the program.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Co-op Mentorship Program">
					
                    Co-op Mentorship Program
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Students who sign up with the Institute for Co-operative Education can access the Co-op's mentorship program â€“ a valuable resource for students who seek additional support as they transition into industry while still studying.</p>
<p>The institute partners students with companies and organizations for hands-on work terms. Co-op students gain experience in their fields of study while working toward their degrees.</p>
<p>The program matches newer Co-op students with senior Co-op students in the same field. Through the relationship, mentees receive peer support from mentors have already completed one to three Co-op work terms themselves.</p>
<p><a href="http://co-op.concordia.ca./">Learn more</a></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Student Success Centres">
					
                    Student Success Centres
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a href="http://studentsuccess.concordia.ca/">Student Success Centres</a>&nbsp;are hubs for students to drop in and chat with mentors, who are experienced students studying at both the undergraduate and graduate levels. All mentors are familiar with university resources and regulations, and can share their own strategies for achieving academic success.</p>
<p><a href="http://studentsuccess.concordia.ca/">Learn more</a></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h2>Networking</h2>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Dinner for Eight: Reserve your seat at the dinner table">
					
                    Dinner for Eight: Reserve your seat at the dinner table
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_2" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Twice a year, Concordia alumni treat small groups of current students to dinner in a restaurant or in their home. At each Dinner for Eight, one alumnus or alumna hosts four to seven students. The casual atmosphere fosters interaction between students and experienced professionals.&nbsp;<a href="http://alumni.concordia.ca/programs/students/dinner8/">Learn more</a></p>
<p>Silver medal for Best Alumni Program from the Canadian Council for the Advancement of Education's 2010 Prix d'Excellence</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Backpack-to-briefcase series">
					
                    Backpack-to-briefcase series
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_3" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Backpack-to-Briefcase workshops are aimed at facilitating the transition from academia to the business world. Topics include dressing for success, stress management, presentation skills, and business dining etiquette.&nbsp;</p>
<p><a href="http://alumni.concordia.ca/programs/students/b2b.">Learn more</a></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Job Shadowing">
					
                    Job Shadowing
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_4" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Open to all Concordia third- and fourth-year undergraduate students, as well as recent graduates, the Job Shadowing program allows students to follow professionals around their workplace. Mentors are alumni who may dedicate an afternoon, day, week or longer to showing students their daily responsibilities.</p>
<p><a href="http://alumni.concordia.ca/">Learn more</a></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h4>Related pages</h4>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li><a href="http://alumni.concordia.ca/programs/students/b2b/">Backpacks to Briefcases</a></li>
<li><a href="http://alumni.concordia.ca/">Advancement and Alumni Relations </a></li>
<li><a href="http://co-op.concordia.ca/">Institute for Co-operative Education</a></li>
<li><a href="http://studentsuccess.concordia.ca/mentors/mentors2010.shtml">Concordia Student Success Centre Mentors</a></li>
<li><a href="http://caps.concordia.ca/">Concordia Career and Placement Services (CAPS)</a></li>
<li><a href="http://johnmolson.concordia.ca/en/career-services">John Molson School of Business Career Management Services</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

                </li>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Office of Rights &amp; Responsibilities</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h4>Promoting Respect on Campus</h4>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/rights/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="" alt="file" class="cq-dd-image" src="/students/rights/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1384196417730.jpg"></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Under the direction of the Director and Senior Advisor, Rights and Responsibilities (the â€œAdvisorâ€?), the Office is mandated with administering the&nbsp;<a href="/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/BD-3.pdf" adhocenable="false">Code of Rights and Responsibilities (PDF)</a>&nbsp;(the â€œCodeâ€?) and other related University policies. The Code sets standards of conduct for <b>all</b> University members (students, faculty, and staff).</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Functions of the Office</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Advise members who are experiencing a problem related to another memberâ€™s behaviour on campus</li>
<li>Assist members in addressing behavioural incidents and conflicts on campus<br>
Responses may range from the use of informal dispute resolution methods to formal procedures for adjudicating complaints.<br>
Remedies and sanctions attempt to restore harmony, collegiality, and cooperation.</li>
<li>Coordinate a procedure for identifying and managing behaviour that may pose a danger, and direct the Universityâ€™s response to urgent cases</li>
<li>Promote through education and direct intervention the values of the Code as well as membersâ€™ rights and responsibilities</li>
<li>Make recommendations regarding situations which have the general effect of violating the rights of members<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<div style="position: absolute; left: -10000px; width: 9000px; top: 0px;"><li style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; font-family: Arial, 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, sans-serif; list-style: square outside; color: rgb(78, 78, 78); line-height: 20px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">Advise members who are experiencing a problem related to another memberâ€™s behaviour on campus</li>
<li style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; font-family: Arial, 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, sans-serif; list-style: square outside; color: rgb(78, 78, 78); line-height: 20px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">Assist members in addressing behavioural incidents and conflicts on campus<br>
Responses may range from the use of informal dispute resolution methods to formal procedures for adjudicating complaints.<br>
Remedies and sanctions attempt to restore harmony, collegiality, and cooperation.</li>
<li style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; font-family: Arial, 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, sans-serif; list-style: square outside; color: rgb(78, 78, 78); line-height: 20px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">Coordinate a procedure for identifying and managing behaviour that may pose a danger, and direct the Universityâ€™s response to urgent cases</li>
<li style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; font-family: Arial, 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, sans-serif; list-style: square outside; color: rgb(78, 78, 78); line-height: 20px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">Promote through education and direct intervention the values of the Code as well as membersâ€™ rights and responsibilities</li>
<li style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; font-family: Arial, 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, sans-serif; list-style: square outside; color: rgb(78, 78, 78); line-height: 20px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">Make recommendations regarding situations which have the general effect of violating the rights of members</li>
</div>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">The Code of Rights and Responsibilities</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The&nbsp;<a href="/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/BD-3.pdf" adhocenable="false">Code of Rights and Responsibilities (PDF)</a>&nbsp;is intended to promote and protect the values of civility, equity, respect, non-discrimination and an appreciation of diversity as well as support members who have experienced or are experiencing conduct that violates these fundamental values. All members may reasonably expect to pursue their work, studies, and other activities related to University life in a safe and civil environment. As such, members are expected to refrain from violating the Code. The following offences are prohibited under the Code:</p>
<ul>
<i><li>Abuse of computer privileges</li>
<li>Discrimination or communication of a discriminatory manner</li>
<li>Forgery or altering university documents</li>
<li>Harassment (psychological, sexual)</li>
<li>Hazing</li>
<li>Illegal offenses occurring in the University context</li>
<li>Misuse of the University name or logo</li>
<li>Obstruction or disruption of university activity</li>
<li>Possession of controlled substances or weapons</li>
<li>Theft or wilful damage of property</li>
<li>Threatening or violent conduct</li>
<li>Trespassing</li>
</i></ul>
<p>(For a complete list of infractions and procedures, please <a href="/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/BD-3.pdf" adhocenable="false">consult the Code (PDF)</a>).</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">When to consult the Office</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you have a problem related to someoneâ€™s behaviour on campus and you are not sure how to deal with it, the Office can help you evaluate your options and make an informed choice of what steps to take.</p>
<ul>
<li>Any University member may consult the Office</li>
<li>Consultations are confidential</li>
<li>The Advisor is impartial</li>
<li>The Office is independent in carrying out its duties</li>
</ul>
<p>You do not have to file a complaint in order to get information or advice. In most cases informal resolution is both possible and desirable. If the situation warrants, the Advisor can guide you on how to proceed with a formal complaint. If it is necessary to file a formal complaint, the Code places great emphasis on fairness and natural justice.</p>
<p>You may also get advice for situations that may be happening off campus. Although the University cannot intervene in these situations, the Advisor will try to give you information, advice and support.</p>
<p>The full text of the Code can be found in the University calendars and&nbsp;online in <a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/common/docs/policies/official-policies/BD-3.pdf" target="_blank">English</a> and in <a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/common/docs/politiques/BD-3.pdf" target="_blank">French</a>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Contact us for an appointment</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Tel.: (514) 848-2424 ext. 8659<br>
Fax: (514) 848-4515<br>
Email:&nbsp;<a href="mailto:rights@concordia.ca">rights@concordia.ca</a></p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">

<div class="mboxDefault" id="content-concordia-en-students-rights-sidebar-picker">

<script type="text/javascript">
	var mboxId = 'content-concordia-en-students-rights-sidebar-picker';
	var mboxName = 'content-concordia-en-students-rights-sidebar-picker';
	var mboxLocation = '/content/concordia/en/students/rights/jcr:content/sidebar/picker';
	var wcmMode = 'DISABLED';

	if ( typeof mboxDefine == 'function' && wcmMode !== 'ANALYTICS' ) {
		var callParameters = [ mboxId ];
		var callFunction;
		var replaced = false;
	
		
				callFunction = mboxCreate;
		
		
		
		var staticParameters = {};
		
		for ( var key in staticParameters )
			callParameters.push(key  + '=' + staticParameters[key]);
		
		if ( !replaced ) { // do not define the same mbox twice, this leads to additional JS calls
			callFunction.apply(undefined, callParameters);
		}
		
		
		
		if ( callFunction == mboxDefine ) {
		    
		    // if the campaign store is available at this time we are most likely simulating
		    // so trigger an update if the (auto) campaign is selected
            var campaignStore = ClientContext.get("campaign");
            if ( campaignStore && !campaignStore.isCampaignSelected() ) {
                CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.triggerUpdate();
            }
    		
    		// wait for 2 seconds for the T&T answer to come in to prevent page flicker issues
    		// also see the overlay of mbox.protoype.setOffer which completes this
    		setTimeout(function() {
    		    CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.showDefaultMboxContent(mboxId, mboxName);
    		}, 2000);
		}
	}
	
	
		
</script>
</div>

<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark " style="background-color: #F0F0F0 !important;  color: # !important;  margin: 10px 0px 30px 0px; padding: 20px;">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '><a href="http://security.concordia.ca/">Call Security if:</a></h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>there is an emergency on campus</li>
<li>someone is being extremely disruptive and refuses to leave the area when asked to do so</li>
<li>someone threatens violence or is violent</li>
<li>you feel that you are in danger</li>
</ul>
<h5>&nbsp;</h5>
<h5><b>Security: 514-848-3717</b></h5>

</div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">    
        





<div class="breadcrumb breadcrumbs">

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Preferred name requests</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The Preferred Name procedure enables students to use an alternate preferred name for certain purposes while studying at Concordia when they have personal reasons for not wanting to use their legal names.</p>
<p>The preferred name may be used on all unofficial university documents and tools, such as:</p>
<ul>
<li>Student ID card</li>
<li>Class lists</li>
<li>Moodle</li>
<li>Exam rosters</li>
<li>Printed student records</li>
</ul>
<p>The studentâ€™s <a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/NamesGuide.pdf">legal name</a> must appear on official university documents, such as:</p>
<ul>
<li>University transcript</li>
<li>Reports to government</li>
<li>Letters of attestation</li>
<li>Diplomas and certificates</li>
</ul>
<p>Applying for preferred name use at Concordia does not change a studentâ€™s legal name or records with government authorities.</p>
<p>Students may request this service in strict confidence by scheduling an appointment with the <a adhocenable="false" href="/offices/registrar.html">Office of the Registrar</a> at 514-848-2424, ext. 7372. In the privacy of this appointment, the student will be asked to provide a valid ID and sign a â€œRequest to use Preferred Nameâ€? form. A new Student ID card will be created at the <a adhocenable="false" href="/offices/birks.html">Birks Student Service Centre</a>, which will notify the student for pick-up when it is ready. The preferred name will then be used on all unofficial documents in the future.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image " id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/preferred-name-requests/jcr:content/sidebar/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="related-office-63x50" alt="related-office-63x50" class="cq-dd-image" src="/students/preferred-name-requests/_jcr_content/sidebar/textimage/image.img.png/1383929140531.png"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/preferred-name-requests/jcr:content/sidebar/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/common/icons/63x50/related-office-63x50.png", imageTitle: "related\x2Doffice\x2D63x50" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    <h1 class="span8 section-header">Campus buildings</h1>

    
    <div class="span8">
        <p>Building Concordia University is a long-term project. We have been doing it for&nbsp;<a href="/about/history.html" adhocenable="false">over a hundred years</a>&nbsp;and weâ€™re still at it â€“ to deliver new and improved facilities to create the best possible learning, teaching and research environment.</p>

<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<a href="/maps/roots.html"><h2 class="section-header ">Concordia's roots</h2></a>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt3"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c0 span4"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p style="font-size: 18px; line-height: 24px;">In 1974 Concordia grew out of a merger of<i> Loyola College</i> and <i>Sir George Williams University</i>, two institutions with a proud history of providing education in Montreal.&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c1 span4"><div class="parbase vignette section">

















<div class="c-vignette" data-href="/maps/roots.html" >
    <div class="box">
	    <div class="title">Loyola
	    
	        <span>
	            Learn more
	        </span>
	    
	    </div>
	</div>      
	<img title="Loyola-archival-farmland-303x242" alt="Loyola-archival-farmland-303x242" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/maps/buildings/_jcr_content/content-main/vignette_15/image.img.jpg/1380030433518.jpg">
	
</div>

</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c2 span4"><div class="parbase vignette section">

















<div class="c-vignette" data-href="/maps/roots.html" >
    <div class="box">
	    <div class="title">Sir George Williams
	    
	        <span>
	            Learn more
	        </span>
	    
	    </div>
	</div>      
	<img title="Hall-Building-Under-Construction---P1840201-303x242" alt="Hall-Building-Under-Construction---P1840201-303x242" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/maps/buildings/_jcr_content/content-main/vignette_16/image.img.jpg/1380030464018.jpg">
	
</div>

</div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">

We have two daycares on our campuses and a resource centre for student parents. Financial assistance for child care expenses is available for eligible students through the Quebec Financial Aid/Loans and Bursaries program and through the Minist&egrave;re de la Famille et de l'enfance">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Child care centres</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Concordia offers several services to both student parents, faculty and staff. We have two daycares on our campuses and a resource centre for student parents.</p>
<p>Financial assistance for child care expenses is available for eligible students through the Quebec Financial Aid/Loans and Bursaries program and through the MinistÃ¨re de la Famille et de l'enfance.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Daycares</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>Centre de la Petite Enfance Concordia (Sir George Williams campus)</b><br>
<i>*parents may enroll children 18 months to 5 years of age</i></p>
<p>1185 St. Mathieu, GN-110<br>
Telephone: 514-848-2424 ext. 8789<br>
Email:&nbsp;<a href="mailto:pec@alcor.concordia.ca">pec@alcor.concordia.ca</a></p>
<p><b>Centre de la Petite Enfance Pâ€™tits Profs&nbsp;(Loyola Campus)</b><br>
<i>*parents may enroll children 3 months to 5 years of age</i></p>
<p>3500 - 3502 Belmore<br>
Telephone: 514-848-2424 ext. 7788<br>
Email:&nbsp;<a href="mailto:glpp@alcor.concordia.ca">glpp@alcor.concordia.ca</a><br>
</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn  " href="http://lesptitsprofs.wordpress.com/" target="_blank">Visit CPE P'tits Profs website</a>

</div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Concordia University Student Parent Centre</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The CUSPC:</p>
<ul>
<li>Provides support and services to help student parents achieve their goals</li>
<li>Offers a safe and accessible space to congregate, study, voice concerns, share interests and develop a support network</li>
<li>Features a comfortable lounge with couches and a microwave, computers with internet access and a play area for children</li>
<li>Provides referrals and resources for such things as childcare, financial aid and housing</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn  " href="http://cusp.concordia.ca/" target="_blank">Visit CUSP website</a>

</div>


</div>

            </div>

                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase target section">

<script type="text/javascript">
	var mboxId = 'content-concordia-en-campus-life-daycares-sidebar-picker';
	var mboxName = 'content-concordia-en-campus-life-daycares-sidebar-picker';
	var mboxLocation = '/content/concordia/en/campus-life/daycares/jcr:content/sidebar/picker';
	var wcmMode = 'DISABLED';

	if ( typeof mboxDefine == 'function' && wcmMode !== 'ANALYTICS' ) {
		var callParameters = [ mboxId ];
		var callFunction;
		var replaced = false;
	
		
				callFunction = mboxCreate;
		
		
		
		var staticParameters = {};
		
		for ( var key in staticParameters )
			callParameters.push(key  + '=' + staticParameters[key]);
		
		if ( !replaced ) { // do not define the same mbox twice, this leads to additional JS calls
			callFunction.apply(undefined, callParameters);
		}
		
		
		
		if ( callFunction == mboxDefine ) {
		    
		    // if the campaign store is available at this time we are most likely simulating
		    // so trigger an update if the (auto) campaign is selected
            var campaignStore = ClientContext.get("campaign");
            if ( campaignStore && !campaignStore.isCampaignSelected() ) {
                CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.triggerUpdate();
            }
    		
    		// wait for 2 seconds for the T&T answer to come in to prevent page flicker issues
    		// also see the overlay of mbox.protoype.setOffer which completes this
    		setTimeout(function() {
    		    CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.showDefaultMboxContent(mboxId, mboxName);
    		}, 2000);
		}
	}
	
	
		
</script>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Requesting official transcripts</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase target section">








<div class="mboxDefault" id="content-concordia-en-students-records-transcripts-request-official-transcripts-content-main-multi_step">
    
</div>


<script type="text/javascript">
	var mboxId = 'content-concordia-en-students-records-transcripts-request-official-transcripts-content-main-multi_step';
	var mboxName = 'content-concordia-en-students-records-transcripts-request-official-transcripts-content-main-multi_step';
	var mboxLocation = '/content/concordia/en/students/records/transcripts/request-official-transcripts/jcr:content/content-main/multi_step';
	var wcmMode = 'DISABLED';

	if ( typeof mboxDefine == 'function' && wcmMode !== 'ANALYTICS' ) {
		var callParameters = [ mboxId ];
		var callFunction;
		var replaced = false;
	
		
				callFunction = mboxCreate;
		
		
		
		var staticParameters = {};
		
		for ( var key in staticParameters )
			callParameters.push(key  + '=' + staticParameters[key]);
		
		if ( !replaced ) { // do not define the same mbox twice, this leads to additional JS calls
			callFunction.apply(undefined, callParameters);
		}
		
		
		
		if ( callFunction == mboxDefine ) {
		    
		    // if the campaign store is available at this time we are most likely simulating
		    // so trigger an update if the (auto) campaign is selected
            var campaignStore = ClientContext.get("campaign");
            if ( campaignStore && !campaignStore.isCampaignSelected() ) {
                CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.triggerUpdate();
            }
    		
    		// wait for 2 seconds for the T&T answer to come in to prevent page flicker issues
    		// also see the overlay of mbox.protoype.setOffer which completes this
    		setTimeout(function() {
    		    CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.showDefaultMboxContent(mboxId, mboxName);
    		}, 2000);
		}
	}
	
	
		
</script>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Requesting an official transcript consists of three steps:</p>
<ul>
<li>Fill out the form</li>
<li>Submit the form</li>
<li>Arrange for delivery of transcripts</li>
</ul>
<p>Please note: <b>an o</b><b>verdue student account balance at Concordia </b>is the only thing that will prevent you from receiving your transcripts. Your transcripts will not be released if you have an overdue balance. &nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li>Check your account balance on <a adhocenable="false" href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/">MyConcordia</a>, and pay any outstanding balance if necessary.<b></b></li>
<li>We release transcripts on the first business day after your payment appears on your student account.</li>
<li>If you are a student in a Master's or PhD program, transcripts will be released under <a href="/admissions/tuition-fees/how-fees-are-billed/graduate/obligations.html#transcript" adhocenable="false">special circumstances outlined on the Tuition &amp; fees webpage</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="transcript-request-form"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Filling out the transcript request form">
					
                    Filling out the transcript request form
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Please download, print, complete and sign the <a href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/birks/tranform.pdf" adhocenable="false">Transcript of Academic Record Request form</a>.</p>
<ul>
<li>Fill out a separate form for each institution that you would like the transcript(s) sent to. &nbsp;</li>
<li>We normally send Official transcripts directly to the institution requiring them</li>
<li>We can also place the transcript in a sealed envelope and either mail it to you, or</li>
<li>You can pick it up at the Birks Student Service Centre.</li>
</ul>
<p>When you fill out the form, please make sure to:</p>
<ul>
<li>Print clearly and remember to sign both sections of the form.</li>
<li>Your signature is required to release the transcript(s).</li>
</ul>
<p>Incomplete or illegible forms will cause delays in processing your request.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Fees</h3>
<p>The fee for official transcripts is $7.00 per sealed envelope with a maximum of 3 copies per envelope.</p>
<p>If multiple copies are to be placed separately in individually sealed envelopes (i.e one copy per envelope vs multiple copies in the same envelope), please indicate the number of copies and to seal them individually on the request form. The cost for each envelope is $7.00.</p>
<p>If required, a student copy of the transcript is available for an additional $3.00. Please indicate this on your request form. All fees include regular postage and taxes.&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>To request transcripts on someoneâ€™s behalf</h3>
<p><b>Written authorization â€”</b>&nbsp;signed by the Concordia student, alumnus or alumna â€” must be provided along with the completed request form, if someone plans to make a transcript request by proxy, on someone elseâ€™s behalf.&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">

    <div class="item ">
        <a name="submit-transcript-request"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Submit your transcript request">
					
                    Submit your transcript request
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   horizontalLines">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">

1400 De Maisonneuve W.</p>
<p><b>Payment:</b> You can pay by money order, VISA, MasterCard, American Express or Debit Card.</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><th width="25%">By fax</th>
<td><p>514-848-2616</p>
<p><b>Payment:</b> Include payment by Visa, MasterCard or American Express (e<i>xcluding debit credit cards, i.e., TD, CIBC, and US Debit Credit Card)</i>. The credit card number, the expiry date and the card holderâ€™s signature are required.</p>
<p>Please note that <b>duplicate fax requests </b>will be considered as individual requests and will be charged accordingly.</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><th width="25%">By mail</th>
<td><p>Concordia University<br>
Att: Transcript Department; Room LB 700<br>
1455 De Maisonneuve Blvd. West<br>
Montreal, Quebec, H3G 1M8</p>
<p><b>Payment:</b> Include payment by cheque or money order (payable to Concordia University), or VISA, MasterCard or American Express (e<i>xcluding debit credit cards, i.e., TD, CIBC , and US Debit Credit Card)</i>. Payment by credit card requires the card number, the expiry date as well as the card holderâ€™s signature.</p>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>

        </div>
    </div>

<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="receiving-transcripts"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Receiving your transcripts">
					
                    Receiving your transcripts
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Confirming requests</h3>
<p>Unfortunately, we cannot confirm the receipt of each request received. Please contact us&nbsp;directly <a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:transcripts@concordia.ca">by email</a> or phone (514-848-2424, ext. 2630) if you would like confirmation that your request has been received.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Processing time</h3>
<p>It can take up to&nbsp;<b>3 to 5 working days</b> to process transcripts. It may take longer for pre-1980 records and during peak periods (i.e. before an admission application deadline).</p>
<p><b>Be sure to submit your request well in advance of your deadline dates.</b></p>
<h3>Pick-up in person</h3>
<p>Contact us first to confirm that the transcript is ready for pick-up or visit the Birks Student Service Centre after the five-day processing time has passed (unless otherwise specified).</p>
<h3>By mail</h3>
<p>Official transcripts are normally sent by regular mail. If we send you official transcripts, they arrive in a large brown envelope which can be opened. The sealed transcripts are inside.</p>
<h3>Electronic delivery</h3>
<p>Transcripts destined to other universities in Quebec are sent electronically.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>By courier</h3>
<p>Courier service can be provided for an additional fee, depending on the destination. Here is the current list of courier companies we use and their fees.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   horizontalLines">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">

						<a href="/maps/directions.html" role="button">Directions</a>
	            </li>

            	
            	<li class="dropdown ">
					
						<a href="/maps/shuttle-bus.html" role="button">Shuttle bus</a>
	            </li>

            	
            	<li class="dropdown ">
					
						<a href="/maps/parking.html" role="button">Parking</a>
	            </li>
        </ul>
	</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

                    Home
                </a>
