            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Concordia's roots</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>In 1974 Concordia grew out of a merger of<i> Loyola College</i> and <i>Sir George Williams University</i>, two institutions with a proud history of providing education in Montreal.</p>
<h2>Loyola</h2>
<p>Loyola College grew out of the English-language program of CollÃ¨ge Sainte-Marie, a Jesuit college founded in 1848. Loyola College became a separate institution in 1896. Loyola was first located at Bleury and Ste-Catherine then on Drummond south of Ste-Catherine before it built on land it acquired in 1900 in the west end. The College moved into the three original buildings on the current Loyola Campus in 1916.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/maps/roots/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="roots" alt="roots" class="cq-dd-image" src="/maps/roots/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1376328539314.jpg"></div><small>Loyola Campus under construction, 1915. On the left is the Refectory, and on the right is the Junior (now Psychology) Building. Photographer: F. J. Topp. Concordia University Archives I147-02-87</small>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h2>Sir George Williams</h2>
<p>Sir George Williams University originated in the evening classes offered by a YMCA Educational Program that began in 1851 and continued in various YMCA facilities in downtown Monteal. The program became a co-educational college in 1926, introducing university-level courses in 1929. The first university degrees were conferred in 1936 and the University Charter under which Concordia currently grants degrees was received in 1948.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/maps/sgw-campus.html'>SGW Campus</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/maps/loyola-campus.html'>Loyola Campus</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/maps/buildings.html'>Buildings</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''></li></ul></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/maps/directions.html'>Directions</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/maps/shuttle-bus.html'>Shuttle bus</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/maps/parking.html'>Parking</a></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Other records &amp; course descriptions</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The transcripts department can provide you with <a adhocenable="false" href="#ug">Undergraduate Course Descriptions</a><b>.</b></p>
<p>For all other requests, we can help direct&nbsp;you to the appropriate office.</p>
<h3><a name="ug"></a>Undergraduate Course Descriptions</h3>
<p>A course description is a brief description of the course and is not considered as a course outline or syllabus. Course descriptions for the current academic year and the six previous years can be found in our <a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar.html">Undergraduate Calendars available on-line</a>.&nbsp;</p>
<p>We can provide general undergraduate course descriptions for earlier years at a cost of $5.00 per academic year. Please <a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:transcripts@concordia.ca">contact us</a> for information on how to obtain older course descriptions.</p>
<h3>Graduate Course Descriptions</h3>
<p>To obtain Graduate course descriptions please contact the appropriate <a href="/academics/graduate/program-contacts.html" adhocenable="false">graduate department</a>.</p>
<h3>Student Record</h3>
<p>A record is a comprehensive report of a student's academic history at the University. It is a complete academic record and includes all courses followed at Concordia. If only a student record (unofficial transcript) is required, one can be obtained at the <a adhocenable="false" href="/offices/birks.html">Birks Student Service Centre</a> or by faxing a signed request to the Office of the Registrar at 514-848-2621. Students are also able to access their student record through <a href="https://myconcordia.ca/">MyConcordia </a>.</p>
<h3>Centre for Continuing Education Transcripts</h3>
<p>Please visit the <a adhocenable="false" href="http://cce.concordia.ca">Centre for Continuing Education</a> for information on requesting a transcript.</p>
<h3><a name="degree-verification-requests"></a>Degree Verification Requests</h3>
<p>We can provide external organizations with information on degrees conferred to former Concordia students for employment, educational&nbsp; or immigration purposes, etc. You may submit your request by&nbsp;fax (514-848-2621)<b>&nbsp;</b>providing that you include<b> </b>signed authorization from the student.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase box section">

    <hr>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Master space program (SGW campus)</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>The program for the Sir George Williams Campus includes:</b></p>

</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/maps/master-space-program/sgw/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="ev" alt="ev" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/maps/master-space-program/sgw/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1379428360405.jpg"></div>
</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Construction of the high-profile <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/buildings/ev.html">Engineering, Computer Science, and Visual Arts Integrated Complex</a> (two towers and 67,859 square metres) at the northeast corner of Ste-Catherine and Guy at a cost of $172M, opened in September 2005.</li>
<li>Major renovations to the <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/buildings/h.html">Hall Building</a> began on the 8<sup>th</sup> floor in 2004 and continued on the 7<sup>th</sup>, 11<sup>th</sup>, and 12<sup>th</sup> floors in 2005, at a cost of approximately $13M. Elevators were replaced in 2007-2008 with larger units and the aging escalators were replaced in 2011-12.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Phase 1 of the renovation of the Visual Arts building on RenÃ©-LÃ©vesque was completed in 2006/2007 at a total cost of $2M to adapt and reorganize the space to accommodate those Fine Arts departments that did not move to the new Visual Arts tower in 2005, and to move the MFA programs.</li>
<li>The 15-storey <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/buildings/mb.html">John Molson School of Business Building</a> was completed in 2009 on target and on budget.</li>
<li>The adjacent <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/buildings/td.html">TD Bank Building</a> facing on Ste-Catherine was donated to Concordia by TD Canada Trust in 2005 and, at a later date, it will be refitted for university facilities.</li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/about/quartier-concordia.html">Quartier Concordia</a> is an urban design project initiated in 2003 to reinforce the institutional identity of Concordia in the downtown core. Work has begun on this long-term project that will be phased in over many years and will be carried out in cooperation with the City of Montreal.</li>
<li>Work has been completed for Phase 1 of renovations to the recently acquired <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/buildings/gn.html">Grey Nuns Motherhouse</a> and 227 students moved into the newly adapted residence facilities in September 2007.&nbsp; Planning work continues to adapt this heritage property to Concordiaâ€™s needs as the different parts of the complex are turned over to Concordia.</li>
</ul>
<div>&nbsp;</div>

</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Recladding is planned for the exterior of the <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/buildings/gm.html">Guy-MÃ©tro building</a> in 2011-12 to both carry out needed repairs and to create visual continuity with adjacent new Concordia buildings on Guy Street.&nbsp;</li>
<li>By 2009-10 many administrative departments moved into the Guy MÃ©tro Building.</li>
<li>By 2009-10 most of the Humanities academic departments were consolidated in the McConnell Building, with the Social Sciences departments concentrated in the Hall Building.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/maps/master-space-program/sgw/jcr:content/content-main/image_0"><img title="gm" alt="gm" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/maps/master-space-program/sgw/_jcr_content/content-main/image_0.img.jpg/1379428475554.jpg"></div>
</div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Concordia is now connected more fully to Montrealâ€™s Underground City and to its own network of downtown buildings thanks to the building of two new tunnels connecting its major buildings to the Guy-Concordia Metro station.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div>Current and projected construction and renovation projects are all designed to ensure that physical facilities are well suited to excellence in teaching and research and the evolving space needs of Concordia. &nbsp;</div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/maps/master-space-program/sgw.html'>Master space program (SGW campus)</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/maps/master-space-program/loyola.html'>Master space program (Loyola campus)</a></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    <div class="container">
    
        <div class="row with_socialbar">

            <div class="share-this">

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Master space program (Loyola campus)</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>The program for the Loyola campus includes:</b></p>

</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>The construction of the 33,000 square meter&nbsp;<a href="/maps/buildings/sp.html">Richard J. Renaud Science Complex</a>&nbsp;as a teaching and research facility for various arts and science departments. This was completed at a cost of $85M and the building was officially opened in September 2003.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/maps/master-space-program/loyola/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="communications" alt="communications" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/maps/master-space-program/loyola/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1379429092800.jpg"></div>
</div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>The major renovation and expansion of the former Drummond Science building to relocate the departments of <a href="/maps/buildings/cj.html" adhocenable="false">Communication Studies and Journalism</a>. These renovations were carried out at a cost of $20M and the building was occupied in September 2005.</li>
<li>Renovation of the <a href="/maps/buildings/vl.html" adhocenable="false">Vanier Library Extension</a> to provide teaching and research facilities, including the construction of multi-functional high-tech classrooms, to be used by the Department of Applied Human Sciences. This work was completed in the summer of 2005 at a cost of $1.1M.</li>
<li>Upgrading of the <a href="/maps/buildings/ra.html" adhocenable="false">Sports Complex</a> included the installation of state-of-the-art artificial surfaces to create two new playing fields; installation of permanent outdoor lighting for the playing fields; and installation of temporary stands to replace deteriorating stadium seating ($2M). Plans are underway for a major $60M expansion and renovation of the existing Sports Centre. New features will include: an eight-lane swimming pool, three gyms, a multi-function area, fitness centre, running track, new stands, renovation of the arena, and a sports medicine clinic.</li>
<li><a href="/campus-life/residences/jesuit-residence.html" adhocenable="false">The Jesuit Residence</a> was completely renovated to provide 52 new residence bedrooms for occupancy in August 2006 at a cost of $1.6M. This is Phase 1 of a long-term project to provide increased student residence facilities.</li>
<li>Loyolaâ€™s outdoor landscape is receiving attention for the first time in many decades.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Campus art</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/maps/master-space-program/loyola/jcr:content/content-main/image_0"><img title="loyola" alt="loyola" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/maps/master-space-program/loyola/_jcr_content/content-main/image_0.img.jpg/1379429128853.jpg"></div>
</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The impressive bronze outdoor sculpture <i>The Emergence of the Chief</i> by Dave McGary was installed in October 2005 in the courtyard area on the west side of the campus created by the Richard J. Renaud Science Complex and the Communications Studies and Journalism Building.&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Campus trees</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Following a detailed tree inventory of the Loyola Campus, there are plans for ongoing monitoring and the planting of more trees, working in tandem with the City of Montreal. Parking facilities and outdoor spaces are also being re-organized in keeping with the changing face of the west-end campus.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/maps/master-space-program/sgw.html'>Master space program (SGW campus)</a></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/maps/master-space-program/loyola.html'>Master space program (Loyola campus)</a></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                    Home
                </a>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Master space program</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>In the late 1990s Concordia developed a bold strategic plan to meet changing space needs and manage growth over the coming decades.&nbsp; The Master Space Development Program for 2000-2010 includes a complete assessment of facilities, new buildings, renovation of existing facilities, and a move to university-owned rather than rented buildings.&nbsp; Space planning and development continue to evolve dynamically to meet the rapidly changing needs of the University.&nbsp;Work continues on space norms and admissible space.&nbsp; Concordia has made great strides on approaching the norms for admissible occupied space in the past five years, from a starting point well below the norms.&nbsp;</p>
<p><img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/grey-nuns.jpg" style="float: right;"></p>
<p>Planning continues for the Grey Nuns facility.&nbsp; Concordia took over additional parts of the complex in 2011 and we must be ready to move forward to adapt the space to our needs while retaining the character of these historic buildings.</p>
<p>Concordia invests in <i>academic</i> buildings but there are ongoing discussions for possible development of residence facilities in partnership with private developers.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Exterior signage and identification of all Concordia owned and rented facilities began in the summer of 2007 using the new Concordia logo and branding approved in January 2007.&nbsp; The new signage is designed to provide more consistent and effective identification signage throughout both campuses, and directional signage for the Loyola Campus.&nbsp; The changes were phased in over 2007-09.</p>
<p><i>Moving Ahead</i> is Concordiaâ€™s academic plan for 2005-2010.&nbsp; This academic strategy and vision for Concordia follows the major restructuring of the University and rapidly increasing enrolment of the last decade, and it is the result of an extended academic planning exercise designed to achieve broad consensus on Concordiaâ€™s future.&nbsp; A major component of this ambitious plan for academic growth and development is â€œproviding cutting-edge research and teaching facilitiesâ€?.&nbsp; The master space development program is an essential component of this academic plan for Concordia, â€œCanadaâ€™s University for the 21<sup>st</sup> Centuryâ€?.</p>
<h2>Master Space Development Program 2000-2010</h2>
<ul>
<li><a href="http://www-redesign-dev.concordia.ca/about/major-projects/campus/master-space-program/sgw/">Sir George Williams Campus </a></li>
<li><a href="http://www-redesign-dev.concordia.ca/about/major-projects/campus/master-space-program/loyola/">Loyola Campus</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Master space program (SGW campus)</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>The program for the Sir George Williams Campus includes:</b></p>

</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/maps/master-space-program/sgw/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="ev" alt="ev" class="cq-dd-image" src="/maps/master-space-program/sgw/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1379428360405.jpg"></div>
</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Construction of the high-profile <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/buildings/ev.html">Engineering, Computer Science, and Visual Arts Integrated Complex</a> (two towers and 67,859 square metres) at the northeast corner of Ste-Catherine and Guy at a cost of $172M, opened in September 2005.</li>
<li>Major renovations to the <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/buildings/h.html">Hall Building</a> began on the 8<sup>th</sup> floor in 2004 and continued on the 7<sup>th</sup>, 11<sup>th</sup>, and 12<sup>th</sup> floors in 2005, at a cost of approximately $13M. Elevators were replaced in 2007-2008 with larger units and the aging escalators were replaced in 2011-12.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Phase 1 of the renovation of the Visual Arts building on RenÃ©-LÃ©vesque was completed in 2006/2007 at a total cost of $2M to adapt and reorganize the space to accommodate those Fine Arts departments that did not move to the new Visual Arts tower in 2005, and to move the MFA programs.</li>
<li>The 15-storey <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/buildings/mb.html">John Molson School of Business Building</a> was completed in 2009 on target and on budget.</li>
<li>The adjacent <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/buildings/td.html">TD Bank Building</a> facing on Ste-Catherine was donated to Concordia by TD Canada Trust in 2005 and, at a later date, it will be refitted for university facilities.</li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/about/quartier-concordia.html">Quartier Concordia</a> is an urban design project initiated in 2003 to reinforce the institutional identity of Concordia in the downtown core. Work has begun on this long-term project that will be phased in over many years and will be carried out in cooperation with the City of Montreal.</li>
<li>Work has been completed for Phase 1 of renovations to the recently acquired <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/buildings/gn.html">Grey Nuns Motherhouse</a> and 227 students moved into the newly adapted residence facilities in September 2007.&nbsp; Planning work continues to adapt this heritage property to Concordiaâ€™s needs as the different parts of the complex are turned over to Concordia.</li>
</ul>
<div>&nbsp;</div>

</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Recladding is planned for the exterior of the <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/buildings/gm.html">Guy-MÃ©tro building</a> in 2011-12 to both carry out needed repairs and to create visual continuity with adjacent new Concordia buildings on Guy Street.&nbsp;</li>
<li>By 2009-10 many administrative departments moved into the Guy MÃ©tro Building.</li>
<li>By 2009-10 most of the Humanities academic departments were consolidated in the McConnell Building, with the Social Sciences departments concentrated in the Hall Building.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/maps/master-space-program/sgw/jcr:content/content-main/image_0"><img title="gm" alt="gm" class="cq-dd-image" src="/maps/master-space-program/sgw/_jcr_content/content-main/image_0.img.jpg/1379428475554.jpg"></div>
</div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Concordia is now connected more fully to Montrealâ€™s Underground City and to its own network of downtown buildings thanks to the building of two new tunnels connecting its major buildings to the Guy-Concordia Metro station.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div>Current and projected construction and renovation projects are all designed to ensure that physical facilities are well suited to excellence in teaching and research and the evolving space needs of Concordia. &nbsp;</div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/maps/master-space-program/sgw.html'>Master space program (SGW campus)</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/maps/master-space-program/loyola.html'>Master space program (Loyola campus)</a></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Henry F. Hall Building</h1>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase gallery section">





<div style="clear:both;display:block;">

<div class="camera_wrap camera_black_skin" id="camera_wrap_gallery">
    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/hall/hall1.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/hall/hall1.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">

    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/hall/hall3.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/hall/hall3.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">

    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/hall/hall6.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/hall/hall6.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"></div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt1"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c0 span9"><div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The Henry F. Hall Building is a high-density hub of Concordiaâ€™s downtown campus. It is a utilitarian, cube-shaped, 1960s-style high-rise university building made of pre-fabricated stressed concrete.</p>
<p>In 1994-95 the exterior of the building, damaged by time, acid rain and the elements, was cleaned and painted, and windows were repaired; other major repairs took place in 1998-99. The Hall Building is undergoing much-needed major renovations and updating. The eighth floor got a spiffy facelift in 2003-04, and the seventh, eleventh and twelfth floors were done in 2005. The building once again features state-of-the-art media-equipped classrooms and the center core of the renovated floors has been opened up to create light-infused people spaces. Renovations and upgrading of the remaining floors will take place over the next several years, with renovations to the tenth floor next on the schedule. The new School of General Studies will move to this area.</p>
<p>Meanwhile, auditoria throughout the building have been renovated and more 100-seat classroom spaces will be added to the upper floors in 2008. Elevators were replaced in 2007-2008 with larger units and the aging escalators were replaced in 2011-12. The building has been equipped with wireless access, and renovations and upgrading of classrooms continues as funding becomes available.</p>
<p>In 2009-10, most Social Sciences academic departments were concentrated in the Hall Building.</p>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c1 span3"></div></div><div style="clear:both"></div>

</div>

        </div>
    </div>

</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/renaud/renaud1.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/renaud/renaud1.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">

    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/renaud/renaud2.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/renaud/renaud2.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/renaud/renaud3.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/renaud/renaud3.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/renaud/renaud4.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/renaud/renaud4.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/renaud/renaud5.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/renaud/renaud5.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/renaud/renaud6.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/renaud/renaud6.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
</div>

   
</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"></div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt1"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c0 span9"><div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The Richard J. Renaud Science Complex has changed the face of Concordia's west-end campus. This state-of-the-art teaching and research facility is a lynchpin of the Loyola Campus revitalization. The $85 million purpose-built complex includes teaching facilities, offices, and laboratories for various science departments. The avant-garde design promotes interdisciplinarity and innovation in one of the top university sciences facilities in Canada. The award-winning building also features energy-efficient sustainable architecture. The Complex includes the former Bryan Building (built in 1968), which has been completely renovated and fully integrated into the new structure.</p>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c1 span3"></div></div><div style="clear:both"></div>

</div>

        </div>
    </div>

</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                    Home
                </a>

	        </li>
	        &nbsp;&gt;&nbsp;
	        <li>
                <a href="/maps/buildings/mb.html" onclick="CQ_Analytics.record({event:'followBreadcrumb',values: { breadcrumbPath: '/content/concordia/en/maps/buildings/mb' },collect: false,options: { obj: this },componentPath: 'concordia/components/breadcrumb'})">
                    John Molson School of Business Building
                </a>
	        </li>
	        
</ul></div>

    </div>

</header>

<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>John Molson School of Business Building</H1>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase gallery section">





<div style="clear:both;display:block;">
   
   





<script type="text/javascript" src="/etc/designs/concordia/clientlibs/gallery/slideshow.min.js"></script>

<div class="camera_wrap camera_black_skin" id="camera_wrap_gallery">
    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/jmsb/jmsb1.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/jmsb/jmsb1.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/jmsb/jmsb2.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/jmsb/jmsb2.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/jmsb/jmsb3.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/jmsb/jmsb3.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/jmsb/jmsb4.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/jmsb/jmsb4.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/jmsb/jmsb5.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/jmsb/jmsb5.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/jmsb/jmsb6.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/jmsb/jmsb6.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
</div>

   
</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"></div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt1"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c0 span9"><div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>In 2009 the John Molson School of Business Building officially opened on the corner of Guy and de Maisonneuve. It includes digitally equipped teaching amphitheatres and classrooms, faculty and graduate student offices, the Office of the Dean, student and faculty social space, as well as space for privatized programs. Special features also include case study rooms designed for group work, and laboratories for consumer behaviour research.</p>
<p>Set on a tight footprint typical of a downtown property, the building is 15 storeys high, with two basement levels. The distinctive design features two-storey stacked atria, a vertically interconnected ground floor concourse, and a tunnel running under Guy Street connecting to the MÃ©tro and the new Engineering, Computer Science and Visual Arts Integrated Complex.</p>
<p>Visit the<a href="http://johnmolson.concordia.ca/"> John Molson School of Business website</a>.</p>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c1 span3"></div></div><div style="clear:both"></div>

</div>

        </div>
    </div>

</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Communications &amp; Journalism Building</h1>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase gallery section">

<div class="camera_wrap camera_black_skin" id="camera_wrap_gallery">
    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/cj/cj-1.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/cj/cj-1.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">

    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/cj/cj-2.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/cj/cj-2.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">

    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/cj/cj-3.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/cj/cj-3.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">

    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/cj/cj-5.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/cj/cj-5.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">

    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/cj/cj-6.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/cj/cj-6.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
</div>

   
</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"></div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt1"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c0 span9"><div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The completely renovated and expanded Communication Studies and Journalism Building opened in September 2005. This building began life in 1962 as the Drummond Science Complex. It now houses state-of-the-art specialized facilities for Communications and Journalism, open lounge space, the bookstore for the Loyola Campus, and a small cafÃ©. The new installation replaces outmoded facilities for these departments that were in the Bryan Building (built in 1968) until they were displaced at the time of the building of the Richard J. Renaud Science Complex in 2003.</p>
<p>The building is designed to integrate cutting-edge technology into the teaching and research spaces. It includes a fully digitized radio and television broadcast operation, network access, high-tech classrooms, new media and computer labs, and studios with a full array of high-end audiovisual equipment, including production, video, and editing suites. This major upgrade was done using sustainable design.</p>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c1 span3"></div></div><div style="clear:both"></div>

</div>

        </div>
    </div>

</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Toronto Dominion Building</h1>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase gallery section">





<div style="clear:both;display:block;">

<div class="camera_wrap camera_black_skin" id="camera_wrap_gallery">
    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/td/td1.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/td/td1.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/td/td2.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/td/td2.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/td/td3.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/td/td3.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/td/td4.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/td/td4.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/td/td5.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/td/td5.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/td/td6.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/td/td6.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
</div>

   
</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"></div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt1"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c0 span9"><div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The classic bank building at Guy and Ste-Catherine opened in 1903 as a branch of the Bank of Toronto. (The Bank became the Toronto-Dominion Bank in 1954 and TD Canada Trust in 2000). The building was one of the first commercial projects of the Montreal architectural firm Ross and MacFarlane. Inspiration for the design came from the Knickerbocker Trust Company Building in New York, which had been conceived four years earlier by architects McKim, Mead and Whyte, and was modeled on the Temple of Zeus in Agrigento (ca 480 BCE).</p>
<p>In 2005 TD Canada Trust donated this heritage bank building to Concordia. The TD Bank Building is adjacent to the John Molson School of Business building, which opened in 2009. The two buildings are not connected. Renovations will eventually refit the four-storey building for university facilities. For the present, the bank continues to lease the space and operate the bank branch.</p>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c1 span3"></div></div><div style="clear:both"></div>

</div>

        </div>
    </div>

</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

$=jQuery;

    var check = mobilecheck();

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

	        <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Recreation and Athletics Complex</h1>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Sports facilities and playing fields have always been an important part of the Loyola Campus. The first phase began in 2003 to develop both the outdoor and indoor Loyola Campus recreation and athletics facilities. Artificial surfaces were installed to create two new outdoor playing fields for football, soccer, rugby, and recreational activities. Permanent lighting was installed to permit evening practices and games, and temporary stands were erected to replace badly deteriorating stadium seating. Fundraising is underway to extend and renovate the ageing and inadequate 1967 Sports Complex, and to build a permanent stadium. The plans include:</p>
<ul>
<li>a new triple gym</li>
<li>major renovations to the <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/buildings/ra/loyola-arena.html">Ed Meagher arena</a> including new varsity locker rooms</li>
<li>an indoor running track</li>
<li>a new weight room and conditioning room facilities</li>
<li>an athletic therapy center</li>
<li>academic and administrative support spaces</li>
<li>recreational and varsity locker room space</li>
<li>a removable dome for the south playing field</li>
<li>stadium construction to include permanent seating for 5,000, with lockers and showers for field sports to be located under the stands</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

        </div>
    </div>

</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

	        <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Grey Nuns Motherhouse</h1>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase gallery section">





<div style="clear:both;display:block;">
   
   





<script type="text/javascript" src="/etc/designs/concordia/clientlibs/gallery/slideshow.min.js"></script>

<div class="camera_wrap camera_black_skin" id="camera_wrap_gallery">
    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/grey/grey1.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/grey/grey1.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">

    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/grey/grey3.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/grey/grey3.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">

    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/grey/grey5.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/grey/grey5.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/grey/grey6.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/grey/grey6.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
</div>

   
</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"></div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt1"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c0 span9"><div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>In 1861 the Sisters of Charity of Montreal (Grey Nuns/Soeurs grises) bought from the <a href="http://sulpc.org/index_e.html">Sulpician Order</a> the famous Mont Sainte-Croix or â€œCroix Rougeâ€? -- the land between Guy, Ste-Catherine, St-Mathieu and Dorchester (now RenÃ©-LÃ©vesque). The Grey Nuns moved uptown from their Old Montreal facilities that regularly flooded. Renowned architect <a href="http://www.biographi.ca/EN/ShowBio.asp?BioId=39506&amp;query=bourgeau">Victor Bourgeau</a>, designer of many religious buildings in Montreal, designed the landmark limestone buildings. The <i><a href="http://www.thecanadianencyclopedia.com/index.cfm?PgNm=TCE&amp;Params=A1ARTA0003455">HÃ´pital GÃ©nÃ©ral</a></i> and the community spaces portion of the complex opened in October 1871; the chapel was consecrated in 1879. Other parts of the complex, including the orphanage and the Motherhouse, were completed by October 1901.</p>
<p>The property included cultivated fields and orchards. The Faubourg complex now sits on a part of this land, some of which was originally leased from the Grey Nuns in 1925 to build the older part of the building in which the food court is today.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image right" id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/maps/buildings/gn/jcr:content/content-main/textimage" style="width:300px;"><img title="grey" alt="grey" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/maps/buildings/gn/_jcr_content/content-main/textimage/image.img.jpg/1375094306239.jpg"><small>Grey Nuns Chapel</small></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/maps/buildings/gn/jcr:content/content-main/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/grey/grey.jpg", imageTitle: "grey" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><p>The chapel was designated a cultural property in 1974 and the whole site was classified as a historic site in 1976.</p>
<p>There are several Concordia connections to the site. In the 1840s the <a href="http://www.jesuits.ca/index.php">Jesuits</a> considered many locations for their new school that would become CollÃ¨ge Ste-Marie/St. Maryâ€™s College, out of which grew Loyola College. One potential site was Mont Sainte-Croix or the â€œCroix Rougeâ€? which was purchased by the Grey Nuns twenty years later in 1861. More than a hundred years later, in 1975, there was speculation that Concordia might purchase the property and renovate it for the new downtown library building and Commerce, Fine Arts and Athletics facilities. But the land remained in the hands of the Grey Nuns until a surprise announcement in 2004 that Concordia would purchase the Grey Nuns property. The occupation of the complex and land will be in phases, beginning in 2007 through to 2022. However, Concordia rented classroom space in the buildings earlier and in October 2005 the Installation ceremony of the newly-appointed President took place in the Motherhouse Chapel.</p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>
<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image " id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/maps/buildings/gn/jcr:content/content-main/textimage_0" style="width:300px;"><img title="grey-residence" alt="grey-residence" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/maps/buildings/gn/_jcr_content/content-main/textimage_0/image.img.jpg/1375094302635.jpg"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/maps/buildings/gn/jcr:content/content-main/textimage_0");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/grey/grey-residence.jpg", imageTitle: "grey\x2Dresidence" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><p>The first part of the complex was turned over to Concordia in May 2007 and construction began immediately for 227 interim residence beds. Students moved into these residence facilities in August 2007, in time for classes.&nbsp; There is a mixture of single and double rooms and some barrier-free access. Facilities also include kitchenettes and lounges, a games room, a common room on the ground floor, a small fridge in each room, and access to a lovely garden.</p>
<p>The Jesuit Residence and the Grey Nuns Residence are available for summer rentals to students, individual travelers and conference groups.</p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Discussions and feasibility studies are currently underway to determine how Concordia will adapt and use the Grey Nuns property, while maintaining the architectural integrity of this important Montreal landmark. Over the course of 2011 Concordia took possession of the chapel and the balance of the central wing.&nbsp; The chapel is a protected site and the interior cannot be modified but it will likely be used for performances and special events.</p>
<p>More about the Grey Nuns Motherhouse on-going project.</p>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c1 span3"></div></div><div style="clear:both"></div>

</div>

        </div>
    </div>

</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                    	<span class="sprites-icon-social-2" displayText="Twitter" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/maps/buildings/gm.img.png/1377521048469.jpg'>Twitter</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="#" title="LinkedIn" class="st_linkedin_custom">

                    </a>
                </li>
            </ul>   
        </div>

            jQuery(function() {

                    socialbar.scroll();
                });
    
            });
        </script></div>


	        <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Guy-Metro Building</h1>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase gallery section">





<div style="clear:both;display:block;">

<div class="camera_wrap camera_black_skin" id="camera_wrap_gallery">
    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/guy/gm1.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/guy/gm1.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/guy/gm2.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/guy/gm2.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/guy/gm3.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/guy/gm3.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/guy/gm4.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/guy/gm4.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/guy/gm5.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/guy/gm5.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
        







    <div data-link="" data-thumb="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/guy/gm6.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.48.48.png" data-src="/content/dam/concordia/images/campus-maps/guy/gm6.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg">
        
    </div>
    

    
</div>

   
</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"></div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt1"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c0 span9"><div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Concordia has gradually reclaimed rented spaces in the Guy MÃ©tro Building to accommodate Concordia administrative offices and there are currently very few external tenants with long-term leases. The Office of the President and members of the Cabinet took over the eighth floor in 2005; other administrative units have also recently joined long-time residents of the building.</p>
<p>Renovations are currently taking on the 40-year-old building and will include replacing 1960s single-pane windows with energy-saving windows, structural maintenance and repair, and upgrading of the building exterior to harmonize with adjacent and nearby new Concordia buildings.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><iframe width="640" height="360" frameborder="0" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/uhXSWCeeymg?feature=player_embedded">&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;nbsp;</iframe></p>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c1 span3"></div></div><div style="clear:both"></div>

</div>

        </div>
    </div>

</section>

            	<li class="dropdown ">
					
                    <a href="/maps/shuttle-bus.html" role="button" class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="">Shuttle bus</a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/maps/shuttle-bus/shuttle-bus.html">Bus schedule Fall 2013 for PDF</a>
				            </li>
                    </ul> 
	            </li>

            	
            	<li class="dropdown ">
					
						<a href="/maps/parking.html" role="button">Parking</a>
	            </li>
        </ul>
	</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

                </a>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Master space program (Loyola campus)</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>The program for the Loyola campus includes:</b></p>

</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>The construction of the 33,000 square meter&nbsp;<a href="/maps/buildings/sp.html">Richard J. Renaud Science Complex</a>&nbsp;as a teaching and research facility for various arts and science departments. This was completed at a cost of $85M and the building was officially opened in September 2003.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/maps/master-space-program/loyola/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="communications" alt="communications" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/maps/master-space-program/loyola/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1379429092800.jpg"></div>
</div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>The major renovation and expansion of the former Drummond Science building to relocate the departments of <a href="/maps/buildings/cj.html" adhocenable="false">Communication Studies and Journalism</a>. These renovations were carried out at a cost of $20M and the building was occupied in September 2005.</li>
<li>Renovation of the <a href="/maps/buildings/vl.html" adhocenable="false">Vanier Library Extension</a> to provide teaching and research facilities, including the construction of multi-functional high-tech classrooms, to be used by the Department of Applied Human Sciences. This work was completed in the summer of 2005 at a cost of $1.1M.</li>
<li>Upgrading of the <a href="/maps/buildings/ra.html" adhocenable="false">Sports Complex</a> included the installation of state-of-the-art artificial surfaces to create two new playing fields; installation of permanent outdoor lighting for the playing fields; and installation of temporary stands to replace deteriorating stadium seating ($2M). Plans are underway for a major $60M expansion and renovation of the existing Sports Centre. New features will include: an eight-lane swimming pool, three gyms, a multi-function area, fitness centre, running track, new stands, renovation of the arena, and a sports medicine clinic.</li>
<li><a href="/campus-life/residences/jesuit-residence.html" adhocenable="false">The Jesuit Residence</a> was completely renovated to provide 52 new residence bedrooms for occupancy in August 2006 at a cost of $1.6M. This is Phase 1 of a long-term project to provide increased student residence facilities.</li>
<li>Loyolaâ€™s outdoor landscape is receiving attention for the first time in many decades.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Campus art</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/maps/master-space-program/loyola/jcr:content/content-main/image_0"><img title="loyola" alt="loyola" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/maps/master-space-program/loyola/_jcr_content/content-main/image_0.img.jpg/1379429128853.jpg"></div>
</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The impressive bronze outdoor sculpture <i>The Emergence of the Chief</i> by Dave McGary was installed in October 2005 in the courtyard area on the west side of the campus created by the Richard J. Renaud Science Complex and the Communications Studies and Journalism Building.&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Campus trees</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Following a detailed tree inventory of the Loyola Campus, there are plans for ongoing monitoring and the planting of more trees, working in tandem with the City of Montreal. Parking facilities and outdoor spaces are also being re-organized in keeping with the changing face of the west-end campus.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/maps/master-space-program/sgw.html'>Master space program (SGW campus)</a></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/maps/master-space-program/loyola.html'>Master space program (Loyola campus)</a></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>
